$The other troops are fighting at the Miners' Village and we are blocking the monsters from{nl}coming though here. I don't think the Vubbes are smart enough to make use of tactics... {nl}though I am concerned about that.
$We have problems here, but I'm just as worried about the other troops fighting in the {nl}Miners' Village. Normally, they should have cleaning up by now.
$Watcher Gilbert
$It's the Pantos again. {nl}They even stole the working parts. {nl}Well then, we've got to take them back, right?
{memo X}I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl}But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
$Well done. {nl}Now attach this and grease it, then it should work correctly.
$The Pantos hid some parts in the grasslands of Mieguista Slope. {nl}Try to get me those for the time being since it's urgent.
$The Pantos think the grassland hides everything. {nl}I used to find that cute about them.
$Watcher Matthew
$I am looking for cable car parts, but I can't seem to find any. {nl}Maybe the Zignuts at Nepavy Grassland swallowed them. {nl}
{memo X}
$I want to go destroy those demons, but...{nl}the cable car hasn't been working right, so I need to work on fixing it.
$If it wasn't for me, uncle Gilbert would have been going around looking through this huge area. {nl}I am really worried.
$This is a sacred land which we have served for generations. {nl}We used to hold prayer and important meetings here whenever there was a disaster. {nl}
$But the land has been like this ever since it fell to evil energy four years ago. {nl}I guess the elders couldn't have helped it either.
$In the past, this cable car was just a rope with a basket. {nl}You had to put your life on the line whenever you crossed it. {nl}
$So I traveled to Klaipeda and learned the skills to create it myself. {nl}I have to start looking for a successor, but Matthew doesn't seem interested.
$Watcher Basil
$The Shaman Doll is to be filled with Mushcaria's Enchanted Mane. {nl}The Mushcaria should be in the Tustanti Plateau, can you get it's mane for me?
$They used to be considered mysterious creatures, worthy of respect. {nl}But nowadays you just go a few steps outside town and they are everywhere, preying on people.
$I forgot that Mushcaria was still alive. {nl}Anyway, you did a good job.
$There is enough time, so go meet with Follower Algis first.
$I am about to head down this path to the church. {nl}Our Paladin friend likes the word 'if' a lot. {nl}
$If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl}Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.
$Watcher Allen
$The barrier that used to stop the demons at Mazas Rest Place is broken. {nl}I want to fix it, could you lend me your help?
$The barrier was made a long time ago. {nl}And I failed to protect it, what do I tell our ancestors?
$I'm pretty dull and unsure on fixing the barrier, so could you inform to Kayetonas about it?
$Follower Kayetonas
$No wonder. I was bewildered when the demons suddenly appeared out of nowhere. {nl}I better let my brothers know about this. Thank you.
$Watcher Kenneth
$You can't let your guard down just because the demon summoning circles are gone. {nl}We don't even know what caused them to appear in the first place. {nl}
$Anyway, please inform Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill about this.
$It might be a bit extreme, but I'm thinking about eradicating all the demon's souls.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}It'd be better defeat the severed souls quickly. {nl}Wouldn't it be scary to see them come back to life?
$Honestly, I had my doubts, but it seems to be working? {nl}Please let Kayetonas know about this. {nl}I think he will be pleased, he is in Flower Greeting Hill.
$Now, I think I can live. {nl}We have to keep it up and stop the demons. {nl}Please tell Kayetonas that protecting this place isn't easy.
$The demons are very strong.{nl}I will protect this place to block those demons.
{memo X}Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
$My old friend, Algis, will explain. Please listen to him.
$I can see the monsters clearly from up here.{nl}We may get surrounded by them soon.
$The pieces of the destroyed barrier are scattered at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Collect them and give them to Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill. {nl}
$My poor deceased father would be happy if he knew I became a watcher.{nl}But, I've already made a mistake.
$We can say it's peaceful for now. For now.
{memo X}
$If any Watchers are struggling with the barriers, I'd like you to help them.
$I heard that the plan failed. {nl}I guess we have to do something before Gesti recovers.
$Watcher Erra
$What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
$I need the sap of Nepenthes, but it's not awake.{nl}I have no way to collect the sap if it doesn't wake up.{nl}
{memo X}That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
$Follower Rikke
$The elders gave me many charms that will help me fend off the demons.{nl}I hope they help.
$Those elders don't have any sense of reality.{nl}We should have gone to the church instead of those Paladins.
$Good, good.{nl}Let's see if it can resist waking up.
$Let's wake up the Nepenthes at Piene Field by burning it with this fat.{nl}The fluids will be of no use if they spoil, so we need to extract them while it's alive.
$Only a person like me can handle that monster.{nl}What do you think?
$They protected their regions, but I guess they came down because of those demons.{nl}
$They're not listening?{nl}Could the Panto Totems in Valyma Sanctum be causing problems?
$I will give you a stronger charm, so use it after destroying the Panto Totem.{nl}Just like you did last time. You got it?
$Ah, and if a brainwashed Panto injure an attacking Panto, that Panto will be on our side as well.
$As I thought, I still have some materials left. {nl}Thank you though.
$Follower Alfonsas
$Amazing.{nl}With this, my brothers at the church can fight without any worries.
$The demon summoning circles are the biggest problem here.{nl}If we scribble on the circles, do you think the summoning formulas will become tangled?
$At the very least, the demons should stop crossing through after those circles are removed.{nl}Though I do hope for a better result.
$They're getting swallowed up into them.{nl}Very effective indeed.
$Follower Vaidas
$It is reassuring to hear that Brother Tomas will be in charge of the altar.{nl}
$Brother Vaidutis is waiting on the 1st floor. {nl}Gesti's barrier is blocking the way, but don't worry. It can simply be taken down by{nl}the power of the altar.
$Follower Vaidas
$I regret that I didn't bring enough Holy Stones.{nl}I should have put them in all my pockets.
$The altars in the church are made to stop demons. {nl}Of course, only we, the Paladins, know how to use them.
$Is Brother Vaidutis alright?{nl}I would have been in serious trouble if not for your help.
$Follower Tomas
$The Yognomes are trying to eat the altar.{nl}I want you to defeat them.
$If I had any Holy Stones, I would stick them in the Yognomes' mouths.
$Follower Tiberius
$I am making a Holy Bomb to attack demons with.{nl}I can complete it if I obtain Purified Essence. Can you help me?
$Bombs in the church doesn't sound good, but..{nl}I think the goddess will forgive me this time.
$I want to test it out on Glizardon.{nl}I'll give you the Holy Bomb. Can you put it onto a Glizardon's back?
$If you think it'll be dangerous, I will also give you Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.
$Run away after setting the bomb on the back of Glizardon.{nl}Look at its size. It will not be fast.
$I only have one empty Holy Stone.{nl}Can you help me to fill this stone, please?
$We can sustain for a while if these stones can be filled without our brothers' help.
$It is a strategy to attack the boss first when there are multiple enemies.{nl}This time, it will be Glizardon.
$I would never have thought that you would defeat them this quickly.{nl}Thank you for your help.
$Follower Donatas
$Thank you. {nl}This is sufficient to make a transformation scroll.
$You can transform into a demon by using this scroll. {nl}Persuade the demons to go to the altar on their own.
$I get caught every time, maybe the demons know my scent. {nl}I'm sure it'll be easier for you since you haven't been around for long.
$Alright. {nl}I think that should be enough for you to grasp their nature.
$The power of the altar makes conversion simple. {nl}First, you activate the power of Globejas Altar. {nl}Then, stay within the influence of the altar and fight the demons.
$The demons have stronger minds than you might think. {nl}It will take a lot of effort to make them forget about Gesti.
$Don't trust the water's effects too much, or Glizardon may find out about it.
$I am thinking about an effective way to defeat the demons.{nl}You came just at the right time.
$When you place the Holy Stone, it will absorb the lives of the nearby demons automatically.{nl}Defeat the demons that have already had their life absorbed.
$You can obtain Vicious Essences from the demons.{nl}You can purify these essences at the Altar of Purification, which is down from here.
{memo X}Oh, they will find out if you are not confident enough. {nl}So it's better to fight the demons to gain some self confidence before using the scroll.
$Epigraphist Raymond
$This isn't the only monument.{nl}There's a fine monument at Irody Square.
$I wonder who mourned that traitor? Don't you think there would be a different reason?
$Surprisingly, this looks fine.{nl}We should get ready to restore it.
$His monument is cased with a terrible magic because he was a traitor.{nl}We should use that magic instead.
$If we received support, then we would have hired mercenaries.{nl}Studying about the traitor doesn't mean that we praise the traitor, so I don't understand why{nl}we lost support.
$Thanks.{nl}Achat must have been drawn to the magic power cast upon the monument.
$It's kind of curious that something that looks like a tree stump would be interested in {nl}stone plates.
$I am sorry, but we can't find the one that we needed among the fragments you brought.{nl}I hope it has not already been eaten.

$If we burn the Tree Ambulo, do you think we can find the stone pieces that they swallowed?{nl}I stacked four piles of firewood over there, light them up and push the Tree Ambulo in {nl}when the wood is burning.
$Be careful though.{nl}It will be dangerous if a flaming Tree Ambulo runs into the camp.
$Treasure Hunter Eden
$I am a treasure hunter, not a monster hunter.{nl}I don't want this place to become my grave, having fought monsters.
$I've collected all the fragments Raymond requested. {nl}Bring them back to Raymond.
$Eden told you to give this to me?{nl}Hmm. It will take some time to restore it.{nl}
$Can you take these restored gravestone fragments to my assistant at Irody Square?{nl}I think something good will happen when we finish restoring it.
$Epigraphist Schmid
$This... Our master did it!{nl}Give it to me, please.
$Not yet. A little more.{nl}I think I just need to do a little bit more.
$Necromancer Drasius
$Please put the sacrifices in the jar at Dumbliai Pond.{nl}The summoned spirit will come to me if you succeed.
$It depends on how one uses necromancy.{nl}It could be good or bad depending on what Necromancer has in his mind.
$The experiment failed? I am so sorry.{nl}I should research more here to find out what went wrong.
$Monument of Lydia Schaffen
$My name is Lydia Schaffen.{nl}For the reasons that I have endured this deep burden of sadness, I am now going to tell the truth {nl}about Ruklys on this land.
$There is no more charcoal besides what you have, so don't use it too freely.
$I didn't know she studied with Ruklys, the traitor.{nl}Shoot. I've almost used up all the charcoal.
$Eventually, Ruklys failed.{nl}He was destroyed by those who were jealous of him.{nl}He left to the goddess by my hands.
$What was Lydia Schaffen's relationship with Ruklys?{nl}I am not astute enough to understand.

{memo X}I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
$The stage that Ruklys had reached was astonishing.{nl}But, his noble mission was too difficult to be accomplished on this land.
$Since I am on a long journey, my luggage is not heavy.{nl}It's better to buy anything from local shops.
$Any archer would want to have good arrowheads.{nl}I will show you how to find good arrowheads, so how about you help me some?
$They aren't very quick, so this shouldn't be hard for you to do.{nl}I'm sure of it.
$Thanks. These are still hot to the touch.{nl}Aren't they nice?
$Wandering Spirit
{memo X}
$Operation Order
$How to lure a Unicorn.{nl}1. Collect Zolem Stones from Zolems{nl}2. Set the stones around Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins.
$Guard Leaper
$This operation had failed several years ago.{nl}Where did you get this anyway?{nl}
$I understand. Please take the Unicorn's Horn to that girl over there.{nl}Her brother went missing after that tragedy.
$Girl
$I told him not to go...
$It was really terrible.{nl}I was lucky since I almost was dispatched.
$If you have trouble pulling it over to the burning wood, then just kick it in hard.
$I need the flame of Infroburk at the Shiluma Altar Site.{nl}Get close to the back of that monster and heat these arrowheads.
$I was trying to get something for myself while I had this signed contract with Raymond.{nl}But, now I have nothing besides stone fragments.
$It'll be clear to you what's on Ruklys' memorial after you've restored it.
$Great. {nl}Please leave activating the altar to me and go meet Vaidas at Himnas Chapel.
{memo X}Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the {nl}extra energy to endure longer.
$Good. This will be enough.
{memo X}It feels so good to see them flying.{nl}But, they are too noisy so I need to study more.
I have never seen a stone filled with this much holiness.{nl}Thank you very much for giving it so much effort.
{memo X}The demons' attacks are stronger than we expected.{nl}If we are able to defeat Glizardon, then it will be easier to defeat them.
$Follower Vaidutis
$I came to say that Gesti went up to the 2nd floor, and I let my guard down. {nl}I would have been in big trouble if not for you.
$I studied the barrier at the gate, but the power of the basement altar is insufficient. {nl}Could you supply me with Power Crystals from the Corylus?
$Maybe the goddess knew it'd fail and that's why she said to wait for the Revelator. {nl}At least we hurt Gesti some, so that's good.
$Well done. {nl} Making the Light Crystal with this will be enough power to break the barrier.
{memo X}Prepare yourself before bringing the Light Crystal to the gate. {nl}It can attract powerful monsters.
$I think I'll stay here to stop the demons from entering the basement.
$It is an honor to fight with you, Revelator. {nl} Could you drive the demons from this area while Follower Algis investigates?
$If you don't mind, can you get Eyes of Madness from Rodelins?{nl}They are handy when you want to hide yourself from demons.
$I don't want those filthy things to be near me either.{nl}But, it's worse to face against those demons alone.
$Thanks.{nl}I will share them with the other brothers before the demons find out.
$You are indeed the Revelator.{nl}Now, we can concentrate on protecting the altar.
$Don't worry, the barrier at the main entrance to the 1st floor can be offset by the church's {nl}power. That's what the altars are for. {nl}
$Let's take care of the Unknocker first. {nl}I'll lure the Unknocker, giving you a chance to attack it.
{memo X}I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.
$Be careful, I almost got attacked as well.{nl}They are really violent.
$Good job. {nl}Their babbling laughter seems to have stopped.
{memo X}
$It's a bit blasphemous, but we don't have much choice.
$Well done. {nl}It will probably be difficult for them to trust each other from now on. {nl}
{memo X}I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl}The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
$But before that, it's important for us to understand the demons. {nl}Collect some demon souls for me.
$I remember the first time I converted the demons. {nl}I pray for their poor souls.
$Good job. {nl}If there are any good demons left, the goddess will look after them.
$The Central Altar that suppresses the power of the demons suddenly stopped. {nl}Could you take a look at what's going on?
$Strange, it was definitely working.
$It was an ambush. {nl}We would have been in big trouble without your help.
$You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
$Many structures in the Tenet Church are placed to ward against the demons. {nl}Each one in itself is a small barrier that contributes to a huge barrier. {nl}
$The most powerful barrier is on the 2nd floor. {nl}I heard that it can exert the greatest force when the Divine Sphere is there.
$Gesti has made the first move. {nl}It will be difficult to approach her secretly.
$We must change our plan. {nl}First, we'll need to go observe Gesti's actions. {nl}
$Let's start by retaking the Bell Tower.
$From here, we can see what Gesti is up to.
$Alright, bring back the Seal of Space from the Sventove Central Altar. {nl}Can you do this?
$You must realize that the revelation is hidden in the sanctuary. {nl}The Seal of Space is the single key that will get you to the sanctuary. {nl}
$Not only can the Seal of Space get you to the sanctuary within the Tenet Church, {nl}it'll allow you to enter any location where the goddess have hid before.
$The Seal of Space can only be used by the Revelator, so she won't be able to find the revelation {nl}right away. {nl}
$But the enemy is the Demon Queen herself. Even the Paladin Master couldn't defeat her.{nl}We have to use the powers of the destroyed altar.
$We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
$When you are done, I will be able to restrict Gesti through the power of the Divine Sphere and {nl}the church. It may be for a short while but that's the best option we have.
$So you activated the Malda Altar? {nl}Now it will be safe to stay here for the time being. Good work.
$Demons are going around the second floor searching every corner. {nl}Activating the Auka Altar will divert their attention.
{memo X}I'm relieved you're beside me. {nl}I think it was a good thing that Laima chose you.
$Thank you for your hardwork. {nl}When this is over, I plan to gather all brothers and drive them away at once.
$I'll ring a bell to let you know when Gesti gets close to you, so please listen for it.
{memo X}So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Use the crest on the pillar beside me to go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared for the Revelator only.
$May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
$So Gesti just ran away. {nl}Fine. Since you got the revelation, we've completed the mission. {nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
$Seems like Gesti has not notice yet. {nl}We better prepare the Divine Sphere.
$All preparations have been made. {nl} The barriers of the church will soon weaken Gesti. {nl}
$Gesti will be enough for you to handle once she's weakened. {nl}When Gesti is cornered, I will make the final strike with the Divine Sphere.
$These are pieces of the barrier at Mazas Rest Place. {nl}Do not worry. There are ways to recover the barrier, so I'm sure it will be alright.
$I didn't know the demons would use summoning circles to come through. {nl} I suggest removing them all before they siege us.
$Even with this many demons, you still managed to make it through. {nl}You may be the Revelator, but that's still impressive. {nl}
$It's the revelation. {nl}Cherish it and do not show it to anyone else. {nl}
$Come on. Go to the Paladin Master. {nl}He will tell you the way you must go.
$I asked my precious friend Algis to go to the Tenet Church. {nl}I won't lose to Gesti, but it is important to have some back up plan just in case.
{memo X}
$In the kingdom, there are several valuable weapons aside from this Divine Sphere. {nl}Those weapons saved many lives on Medzio Diena four years ago.
$Starting from now, I will focus on the Divine Sphere.{nl}In the meantime, please use your skills so that nothing can disturb me.
$Sorry. My abilities weren't good enough. {nl}Gesti has now realized that the Holy Relic is not the revelation, and is probably heading {nl}straight to the church. {nl}
{memo X}But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
{memo X}
$It is too much for me to handle alone without any help from the other brothers. {nl}I'd better use the Malda Altar. {nl}
{memo X}
$We still have a lot to do here.{nl}The goddess told us to never give up.
$The world still needs more experience. {nl}We probably wouldn't have made it this far without the help of the goddess.
$Activating the Tree Guard Post Barrier is taking longer than I thought. {nl}We have no time, let's charge it with demon souls instead.
$All souls are pure. So even if it's a demon's soul, it can still provide some divine power.
$So the Tree Guard Post Barrier has been charged with demon souls, huh. {nl}It still needs some final touches for completion, but I'll take care of it from here. {nl}Great job.
$It's amazing you can use the barrier like that. {nl}Even the Paladins did not know about that. {nl}
{memo X}
$Holding off against this many enemies is by itself a great feat. {nl}It's all thanks to the Paladin Master.
$Even though he's still young, Kenneth is amazing. {nl}I think we can trust him a little more.
$I have received an urgent message from the Watchers.{nl}A gigantic demon monster is coming this way.{nl}Quickly, follow me.{nl}
$Biteregina, which used to live in the deep forest, has appeared here.{nl}It even built a hive at the upper side of Rojus Plateau. Since it's dangerous, can you defeat it?
$Thank you so much!{nl}How did it come from such a far forest?{nl}Strange, huh?
$I can't do anything since the Seedmias are attacking us from every direction.{nl}Can you defeat them?
$I really hope those Seedmias don't hit me on the head with those flower buds. {nl}They look horrible.
$I received a mysterious charm from the elders that will brainwash Pantos to stand on our side.{nl}Are you up for a challenge?{nl}
$According to the elders, we are done with those Pantos.{nl}We can't continue the relationship anymore.
$This barrier is impossible to open from the outside. {nl}Fortunately, the entrance to the basement looks secure. {nl}
$However, it's too dangerous to enter the basement with the Divine Sphere. {nl}I'll wait here so you go to the 1st floor through the basement and open the barrier. {nl}
$You have done what no other could easily do.{nl}The goddess must be proud of you.
$I would like to say that my faith is like a first-class blade that can cut through these demons, {nl}but in reality it isn't that simple. I hope you'll help us some.
{memo X}
$Defeat the demons around the Tree Guard Post Barrier. {nl}The souls of those demons should be able to fill its divine powers a little. I'm counting on you!
$Very good. Flowers in the fields should act like flowers in the fields.{nl}Don't you think so?
$We are the people following the Paladin Master.{nl}We will defeat the people who disobey the goddess.{nl}
$Everyone has their reasons for following him.{nl}Some of them received benefits from him and some of them were already Paladins like Algis.
$Maybe the goddess knew it would happen and that's why she waited for the savior.{nl}I feel like I put a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}
{memo X}
$This is the plan that has been passed on for hundreds of years since the first Paladin.{nl}We shall not fail this plan.
$Please fit the pieces together at Ruklys' memorial in front of me while I prepare the rubbings.{nl}With you working with us, this should be easy. {nl}
$I will follow you soon. Just a moment.
$After we finish the rubbings, we can say farewell to this place.{nl}Can you help me a bit more?
$The capital may already be in ruins, but I will protect Klaipeda.
$To place all your might towards a devastating strike against any enemy who threaten{nl}the kingdom. That is how Highlanders fight in battle. {nl}
$Good work. {nl}Honestly, I had my doubts, but the results seem to be fine. {nl}You just need to tell it like that to Kayetonas in Flower hill.
$It looks like even the Auka Altar lost its powers. {nl}There were stories about its powers wiping out dozens of demons in the past.
$It's hard to watch the Egnomes running around the Atgaila Chapel.{nl}Please clean up the Egnomes.
$Many of the Paladin's treasures are also here. Do not let them fall into the hands of the demons.
$After using the charm on the Pantos, hit them several times.{nl}Try that on the Pantos in Levanda Habitat.
{memo X}Isn't this city amazing? I want to stay here if I can.{nl}But, I prefer going to other places with my horse.
{memo X}The space movement magic circle will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
$I hope the monsters haven't broken the magic circle yet.
{memo X}Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
{memo X}When you activate the device which sets barriers, monsters won't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for demons' power is broken, but we can input the power with other methods.
{memo X}I hope that crazy magician, Antares, won't disturb us.
{memo X}He set a trap so well.{nl}I didn't like him even he was conscious.
{memo X}We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
{memo X}He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.
$Oh my goodness, why now...{nl}

{memo X}The reason why he was imprisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
{memo X}Gabija is important, but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
{memo X}There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
{memo X}Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.

{memo X}Antares has done research on the flow of the demons' power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere..
$The research materials should be here somewhere...
{memo X}This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
{memo X}Let's go find the last valve at the central control room.{nl}When we destroy this, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
{memo X}Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the Barrier Device.
{memo X}A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
{memo X}Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magic in case something happens.{nl}There was magic written in Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
{memo X}
{memo X}Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
{memo X}Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
{memo X}The Jewel of Prominence is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have gone wrong when Antares exploded a while ago.
{memo X}Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
{memo X}What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very instable.
{memo X}Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. It seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
{memo X}And me.. I feel dizzy..
{memo X}If we stay like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
{memo X}By the way, how do I know about the stabilizing device?{nl}I've never been to the 4th floor..
{memo X}Okay.. My memories keep coming back..{nl}
{memo X}Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
{memo X}The Jewel of Prominence has stopped going crazy.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
{memo X}It's almost done. Yes..
{memo X}You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to fully stabilize it so let's go to the Laboratory.
$I hope the device is still okay...
{memo X}Good! We can activate the device now.
{memo X}You are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
{memo X}Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive any help.
{memo X}
{memo X}This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all my power somehow.{nl}
{memo X}I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
{memo X}All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go in.
{memo X}Gabija did not hide herself.{nl}She just coudnl't come forward because she had to protect the tower from demons.{nl}
{memo X}I heard Agailla Flurry went because she coun't find a successor. {nl}I heard it was for something important.. But I don't know what it is.
$Medzio Diena could strike again, whether at your kingdom or my hometown. {nl}The one responsible for such a plague would be someone worthy of my sword.
$Owyn
$Reinforcement? We could really use your strength!{nl}Please defeat the monsters nearby.
$All the other magicians have either died or ran away.{nl}Goddess Gabija is the only one protecting the tower right now.
$The demons have attacked before, but this battle is taking longer than usual.{nl}I read about Helgasercle from a book. Maybe she has appeared again..
$As a follower of the great Flurry, I can't back away just yet!
$You are indeed the Revelator.{nl}Look at yourself go!
$Can we have another go, with the same momentum?{nl}I will take care of the other monsters, you go focus on those troublesome Drakes.
$Those monsters are not as strong when we fight together!
$Now I feel safe.{nl}I will be okay by myself from here. Thanks!{nl}{nl}
$Cordelier
$Black Coal Powder.. With that, we can unleash the seal that is written on this recipe.{nl}But I can't just find it. I am sorry, but could you bring me that powder?
{memo X}Isn't it better to just scratch the powder from the monsters nearby?
$Thanks!{nl}Now, I better get ready to unleash the seal.
$Oh no... I forgot I need the Eternal Ember.{nl}I should have also requested this of you before.. Can you please get that for me?{nl}
$I should have requested this of you all at once.{nl}I'm sorry, I make mistakes all the time.
$Could it be Ginklas? I hope it's just a bookshelf falling down in the reading room.{nl}Could you check the bookshelf, please?
$I've never seen a monster who could cause this much vibration.
$It was indeed Ginklas. You are so amazing!{nl}Because of you, I had enough time to prepare my magic.
$Sealed Stone
$I am much more than you could ever imagine.{nl}I wish to be released from these restraints. Please defeat the nearby monitors.
$Defeat the monitors.{nl}There's an Eye of Surveillance on Blindlems and Beleggs.
$I shall be released soon.
{memo X}I can't tell you my name. {nl}Please defeat the monitors and release the seal on me.{nl}
$Amazing. You possess great power.
{memo X}
$Another me from somewhere else led you to this place. {nl}Now, I can be released.
$But, if I get released like this, I will be split into pieces.{nl}
{memo X}The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Ark.
$The Holy Ark that I was sealed within is broken, and the observers have taken those pieces.
$Now, I can be released.
$As long as there are Eyes of Surveillance, I can't be released from my restraints.{nl}Please defeat the monitors and release me.
$I am tied to a contract.{nl}I seem to be free, but am not really free.
{memo X}I was sealed when my sprit was ripped off by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Infroroktors for me. I promise I will not be a burden to you.
{memo X}Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
$This is way better without the monitors.
{memo X}Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Fallenlem.
$His creations should have voices to ask with, and ears to listen. {nl}
$The pieces from my other self are able to call you now.{nl}Now, I can be released.
$My body is restrained. The Armas are mocking me.{nl}Please teach them some manners.
$You should give them a lesson so that they'll behave properly.
$You dealt with them well. {nl}I shall entrust you with the task of releasing this seal.
{memo X}Please unleash this seal on me.{nl}When you gather the essences of restraints from the observers, this seal will break.
$You will know when the time comes.
$Suspicious Table
$There's a Golem near here.{nl}I am too scared to go out. Please help me.
$This won't come out.
$Thanks.{nl}I will stay here until it becomes safe, and then run away.
$Furry Odd
$Pleased to meet you. {nl}I am Furry Odd. I am a magician specialized in object variation.{nl}
$I see the Revelator is here to help the goddess.{nl}While you do so, can you help me collect Variation Mediators from the monsters?
$The magicians that ran away?{nl}What can we do.. For them, their lives are more important than the Goddess Gabija.{nl}I don't think they are cowards. They are just hopeless.
$Thanks. You are so reliable.
$We have enough Mediators now so we can go defeat the remaining monsters.{nl}Do you want to come along?
$You are so great.{nl}I hope our magicians can be just as good as you.
$There's a problem.{nl}I think I saw a Yonazolem inside the Machinery Room... I can't handle it by myself.{nl}
$I will take care of other monsters. Could you take care of Yonazolem, please?
$I am not strong enough to face Yonazolem.{nl}It's fortunate that you are here.
$Thank you so much for helping me. It's so good that you are here.{nl}May the goddess bless you!
{memo X}I can't stand it anymore. Please save me from the restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the observers nearby.
$The time to retrieve my body and spirit is near.
$I can't stand it anymore.{nl}Please destroy the monitors that imprison me.{nl}
$So I guess I can be released now.
$I promise. That there will be something in the future.
$Simon Shaw
$We should stop Bearkaras, but there are so many monsters.{nl}Can you help us?
$Now it's time to get revenge!
$You are so great. {nl}Now we will be able to face against it.
$I will go to the Small Hall to chase after Bearkaras, so please take care of the surrounding monsters.{nl}I am counting on you!
$There's no way I can defeat Bearkaras myself...{nl}Sorry you have to see me like this...
$Bearkaras is still near here.{nl}You are our last hope. We are counting on you.
$It was a good decision to trust you.{nl}I am more motivated because of you.
{memo X}The contract needs to continues. Please release me.{nl}As those observers fall down, my spirit becomes free.
{memo X}
$It wasn't a long time ago, but it was frightening for me.
$Now only the last piece is left.{nl}
$The last spirit is in the monitor Stone Whale.{nl}My spirit will be free when he gets defeated.
$My body was ripped apart, humiliated... I can't forgive that..
$Quickly... We should continue the contract.{nl}
{memo X}
$I will leave now to find my remaining pieces.{nl}We will meet again someday in the future.
$I'm glad to hear that you will help.{nl}I want you to get back the Flame Charm I set inside Black Drakes.
$Don't ever think of blocking its axe head-on.{nl}You will be crushed into a pulp.
{memo X}You should go to the Great Cathedral to follow the revelation,{nl}But, unfortunately, you are not skillful enough.
{memo X}Train more at the entrace of Katin Forest. {nl}Believe that you will get your victory at the end.
{memo X}Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah, it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
{memo X}Look at this busted cable car. The damage is pretty serious. {nl}
$It's obviously the work of the Grummer and Zignuts from the Cholras Winding Road. {nl}Give them a taste of your skills while I fix this.
$This would not have happened if the elders had listened to what the young men said. {nl}But what's done is already done. What can we do about it now?
$Good work. These are the parts the Pantos stole. {nl}I never imagined I'd be seeing them again like this.
$Watcher Molly
$The Pantos were not always such violent monsters. {nl}There must be a way to change them back. {nl}
$I want you to give the Baby Pantos at Nyosalus Trail some Plateau Sugar Beets.{nl}Perhaps then they will remember something and come to me?
$I really feel sorry for them. {nl}No matter how troubled the world is, they weren't like that before.
$Alright. Thank you very much! {nl}Do you see that damaged cable car over there? I used to ride that when I was a kid.
$Thank you! You've saved me and my friends from spending more than half of our lives {nl}just protecting the cable car. {nl}
$As I'm the only one who can fix the cable car, I'll take a look. {nl}Oh, of course, thanks for your help.
{memo X}Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl}They would be a good source of magic for the shaman dolls. {nl} {nl}
$It's fun. {nl}Some straws, seeds, and a bit of rope and those kinds of things can go around as if they are alive.
$Watcher Mori
$It's been a bit frightening ever since Simorph appeared around here.{nl}Witnessing the Pantos becoming this corrupted is no different.
{memo X}Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl}The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
$The corruption is extensive, but I think Labure Road has it worst. {nl}Maybe it's spreading through the roots?
$Look at these gentle Pantos. It's insane that we have to make the Pantos our enemies {nl}when the demons are charging in.
{memo X}We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl}It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl}Bring it to me.
$If you can persuade Capria, the Pantos should be tamed. Capria is the leader of the Pantos. {nl}
$Let's follow the Baby Pantos. They will surely lead the way to Capria.
$I wish Capria will understand us. {nl}We must do whatever it takes.
$It got angry as soon as it saw the Baby Pantos? {nl}So the plan really did not work.
$I worked very hard to fix the cable car, but I'm still worried about the Poata. {nl}A monster of that size could destroy the cable car.
{memo X}Our guards love to fight.{nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons waiting to march in.
$The Poata also destroyed the cable car at Nepavy Grassland. {nl}But it's not like we can guard it all the time. {nl}
$Even if we stay on guard, a fight with the Poata? {nl}That's not easy.
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
$This place has a very sacred meaning to us. {nl}And we have a calling as Watchers, to protect this place. {nl}
$It has been protected for generations, since the day when we promised the first Paladin that {nl}we would protect it. And now that the demons have invaded, it is time to keep that promise.
$The Pantos changed and became wild after Medzio Diena, four years ago. {nl}Before that, we didn't really mind each other and even joked around together. {nl}
$I really wonder what has become of this sacred land?
{memo X}The Caprias were the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl}And then the Pantos.. now only the babies are left.
$Our family has been protecting this sacred land for a long time.{nl}Please cooperate with us to keep the reverent atmosphere here.{nl}- Watcher
$Thank you for helping out. {nl}You've reduced my workload quite a bit.
{memo X}
$We used to be on good terms with the Pantos. {nl}These days, we're constantly at each other's throats.
{memo X}I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}The dolls for spells. Isn't it exciting?
$Thank you. {nl}We might be able to go get more when more young men arrive.
{memo X}I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil forces. {nl}I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
$We can't do anything until Basil restores the shaman doll perfectly. {nl}Unless for special situations like this, we can use, um, nothing.
$It would have been a disaster if the Wild Carnivore had legs.{nl}I'm glad it was killed beforehand.
{memo X}I heard we promised the first Paladin three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
$To help build the Tenet Church, {nl}to appoint the Watchers to safeguard the sacred land covering the Holy Relic, {nl}and lastly, to protect each other together when great danger arises. {nl}
$I do not know what curse it was. {nl}There's got to be a record within the Tenet Church.
{memo X}Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
$You don't need to be a Bokor to use it. {nl}It moves by itself to attack, or something like that.
$The demons could have used their hands to make it easier to fight. {nl}Maybe they are after the Holy Relic. {nl}
$Since the Holy Relic was hidden deep underground, {nl}who could have known that plants would be the reason for the world's overturn?
$You may use a bit of force if words aren't enough. {nl}We can't grow any further from each other anymore.
{memo X}You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
{memo X}If possible, defeat the Carnivore too. {nl}It was contaminated by evil energy and I can't stand watching it anymore.
$Soil the Poata's nest at Margas Hill, and it will show up. {nl}
{memo X}Liaison Official Colin
$Rexipher? {nl}I've never heard this name before. {nl}
{memo X}
$Desk of the Royal Mausoleum
$One does not simply try to obtain the secrets and precious wisdom of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}When the time comes and you are ready, you will be able to attain them.{nl}
$Bring me the Bloodstone.{nl}It's not too late yet. You can still make it in time.
$Make sure that you come back within the time frame.
$Don't yield your resolution to confront opportunity with preparation.
$Since you told me about my brother's death, I'd like reward you.{nl}It's something I saved for when my brother and I could journey again, but I don't need it anymore.
$Isn't that Drake Horn?{nl}You're going to sell all of them?{nl}
$No. It's too precious to be used that way. {nl}With this much amount, we could even make Drake's Epaulet.{nl}I will give you the recipe. Are you interested in making it?
$With this key, we can open the treasure chest.{nl}But, you will need to look for the chest yourself.
$Crafting is only possible during rest mode. {nl}You know this already right?
$If it weren't for you, I would have continued believing that my brother was alive and {nl}well somewhere. You can't say you are not responsible for this.
$Well made.{nl}You will definitely need it sometime in the future.
$For now, I will hold on to it.{nl}When you need it, don't forget to come and take it from me. I will give it to you when {nl}the time comes.
$You sure know a lot of people. {nl}Every class master at Klaipeda and Fedimian knows your name.{nl}
$Do you want to bet on this? {nl}Answer every questions laid out at the Mage Tower.
$The magicians on the 1st to 4th floors of the Mage Tower each offer a quiz that you can take.{nl}I will give you a small present if you can solve them all.
$Wow, you came up here! You are incredible.{nl}Well that's it for questions, should we do something else?
$It's nothing special. {nl}If you can completely collect the scattered pages of the book at the Laboratory on the 3rd floor, {nl}I will approve that as you answered the question.

$That's why I have a favor to ask you.{nl}

$That proves that it is an important object.

$You found them. {nl} Then I'll start from now.

$Good work. {nl} You will be rewarded with proper compensation.

$If you ask me what the strongest weapon is, my answer would be my faith. Faith to an ally that {nl}you can truly rely on.

{memo X}But, yeah. {nl}Asking me to teach in the military is just too much ..{nl}Could it be another problem?

$, you should read it if you get the chance.

$Please hurry and support the Miners' Village. {nl}Someone like you will be of great help.

I lost everything. {nl} I don't know how I can go on anymore. {nl} Would my life have become this miserable if not for Medzio Diena?
Four years ago, it was on the eve of the so called 'Medzio Diena'. {nl} Suddenly, a huge tree emerged in the middle of the capital and the earth and sky reversed. {nl}
I never knew a tree could grow that big. {nl} And the destruction of the capital began. {nl}
Everything happened so fast, and nobody knew what to do. {nl} We didn't know whether to run away or try to stop it... Our minds just became blank.
The destruction of the capital was just the beginning. {nl} Medzio Diena was simply a prelude to the catastrophes coming ahead. {nl}
Monstrous plants sprouted up all over and began devouring people.{nl} Everyone started running, but before I knew it I was the only person left.{nl}
Enough. Don't ask any more questions. {nl}I.. don't want to think about it anymore.
From here, it's the Research Camp on Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum.{nl}You can freely enter, but please be careful not to disturb the people doing research.

$Hundreds of years ago an archmage by the name of Agailla Flurry built that tower. {nl} Much of the magic used today saw their beginnings within that tower, and haven't changed much since.
$That city was abandoned after it was cursed with a spell that turned everything to stone. {nl}It is just beyond Pilgrim's Road.
$It was the place where the people who supported the former rebel Ruklys lived. {nl} The curse is still in effect today so it's difficult to travel there.
$Goddess Zemyna has always protected Jofuiru for me. {nl} I believe my older brother also leaves me to Zemyna's care.
$How many times must we pray to the Goddess Zemyna until she can hear our prayers?
$This is the Holy District of the city of Fedimian. {nl} The Market District is currently closed, please accept that inconvenience.
$The divine city, Fedimian also had a Market District besides the Holy District here.{nl}But, on Medzio Diena, the Market District was completely destroyed due to the earthquake.
We are still reviving the city, but since it's so old..{nl}At least, the Holy District is still left intact due to Zemyna's blessing.

I didn't know that I would meet Saugas again, I don't know if I should like it or dislike it.
Good work.{nl}Now shall we start?
{memo X}We will be ready when we rub Woodfung's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.
The Saugas' just took the stones and disappeared?{nl}That's absurd.
Are you afraid of them?{nl}I still have some more stones, so could you try luring them again from there?
Did the Saugas ran away because they caught my scent?{nl}I guess that is possible.
So the Saugas were just causing trouble to its peers.{nl}Okay. I will go back to the camp slowly since the commander is worrying about me.
There's a scary monster called Denoptic here.{nl}I need the artifacts that Denoptic swallowed. Can you get them for me?
I'm surprised, this is the first time I've seen Denoptic eat stones. {nl} Is someone behind this?
How did you find the right piece!{nl}Thank you so much.
{memo X}Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.
Thank you.{nl}I wonder why there is no support here, because they do send mercenaries {nl}to those scholars at the entrance of the canyon.
$If something were to happen to Airine, I don't know I would live....
$Why are monsters after these artifacts.{nl}Is there something that we should know?{nl}
$Anyways, thanks for helping me on the research.
$Gotta run away from Niels.{nl}We should go see the stars.
$There was something important..{nl}
$What are you doing here?
$Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I am okay. You guys are crazy.
$Just where exactly did that old man go to alone?{nl}He's not even in good shape...
$Instead of fighting, I chose to run away.{nl}I think my research will help us more than fighting.
$Do those monsters like eating research materials or something?{nl}What do you think?
$Sorry if I sounded mean.. it's just, I don't have energy to talk right now.
$I was a hunter before.{nl}Those monsters in the canyon are nothing to me.
$Damn... that was badass.
$It was dangerous, but we got something out of it.{nl}Nevertheless, the disappearance incidents are a bit eerie.
$It's raining hard.{nl}Monsters are more erratic on these days.
$I wonder who is planning all this?{nl}I'm certain they're after the Royal Mausoleum.
$Manipulating monsters, that's not a human thing to do.{nl}Are they demons then? Ah... this is all very confusing.{nl}What have I seen?
{memo X}I guess I can't sleep tight.
{memo X}Can you hear it? hear it? The screams of those who died without any reasons?
$The criminals who fabricate counterfeits of the Royal Mausoleum's artifacts roam about here.{nl}They already know my face, what should I do...
$There are many monsters here, {nl}though it appears there are stone statues moving near the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Perhaps they'll attack when the king gets disturbed in his sleep?
{memo X}$What do we do? {nl}To add to all the chaos in the village, the Vubbes have kidnapped the villagers.
$Hunter
$Oh, you're just in time. We need your help. {nl}Monsters stole all the aids and supplies meant for the refugees. {nl}
$Fortunately, we found them quickly.
$I'll stay and aid the people left here. {nl}There are more people who need more than my aid, so please go on ahead.
$I'm holding this because it looks like it's about to collapse. {nl}We need some stones to do something about it.
$We won't be able to handle it if this wall opens. {nl}How will you stop them then if people are already running away now?
$Alright. That'll be enough.
$I must go back to the village. {nl}But as you can see my arms are shaking. {nl}Can you defeat the monsters while I rest my arms for a while?
$The goddesses are so heartless. {nl}Had the goddesses not disappeared, the monsters wouldn't be invading.
$Now I can return to the village with peace of mind. {nl}This grace I shall never forget.
$I came here to hide from the monsters, but even this area is becoming dangerous. {nl}I'm trying to make it back to the village, so can you bring the other refugees to me?
$I see you came back safely. {nl}Well then, I must also prepare to leave.
$What do we do? I think there are even more monsters now than when we first came. {nl}And the patients have not recovered yet. {nl}
$Somehow I'll treat this man. Can you defeat the monsters around?
$In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.
$Thank you. The patient also regained his consciousness. {nl}Though... I think there is a problem.
{memo X}$This has to be because there is the evidence of salvation or something. {nl}I'm sure that's where the villagers were taken away to.
$The goddess must have sent help... {nl}Follow the pathway on the right to find the Vubbe Outpost.
{memo X}$Thank you for saving me. {nl}Seems like you're the Revelator who's looking for evidence of salvation. {nl}

$You came. {nl}First, let's clear the wagons blocking the way into the mines. {nl}

$The wagons can be demolished with these explosives that I have prepared. {nl}I'm concerned about the Vubbes that will come after hearing the explosion {nl}but with your skills, I think we'll be fine.
$I'll let you take care of the Vubbes. {nl}I have things to attend to inside. {nl}
$Thank you. Thank you very much. {nl}You're a savior of our village. {nl}
$Oh, have you seen a girl about 5 years of age? {nl}I heard she was together with them when the villagers were kidnapped.
$Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.
$Mine Manager
$I'm hanging on somehow but I'm losing strength in my arms.
$I should have been more careful. {nl}It's all my fault.
$I have my roots deep in hunting. {nl}Don't worry about me. Go look after the others.
$As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?

{memo X}$Aren't you a Revelator? The Goddess must've sent help. {nl}In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped and brought to the Vubbe Outpost. {nl}Please, I'm begging for your help.
Kind Owl Sculptor
There are so many wandering spirits these days.{nl}This really...
Big

What's the problem? {nl}Um... it's big, very big.
You saw it right?{nl}He is called Sequoia. {nl}He once protected us owls, but now...{nl}
Humans attack us owls.{nl}So a few owls have been destroyed and there are many people getting hurt.
That
There is an owl that knows well about this problem.{nl}But who was he..{nl}
Ah, I can't concentrate.{nl}While I am remembering it, can you take care of that Ellogua?{nl}I just can't remember easily.
We are made of ordinary wood so we are scared of moist and insects.{nl}We are keen to be broken as well.{nl}It would have been better if we were made of iron.
Thank you!{nl}I can't scratch my head because I am a tree..Hehe..{nl}

Instabilized Owl Sculpture

Sequoia is obsessed with vicious power.{nl}You face vicious power with divine power.{nl}Yes. We should face it!{nl}
Please gather wood pieces from the broken sculpture.{nl}Ah, the ones with the power in them. Select well.
My friends became ordinary. {nl}Yes. Ordinary wooden sculptures. {nl}They must still have some divine power left, for sure. I believe...
Okay. Good. This will be enough! {nl}We have enough materials. Good. Good..
Hm? Sequoia? I know it well. Big mouth, big hip..{nl}Look at this. Many of my friends fell down.{nl}Sequoia did this. That's right.{nl}
But, monsters are keep trying to take them.{nl}What was that? Okay. The Essence of Spirits.{nl}If you get them again, I will tell you. The Essence of Spirits. My poor friends!
They were very good friends. Bad. Yes. I mean those monsters.{nl}I will try harder for my friends. {nl}Yes. I look little confused..
Thanks. Yes. {nl}I will take you to a good place. For sure..
Gather them, and string them together and stab Sequoia.{nl}Then it will be surprised and run away.
You should succeed on your first try. Okay?
I sometimes miss it. The old Sequoia.{nl}Why was it possessed by vicious power? There is no way to know it. I am just sad. A lot.
Something's wrong. {nl}The Guide Owl is not in a good mood. I hope you go there fast.{nl}
Take that stick with you. They are my friends.{nl}I think you will need it from now on.
It will be okay. That owl is strong.{nl}It will be okay. It will be okay.
Guide Owl Sculpture
I almost fell into eternal sleep if it weren't you.{nl}Sequoia is our enemy now. Enemy!
Sequoia is not only owls' problem.{nl}It is attacking any living creatures!{nl}Please help us to defeat it.{nl}
If we let Sequoia act like now, all owls will be destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be full of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}
Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans, but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}
The memory of Sequoia and us together.. was it weaker than the vicious power?
Grave Protector Owl Sculpture
Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.
It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried hard to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to before..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything, just bring us the Essence.
The spirits that were wandering for a long time are like monsters.

Wow, you collected those Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl, it will empower your weapon with the power of spirits.{nl}I am not sure if that will result in a positive outcome... Only a goddess will know.

It is a personal matter, but there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}But, after it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident, it is obsessed with evil power.{nl}Please wake up that angry owl and persuade it to gain it's consciousness again.{nl}
If it doesn't listen to you..{nl}Then just destroy it and let it go to the goddess.
I will do anything to bring it back to it's normal status.
This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time, it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Many of its allies changed like that.{nl}
I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.
So you brought the power of spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of spirits into your stick.{nl}The stick with lots of spirits' power like this will be able to destroy Sequoia.
You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths, you must succeed this time.
What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}
That's a big problem!{nl}The Desperate Owl is there...
It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If Desperate Owl gets destroyed, then I..{nl}
Please..{nl}Please help Desperate Owl. {nl}
Desperate Owl Sculpture
It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}But, it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual so I feel relief..{nl}
Anyways, it seems that Sequoia when to Desperate Owl.{nl}I hope nothing happens..
I saw Sequoia was very angry and going crazy.{nl}I never saw Sequoia doing that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}So please help us!{nl}
Try everything we can.{nl}I need the blackened boughs.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.
Sequoia destroyed one of my friends, burnt this forest, and...{nl}
We basically have kind minds..{nl}I will curse Sequoia even at the moment that I fall into deep sleep.
This will be enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.
I made a stick with the curse from the blackend wood branches that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.
Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time, he was our friend...{nl}But we forgot those days.
It's good to see the forest in burning in flames.{nl}It's okay. It's not surprising anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with vicious energy was worse than this.
I hope the owls don't feel dissappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't defeated, but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}Especially the last two blows must have been fatal to it.
However, if we let Sequoia act like that, it will burn the whole forest in flames.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.
The scream from Sequoia is echoing even in my body.{nl}It wouldn't be difficult to defeat him now.{nl}You don't have time to waste anymore anyways.
You defeated Sequoia.{nl}It was once our protector, but it's death was cruel.{nl}The way we think about Sequoia.. You would never understand.
There are some purifying devices that doesn't activate right away. {nl}I've put in a guide for it so you just have to follow that.
$There is a shopping plaza in the lower part of Klaipeda. {nl} Stop by and look around if you need anything.
I just want him to run away far. {nl}Nah, in fact, I don't know. He was a really good friend of me..

Please check their status.{nl}Those soldiers should check them, so I am sorry..{nl}I will scold Bran.
What?{nl}These are the only carts that can function normally?
Damn. The materials and the equipments should come..{nl}Since I just can't wait, I should get some stems of Harming in the meantime.{nl}I feel dizzy already..
How should I scold Malt?
That's enough!{nl}I feel sorry to you.
So, does this mean that you will help me?{nl}Please get some claws from Velwrigglers at Rajuma Curved Path.

Where are the mushrooms from Truffles?{nl}Look closely at their horns. That is in fact a mushroom.

$Almost done.{nl}Please mix all the ingredients that you've gathered at the Altar of Harmony at Isdidu Fork.

$What was your impression, seeing the altar?{nl}I felt somewhat nostalgic whenever I see it.
$Anyway, after mixing this, the acidic solution will be complete!
$Please melt the thorny vines with this acidic solution.{nl}The thorny vines are located on the upper side of Isdidu Fork.
I hope Thorn Forest returns to what it used to look like.{nl}Birds are nowhere to be found right now.

$After the Demon Lord Bramble came to our forest, it became like this.{nl}I can't even remember the last time I heard the sound of a songbird. I miss the old and beautiful forest...
$Every now and then, I miss what the forest used to be.{nl}I also miss listening to the words of Goddess Saule.
Believer Virgis
$There's nothing that we can't accomplish with faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't accomplish, then it's because our faith is not deep enough.
Believer Nojus

Supplies Officer
I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received the list of supplies that is needed, but look at the number of supplies here.{nl}I can't manage them myself.{nl}
I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need the grass called Jilgyung.
The people in charge must have forgot about the support.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
Wow, so fast.{nl}But that's not an end.{nl}If it would be done with Jilgyung, than I could have finished it myself.
Meat is perfect to cheer us up. Meat.{nl}The cows that grew by eating apples will be good, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try to hunt for Tinis that have similar taste.
The number of supplies is not the only reason that I am not acting quickly.{nl}Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, zigris are doing that..
This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
So.. We have everything we needed.. I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Wait..{nl}

They are more than thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they take it away.
We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while.{nl}They will be scared to think about you.{nl}
We have everything we need now.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}Now, I am relieved.
Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigrises.. I want to show them how scary I am.
There is a flag at the Zigris camp which Vubbes installed long ago.{nl}Now zigris are at the place.{nl}I don't care about that, more important thing is..{nl}
They just stole all the supplies that I gathered hard! I can't forgive them.{nl}They must know the pain. Please burn down the flag.{nl}I will check the supplies again!
Hahaha! Damn Zigris!{nl}Fear me!
Damn, I am confused.{nl}I have so many things to do, but the number of monsters is not decreasing..{nl}Don't you think so? I should do the job, but those monsters..

So you finally came here.
Before we get into a real action, we should try destroying the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't just get into real action right now.
You are indeed growing.
You are indeed the person I was waiting for.

I am sure you can do it.
Examiner Owl Sculpture
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.

I will wait at the test site.{nl}Good luck..
You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?
Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
You passed the first test.
Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
You passed the second test.
It's gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Forecastor Owl.
Please go to the forest again.{nl}The person waiting for you is there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the sculpture together at the designated place.
Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please move forward.
You woke me up to take the test.
I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master. {nl}I can help you develop your swordsmanship {nl}Do you know anything about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can grant additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You learn attributes from each Class Master by paying the training fee in silver.
It'll make fighting a lot easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl}I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each Class Master by paying them silver.
So, do you finally understand about attributes? {nl}Now you'll be able to fight the enemies more easily.
How you become strong depends on what choices you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choices and thoughts.
Hey, good to see you! I am the Archer Master. {nl}Do you know anything about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each Class Master by paying them silver.
Mastering these attributes will help your skills in combat.
$Willpower is the force that creates magic power. {nl}For a wizard, there is no stronger weapon.
{memo X}The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.
$There are those who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl}It means that you should find something of value rather than readily throw your life away.
$A Ranger's arrows target many, not specifically only one.{nl}
{memo X}It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl}So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.
$One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl}If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need to.
There are different skills for each class, but you will be able to fight better when you learn it. {nl}Also, there is a lot of variety aside from attacking.
{memo X}What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, am I right? {nl}Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
$Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl}Please let the Battle Commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.
Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
Blackened boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
Others are violent as well, but Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
Jilgyung is all around here so you can easily find it.{nl}I will do other works first.
There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}8 big scoops will do.
We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's go steal the jars that Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
Monsters really like the Essences of Spirits.{nl}They become strong when they absorb the power.
If it goes wrong.. then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us. May the goddess bless you.
Nice to meet you, follower of the goddess. {nl}Do you have any knowledge in learning attributes?
Welcome, you who follow the goal of the goddess.{nl}Do you know anything about training your attributes?
Now do you understand what attributes are? {nl}Mastering your attributes will help you to defeat your enemies with ease. {nl}
Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl} How can you ignore people seeking help in the name of the goddess?
People are suffering in body and mind from the wounds of Medzio Diena.{nl}They need our help.
$I am sorry, but can you please find my companion Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do some research.
I don't know where he is gone.{nl}He will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
$Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I just need to find the rest of my research materials.
$Thanks. I was thinking that the Tontus may have swallowed them.{nl}I promise that I will return to the Research Camp if you find them for me.
{memo X}I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.
So this is all? Hmm...{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will now return to the Research Camp.
$Monsters will gain nothing by stealing these research materials.{nl}And yet, there are many people claiming that they lost their materials. Isn't it strange?
So you want to be our apprentice, eh?{nl}Do you know who we are?
We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
Good, good job. This will be enough.
$Now go get me some lime from the monsters that swallowed some.
After finish making this, I am outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here so long.
Good. Go meet my partner in Pillars of the Courtyard with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits well like us.{nl}
I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some of the firewood that is scattered on the ground.
Vincent

Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Royal Mausoleum?

Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zlugi ruins.
I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
It was a good study because of you.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. I feel angry about it.
Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for must be marked.

Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!
