What was that? I thought we just needed to defeat Thorny Bushes.{nl}It was tremendous!{nl}
Herb broker is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys are not good. Nothing to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets.. are you guys crazy to take those pets to dangerous battle field?
What is that defiant glare? {nl}You don't wanna accept that you are not skillful?
Okay. I like your attitude.{nl}But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. Then I will acknowledge your skill.
Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.
Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?
Good! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skill.{nl}Do not ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
Okay. You go back to Raimondas.{nl}Be confident.
Okay. Have you brought the evidence?
Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Do not forget.{nl}The newcomers these day.. I don't find any confidence in them..
By the way.. I don't see that hairy creature that you used to take with you.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morkos farm.
That monster looked like the monster you used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morcus farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you used to have.
Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If that is him, it's so pity.
Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.
No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...
Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...
Herb broker!! This is all because of the herb broker.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where is he, by the way?
It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, it's not that Spion should die.
Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{n}
Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.
I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.
We must concentrate on capturing those demons now. May the goddess bless you.
No one will help you even if you are defeated by Golems.{nl}You should save yourself.
Well done.{nl}I will take care of that myself.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice running away from now on.
I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}You follow me too. If you could help us, that will really help us out.
Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the goddess' blessing too much.
I know many people are missing, but no one tries to find them.{nl}They don't even know those people even existed.
We should make some money when the world is in chaos.{nl}Ah, never mind.
Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the stone with vigor.{nl}
It's fortunate that both of you are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the goddess bless you.
Good luck.
I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.
If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Habitat, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.
$The evil energy have caused the Guardians to break the stone plate which contained the rules of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the Guardians and bring back the pieces.
$Those Guardians are trying to break the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Stop them. They are out of control.
Everything at the Royal Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.
$With the Great King's will weakened within them, some Guardians now prioritize the Royal Slate more than the revelation.{nl}It's tragic.
The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.
$My wound is deep, so please pass the supplies on for me when you find them.{nl}You can find Kepeck at Apvija Hill.
$I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the Great King's spell, you need to be more than qualified.{nl}You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal.
$There's a white oak tree at Zeme Highland.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.
{memo X}
$This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.
$With this sap, I will prepare a crystal that can release the seal.{nl}In the meantime, please collect a bundle of Canyon Amalas at Pamirsit Highland.
$You need to get one that isn't poisonous.{nl}You may pass out for a while if you get addicted to it, so be careful.
$Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for it to be our generation to meet you.
{memo X}
$It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one can obtain it.{nl}The chosen one must possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
$Of course our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
$This is a sap that we've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after it.
{memo X}
It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.
I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the Great King's keys?{nl}
Okay. Now you need to find the map that indicates the seals' locations.{nl}There has been a lot of false information going around about its location, so you'll have to check various places.
This is something that should not be handed over to those demons.{nl}I don't know the exact location.
Nothing here.
But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map, so please check all those marked places.
You found it.{nl}The inheritance of Zachariel, the Great King, has been waiting for you.
{memo X}This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.
{memo X}
No antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}
We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
$The Revelator is here?! Thank the goddess.{nl}I am Rexipher, a historian. I am studying the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}
$We already have most of the answers.{nl}But for the last answer, I need to borrow your power as the Revelator.
{memo X}There are things that only Revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb..
It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is the blessing of the god.
$Alright.{nl}The next epitaph is at Shirnas Highland. Let's go.
$I wonder what they tried to protect by building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I'd like to see it with my own eyes.
$Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne Fork.
The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.
It was dangerous.{nl}But, we can't stop.
{memo X}
$What do I want to obtain from the Royal Mausoleum?{nl}That is a secret.
{memo X}$The ordeal of the Great King Zachariel is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.
$The last epitaph is at Apati Cliff.{nl}I hope the Great King Zachariel will understand our sincerity.
{memo X}Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.
{memo X}
{memo X}Is that so..{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}
$How about this, can you bring me the teeth of Hogma?{nl}I understand that this will take some time.
{memo X}I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.
$Oh, I didn't know I could count on you.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Historic Site.
{memo X}Explained about the writings on the epitaph.
Historian Odell
There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.
$Are you looking for someone?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?
$Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with that name on our list.{nl}You could try asking the other people to see if they know this Rexipher.
I searched the list and asked other people about it..{nl}But, there's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be of help.
$Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?
$He must have a lot of courage if he runs around with the name Rexipher.
$Hold on for a minute. I've seen this before from a book.{nl}Wasn't Rexipher a Demon Lord who is part of the army of Vaiga, the Demon King?
Using the name of a demon, that doesn't look like they have good intentions.
$Rexipher?{nl} The one with silver hair, wearing a robe?
$He is a crazy person who can control monsters.{nl}He's the reason I'm wounded like this, and he also destroyed the altar which I used for research.{nl}
$First, go to the Chesed Altar. {nl}He is also going for the Gedulah Altar.
{memo X}
$I caused you trouble.. I'm really sorry. {nl}
We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We should go after Rexipher.
The seals that haven't been destroyed yet at the King's Plateau will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you will have enough time to chase after Rexipher.
Please go to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We should find out what Rexipher has in his mind.
$As Laulas's injury are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?
{memo X}
$Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the nearest Tzedej Altar. It is on the way to Keturka Access Road.
$Ruklys committed treason, so his monument saw prejudice and neglect.{nl}It was broken into five pieces, which all disappeared.{nl}
$I am trying to find one of them via the Stumpy Trees at Balkonas Wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from that monster, we can make a divining rod to find it with.
$There's a piece below Seklus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.
$The Tree Ambulo that live at Gaisra Hall Site like to collect pieces of stone.{nl}Perhaps the pieces from the monument could be there.
Hmm.. Let's see.
{nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.
{memo X}$We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
$If it weren't for us, all of this forest would be covered with thorny vines.
$A human controlling monsters... That's the first time I've seen such a thing.{nl}Also, I don't understand why he even broke the altar.
{memo X}
Please get rid of those Tamas. I'm disturbed by them.{nl}Before I even know it, they're all surrounding me and staring at me.
{memo X}The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?
I guarantee you that Tama swallowed it. Do you want to bet?
It really exists!{nl}Is it worth a lot? I wonder how much.
{memo X}Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about we make money together?
I don't care what's it's used for.{nl}But I am glad that it is precious.
You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!
I saw fragments buried in the ground as I ran away from Tamas to Crossroads Vacant Lot. {nl}I am trying to negotiate with Raymond using those, so can you bring me them?
It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.
This is enough.{nl}I will be finished if I bring these back.
$Thanks.{nl}They even appeared in my dreams.
$I will pray for the goddess to bless you.{nl}You should stop him no matter what.
$I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult to find it all alone.{nl}I hope you can be an ally. Are you interested?
$He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of Earth Tower.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman, even when he was young, and many people followed him.
$He lusted for more power, so he started a coup d'etat.{nl}If the great Premier Eminent wasn't around, then history could have turned out much differently.
$Ruklys and I were taught by the same teacher.{nl}That's why I know what he was trying to achieve.
{memo X}We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
$This is almost like she's praising him. I need to get rid of it.{nl}Carrying something that praises the traitor may get me sent to prison.
$The fourth epitaph is at the Shiluma Altar Site and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve Highway. {nl}Let's say farewell here, since I should also check them myself from here.
$(You cannot read the rest because the gravestone is damaged.){nl}

$As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.
$If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken a long time ago when monsters attacked it.
$But, I have a rubbing of it.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.
$Thanks. As promised, I will tell you what it said.{nl}
$But I was ignorant then.{nl}I too might have believed in furthering only my own, personal goals.
$When you use this collecting device on those Stumpy Trees, their sap will be collected inside of it.{nl}Bring me their sap.
$I'll be counting on you. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Mountain Cabin. {nl}I will give you necessary tools, so bring their rubbings.
$My tower that will stand towards Goddess Gabija may carry the answer with it.{nl}But I will not be like my predecessors and let my personal feelings get in the way.
{memo X}When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
$The third epitaph is at Kriakul Brook.{nl}Let's continue the rubbings with that epitaph.{nl}
$I got my bag back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}
$Go to Pelena Site. {nl}On the way there, there is the next epitaph you are looking for.
$Let's see, it may take little time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I focus on this?
$Well done.{nl}It took a while because there was this small piece..
$It must be terrible to be remembered as a traitor.{nl}Even though he was a respected swordsman, the monument mourning him was shoddily built.
They even cast magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's hard to find those pieces because of the monsters that were affected by that magic.
Ah, That's the object I ordered.{nl}It finally came.
$Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbliai Pond.
Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry it.{nl}
It will be a pleasant experience.
$I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}You can find Lizardmen on the way to Dumbliai Pond, those will do.
$The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}Lizardmen are good for the experiment since they are very fast.
$The Lizardmen that you sent to me were really lively.{nl}Now, we are almost done.
$Infroburks play an important role in this spell.{nl}I will give you a stone that controls their minds, please bring me some Infroburk.
$The Infroburk you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
{memo X}Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}
{memo X}The Bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}
The monsters there are extremely dangerous so you be careful.
{memo X}All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Goddess Statue before you leave. {nl}
{memo X}Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.
You have so much curiosity.{nl}Okay. Bring me the weed that only grows at Kriakul Brook.
$Please use this stone on Lizardmen.{nl}After gaining control of one, it will run to me.
$The Kadumel Era was a period of turbulence.
Tyrant Kadumel, Premier Eminent who was renowned as the great chancellor, and the disciples of Maven..{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}
There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are many side stories of them as well.
$When you use the stone on Infroburks and defeat them, they will automatically come to me.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.
She is the most impressive archer in history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys, who was a traitor and a great swordsman, with a single arrow.{nl}
That's why all archers want to purchase things that are related to her, no matter how expensive.{nl}She is like a goddess to us archers.
$There was a priest named Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the Great Cathedral.{nl}
$Maven lived for a long time and had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
$And when Lydia Schaffen grew old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.
$She learned all the magic that existed then.{nl}She also built the Mage Tower. What an amazing woman she must've been.
$Our old man always complains.{nl}Even when I give him the best things, he complains.{nl}
$He always complains, so I don't want to help him.{nl}Sorry, but can you tell that old man there how I feel?
$When he first came here, he had a hard time adapting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him food and make him clothes..
$Why didn't Cahill come here, and why are you saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?
$Hey. Since you came, please do some errands for me.{nl}You see that pile of lumber over there? Bring me the good ones among them.
$Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..
$What?! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well.. that's still okay..
$Please give these crutches I made to Cahill.{nl}Well, where oh where did Cahill hurt his ankle...
$Get outta here before I change my mind.
$Crutches from Old Man Moses..{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.
$I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Flying Frogs near this camp.{nl}
I don't wanna know its use.
Darn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought me a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.
Believer Domas
{memo X}I am going to burn the thorny vines that are blocking the road.{nl}Can you help me?
Please get me Thornball Remains first. {nl}There are many of them at Geisma Access Road.
{memo X}There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous and it is at Thorny Pillar Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
Now is the time to defeat it.{nl}We spent a long time finding it.
$Fire will never catch on the thorny vines here.{nl}And I don't want to touch them due to their evil energy.
$Good job.{nl}I was worried that you would get hurt, but I guess I underestimated you.
$Four years ago, this forest was a normal forest.{nl}But it became like this after Bramble went deep into the forest.
Who would have thought that they would use the power of our own altar?{nl}I don't know how I can face the goddess now.
Believer Bronius
$I only survived because of you.{nl}I should warn the other Believers to be careful.
Believer Jurga
{memo X}$I can feel Bramble is suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
You're the Savior the goddess sent. What an honor. {nl} Are you ready to fight Bramble?
You need to be prepared if you want to defeat Bramble. {nl} First, take this.
It will be hard for Bramble to recover now.{nl}We can save the dying trees as well.
Try to hold it in even if it's dirty. {nl} This is the best I can do.
You found the revelation. {nl} Are you hurt? {nl}
Bramble. {nl} Poor thing trying to go against its fate.
$Old Man of Andale Village
$So you're the one who wants to meet Goddess Saule. {nl} If you're here about the Pond, don't worry. Our priest is working on it. {nl}
$The priest is at Cerpe Crossroads. {nl}I heard he needed Black Maize Venom, so try to get that to him as a gift.
We wouldn't have dreamed about the portal if it wasn't for you. {nl} You truly are the blessing of God.
$Andale Village Priest
$Aren't these Black Maize Venom? {nl} Oh, thank you very much! {nl}
Let me meet Goddess Saule. {nl} Now that the Holy Pond has been purified, we just need to solve the problem with the Obelisk.
Magic letters are carved on the Obelisk. {nl} But some letters were erased since the Holy Pond became corrupted. {nl}
$If the letters are gone, we just need to write them back on. {nl} Now that you've collected the Black Maize Venom, we just need the sap of the oak tree.
$We just need to restore the Obelisk to meet Goddess Saule.
$Please bring that venom to the Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.
$So you finished making the dye. {nl} Now please go and draw in new letters according to the faint patterns left on the Obelisk. {nl}
The Obelisk is located at Slepingas Stream.
I'm sure the goddesses will be very pleased with you.
$You're almost done. {nl} After completing the rituals to cleanse your body, you will be able to meet the goddess. {nl}
{memo X}
$Use this tranquilizer on the Black Maize and extract its venom. {nl} The Maize needs to be weakened for the tranquilizer to work.
Thank you so much! {nl}By the way, what was that vibration?
$Andale Village Priest
$You're the Revelator right? {nl}Upents are preying on the village so we can't hold the ritual right now. {nl}
$I'm thinking about making bombs from Languid Herbs. {nl} Please bring me Languid Herbs from Narvas Curved Path.
It is safe where the Languid Herb blooms so do not worry.
Glad you're back safely. {nl} Didn't the monsters attack?
$Please get the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers in Dvyni Wetland too. {nl} Languid Herbs alone will not be effective enough. {nl}
I hope we'll be successful this time.
$I'll do the ritual right away if you defeat the Upents.{nl}So, please get the strongly scented soul flowers.
$That'll be plenty. {nl} I'll send the materials to the elderly, so please go and get the explosives.
$Andale Village Headman
$Explosives? Ah. {nl} Go to the warehouse lot at the upper side of the village.
$It's probably in the bigger barrels. {nl} They won't explode, so don't worry.
$Don't worry, it's safe. They will not explode.
$It was in a small barrel? {nl} I must be getting old and mixed up. {nl} Normal people would have been incinerated, but a Revelator surely is different.
{memo X}
God or goddess, their title isn't really important. {nl} Eventually, aren't we all just one being? {nl}
Is this hard to comprehend? {nl} You will understand it one day.
Here, this is a Languid Herb Bomb. {nl} Take it to Melaginags Cliff.
Now, hurry. {nl} We can finally end it this time.
This time, it can finally come to an end.
Hmm. So. The procedure is. {nl} Wash your body in the water and pray, then.. {nl}
It's too complicated so I'll explain it later.
{memo X}
$'Is it alright to walk over the Goddess Statue?'{nl}I wouldn't mind it. Why do you ask?
$It will be hard without Coliflower Sap because of the rain.{nl}Who knows how long it will keep raining?
Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
$Using this, we can burn the thorny vines blocking the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}You should be able to ignite them even in the rain.
$Go up a bit more to get to the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}It was a real honor to meet you, Revelator.
{memo X}$You're the Revelator right? {nl}A very ominous voice is looking for you, so please be careful.
Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see my ring, please bring it to me.
That ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.
$You found my ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!
{memo X}$The priests are having hard time due to thorny vines.{nl}Can you help them?
$I will write down the process for you.{nl}How about you start by recharging the mana of the magic crystal?
$Okay, show me that you can overcome anything with your faith, such as facing those thorny vines.{nl}You can't call yourself a Believer if you are weak to that.
{memo X}
$I don't know if it's the thorny vines or the evil energy, but... {nl}this forest makes people very depressed.
$I personally believe that one day this forest will be okay again.
Are you okay?{nl}I almost lost my consciousness due to that voice.{nl}Who is he anyways..
{memo X}
$The evil energy is becoming stronger and the Believers are getting tired. It's a bad situation.
$Thanks.{nl}I wonder what would have happened if you weren't here.
$While the Merog Shamans are performing their rituals, you might have a chance to try something.{nl}Can you take care of them?
$Thank you for your help.{nl}Now the demons won't be able to act so freely.
$I did not know those demons could use summoning crystals.{nl}They may overwhelm us.
$I want to study the demon summoning circle that has been emanating evil energy and summoning demons over there. {nl} It's a precious sample, so please go gentle so you don't break much of it.
$We should be able to find a way to use it.{nl}Those demons used our altars, so we can use theirs too.
$Believer Onute
$The shamans are trying to summon Archon.{nl}It should frighten them if you can defeat Archon and destroy their summoning circles.
Thanks.{nl}They will not be able to attack us easily now.{nl}
{memo X}Thanks.{nl}The Believers are distributed to their areas so find them and help them.
$If you don't have anything to do here, then it would be best to leave this place as soon as possible.{nl}It's no good for a person who doesn't know how to purify to stay here for too long.
{memo X}
$Goddess Saule would not want the evil energy spreading to other forests. {nl} Therefore, we're here.
It angers me, to see those filthy demons freely roaming around.
$I gave up a long time ago since I can't see an end to that evil energy.{nl}I just think of it as my destiny.
$Now we just need to find out the Merogs' plan.{nl}Until then, please defeat those shamans.
$Goddess Saule said to absolutely not speak of our presence. {nl} She said it would unreasonably confuse the outside world.
{memo X}This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
{memo X}
I am okay about the sample so just break it so that it won't activate.{nl}I am gonna take a look at it myself.
$I get angry every time I enter that Thorn Forest.{nl}How could such dirty things happen to the goddess' sacred forest?
{memo X}$Help me. Merogs are after me.{nl}When they are grouped up like that, I can't face them.
Good. {nl} Now, we're going to destroy the roots of Bramble.
$Believer Samantha
Whenever I try to purify Thornbush Rest Place, those monsters attack.{nl}Is there some way to avoid them?
Monsters are becoming more violent as they enter deeper into the forest of thorns.{nl}Maybe that is because of the evil energy.
I can relax now and purify Thornbush Rest Place.{nl}Thank you so much.
I think I can count on you.{nl}Please protect the altar until the fountain is purified.
{memo X}$Put Merog saliva in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy energy of Bramble.
$Bramble is recovering by embedding his roots around the Thorn Forest. {nl} Cutting those roots will hurt him.
$You mustn't let your guard down, even if Bramble is weakened. {nl}After all, it is a Demon Lord, no matter how injured it is.
$Now we can make a full-scale attack on Bramble. {nl} I'll go on ahead to Giliaii Courtyard to keep an eye on Bramble, please come along.
$The most important roots are at Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot. {nl} Cut them both.
$Even after all of the vicious energy is removed, this forest will remain as it is.{nl}But someday, we will also end that.
$Believer Kazis
Somewhere hidden at Karadas Path is the Honeypin, but I can't find it. {nl} The purification work has been delayed because of that monster.
You just need to activate the altar of purification.{nl}Do this without letting the Honeypin know.
Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.
$Bramble and the revelation are in the depths of Giliaii Courtyard. {nl} It must be agonizing since the roots for healing the scars have all been cut off.
Do not forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in the evil energy. {nl} May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
Do not forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in the evil energy. {nl} May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
$If you feel you are in danger, quickly run away.{nl}The place is more dangerous due to the evil energy.
{memo X}
{memo X}$I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The Goddess Saule will guide me well.
$Achat is the faithful Guardian of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But, once it gets corrupted, it will never return to its original state.
$Broken Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
$Guardian Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
$Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
$The Guardians will cause disturbance when the magic that flows in the Royal Mausoleum gets disrupted.
Royal Mausoleum Guardian
Once a Guardian gets corrupted, it can never come back to its original status.{nl}Only in eternal slumber could the Guardian rest.
Ruined Guardian of the Royal Mausoleum
$Anyone who disturbs the King's rest, will meet his end here.
$I would rather choose to be destroyed by the Revelator than being corrupted by evil.
Revelator's name is gone and only demons' names remain.{nl}You should protect yourself.
I am keeping my eyes on Bramble after receiving the Goddess Saule's order.{nl}He is the source of all evil beings in this forest.
$It was a real honor to meet you.{nl}For your future, I will pray to Goddess Saule.
{memo X}Do not disturb Zachariel's rest
{memo X}I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.{nl}I will complete the jewel of prominence here and help the Goddess Gabija.{nl}
I hope the goddess stands still until then.
{memo X}Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
{memo X}I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
{memo X}You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.
{memo X}This is enough. Well done.
{memo X}Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}

{memo X}First, unleash the Flame Vapor from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the Flame Vapor will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that in the jar. Okay?
{memo X}Don't worry. It won't explode or hurt you.
{memo X}Hew.. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!
{memo X}I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
{memo X}Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
{memo X}Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
{memo X}Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
We will succeed..
{memo X}So this is the Jewel of Prominence.. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
{memo X}To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
{memo X}The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of demons' lord, Bramble.
{memo X}It's embarrassing, but I am also tricked and captured causing to lose my strength. {nl} Please destroy the magic circles imprisoning me.
{memo X}The binding magic circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and in Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry.
{memo X}Thank you for saving me. {nl}
{memo X}I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun. {nl} Everything is just like how Laima has forseen.
{memo X}Thank you. But this is not the only barrier imprisoning me in here. {nl} We've got to find the inspetor, Clymen, hiding in between the gap of dimensions.
{memo X}Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.
Thank you. {nl} This much divine power should be enough.
{memo X}
Just a little bit more. Please suppress the evil energy.
{memo X}
That's the key. {nl} Please let me free.
{memo X}Thank you in the name of Saule, Goddess of the Sun. {nl}
{memo X}It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of Bramble. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}
{memo X}But the Bramble is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the Bramble in the gateway with my Believers and get the revelation back.
Please show me the revelation. {nl} I will show you its meaning.
If any divine power is still contained within the shrine offering tools, then we can surely use it to find Clymen. {nl}
Lyliana
{memo X}
I really want to know how my family is doing, but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl} I just ran out of the house and I regret it a lot.
{memo X}
I just feel sorry to my brother.
$Old Man of Andale Village
God is looking after our village so our village has clear water and air. And there are no disasters here.
So finally the Revelator has come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. I gues we can do it this time.
Aren't you the Revelator? {nl} So, what brings you to our village? {nl}
Goddess Saule? {nl} We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
$The reason is that the portal leading to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
The Tanus in Zvelgian Vacant Lot carry Purifying Stones. {nl} Those will be able to purify the Pond.
$Just like there are many demons, the same goes for the goddesses. {nl} The five goddesses are just the ones who became well known.
$Our village serves the Goddess Saule, who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot through the portal, but one day that portal closed.
{memo X}I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
{memo X}When I gained my consciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
{memo X}Carvers should be careful not to exaggerate their skills. They should be humble.
$It is a good sign that you, the Revelator, came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
$Please come to our village.{nl}The villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
$The fact that we were able meet was through the goddess' guidance.
$Please refrain from thinking about any suffering. We have all received a blessing.
Trust the goddess.{nl}We can be together in the tree.
$We will be saved by sticking together.{nl}The goddess had told us to do that.
Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
{memo X}I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
$That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
$Demon Lord Bramble absolutely can never be forgiven.
$Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the Believers at Gate Route.
$Please be careful of the Beholder's tricks at Gate Route.
{memo X}I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
{memo X}The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
$It seems that the rain just won't stop. In fact, it rarely stops.{nl}Do you think this is because of the evil energy?
$These thorny vines just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's better than leaving them.
$Even if Bramble disappears, I think things are going to stay like this for a while.{nl}The entire forest is covered with thorny vines. And they are huge.
$You seem to live up to your reputation. {nl} The people in our village just cowardly, hoping that the goddess will take care of everything.
$By the way, did you see a young man from our village? {nl} I told him to go check if the portal is working, but I have not heard from him since then.
Thank you. {nl} The portal is at Nugria Sanctum.
Injured Villager
Thank you for saving me.
So you're the Revelator the headman spoke about. {nl} I'm fine, please check the portal up at the sanctum.
The portal can be opened from the altar at Nugria Sanctum.
It doesn't work? {nl} Well, that's going to be a big problem. {nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.
My injuries are not that severe, so don't worry. Please check the portal at the sanctum first.
I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}But first, the portal...
Ah, so you are the Revelator!{nl}It's a real honor for us.
Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just quit the purification process.{nl}Saule told us to do it.
{memo X}
We want to live quietly by serving Saule.
Royal Mausoleum Guardian's Stone Statue
The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are being ruined by the forces of evil.
$Guardian's Stone Statue
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Royal Mausoleum.
It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
Wheelen! Oh, my faithful Guardians..{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.
$Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But, if their loyalty is to the enemies, they are worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the Royal Mausoleum will lose the leash with the king's name on it.

Demonstration of Might! Does it sound beautiful..? {nl}Creating the gigantic guardians was what most satisfied the Great King Zachariel. {nl}Only those who defeat the guardians can acquire the royal treasure he hid inside them.
$Guardian's Stone Statue
{memo X}Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
Broker between the life and death of humans. {nl} That's what Bokor is, if you ask.
You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
There's no head of a Long-Branched Tree in here. Should I get it for them?
$Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl} We haven't had so many people come to town before.
$Did the goddess mention her whereabouts in the dream of revelation?
$Go ahead to Klaipeda. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you at the Central Plaza.{nl}
$I heard the bishop also had a dream about a goddess, so it probably has something to do with that.
That girl. {nl} She just appeared in town some time ago. {nl}
I mean she didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl} She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food and this happened.
I mean the girl who was confined together with us before. {nl} Do you think she has a family? It seemed like she could not speak at all. {nl}
If I was a parent, I probably would have gone around like mad looking for my daughter. {nl} Parents nowadays are really irresponsible. {nl}
The girl did not speak at all. {nl} In addition to that, a young lady all grown up walking all the way to this remote village barefoot. Doesn't it seem strange?
Can we go home..
I want to go home soon..
{memo X}
{memo X}Husband of refugee family
{memo X}
Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl} Would you mind visiting her?
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.
Accessory Merchant
Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the goddess? {nl} I'd like to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}
{memo X}If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope this will be useful for you.
You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here. {nl}
Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}Are you the person chosen by the Eyes of the Great King Zachariel?
Welcome.
Oh, it seems like you have some Jukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} Can you share some with me?
Thank you very much. {nl} I need these to treat the injured men in our village but I don't have enough.
I know you tried hard but I need some more.
I still need more Yukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl} But I don't want to just take them from you. What about trading it with the potions I have?
Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
Yukopus and Kepas appear around the Miners' Village.
{memo X}Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
{memo X}Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.
{memo X}Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
{memo X}I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the Bless of Goddess be with you!
I am looking for medicines to cure wounded ones.
{memo X}Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
{memo X}Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
{memo X}Ordinary Man
{memo X}This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
{memo X}Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
Bone fragments are seen in the well.
I'm furious and upset. {nl} If we got here earlier, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out ... {nl}
$Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover my comrades' mementos?
{memo X}It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
{memo X}Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
$Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all our food supplies. {nl} They even took our food for today... Please help us, we need your strength.
They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl} What will we do if we can't get our food back.. {nl}
Thank you. {nl} This will at least get us through the next few days.
Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more mementos that need to be retrieved. {nl} Think of my comrades who can't rest in peace.. {nl}
So please help us. {nl} If you can return the rest of the mementos to us, we will provide compensation.
{memo X}Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
{memo X}We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
{memo X}It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
{memo X}Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
We survived the immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl} Could you help us out a bit more?
I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
Thank you. {nl} We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.
Fedimian Resident
I heard the wise man Maven who built the Great Cathedral left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess a great power.

$Hey, if you are planning to continue your journey, don't get close to the Cursed City.{nl}It didn't receive a blessing at all on Medzio Diena. You will turn into stone if you get too close to that city.
{memo X}$It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.
{memo X}There is the Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven, beyond Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.
The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on Medzio Diena, so I wonder if there are people still going there, but...{nl}There once was a great many of people going there to do various rituals.
They call the trail to the Great Cathedral, Pilgrim's Way.
{memo X}$Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.
Klaipeda Peddler
$I came all the way from Klaipeda to pray. {nl} That another disaster never occurs, and that my son who joined the army will be able to come back and see me.
$My husband and I come here to pray every time we come here from Klaipeda. {nl} I know the goddess protected us during Medzio Diena, but I hope she can hear out at least one of my wishes.
Don't you ever think about going to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Besides the dangers due to its deterioration..
$Yes. If you want to go to the Great Cathedral, you have to pass through Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ah well.. the spirits of fallen Pilgrims remain over there. They probably prey on the travellers there.
Seal of Vubbe Tribe, Horn of Pantos, Heart of Merog, Teeth of Hogma. {nl} That is a lot! {nl}
The bootys that you've obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}How about we bet?
{memo X}
Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised/
$I have buried a Revelator once in the past.{nl}He burdened the goddess and placed too much faith in his abilities.
$It's frightening to think that blunder happened at all.{nl}I don't even know if I will have to bury another Revelator in the future.. I don't know about you either.
Are you proud of your skills to talk to me at this moment while the time passes?
{memo X}If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world..
{memo X}Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes..
Without the blessing from the goddess, You must be near the goddess now.{nl}But lots of people can't do that anymore.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}We can't revive the people who died by Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.
Innocent Spirit
Do not be surprised. {nl} There's something to give you before returning to the goddess. {nl}
I want to apologize to my sister who left house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl} Can you find my sister and give her this necklace for me?
My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl} Where is my brother?
Innocent Soldier
You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on behalf of me.{nl}Somehow, I can't move.
Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer..
Errand Man
{memo X}What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}
Wait a minute. No. No. {nl} Deliver this letter and I'll bump it. {nl} You just have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the letter.
Letter forme? What is this.. {nl}
Curse? I get it, I get it!{nl} I'll give you this money, so please tell him to not curse!
{memo X}huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
Oh, I really am thankful for your help the other time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
But, uh, I'm too hungry and I don't have the energy to go back to the captain. {nl}If you have anything to eat, can you share some, please?
Oh, thank you so much! {nl} I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.
Chicks.. They remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't wanna see him even in my dreams.
Hm, Okay. I have accessories that will fit on that.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the monsters nearby.
Not yet?{nl}They will fit on you nicely.
Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.
{memo X}
{memo X}The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Thank you. {nl} Our academia will not forget him either.
The Revelator who said such things lies at rest here.{nl}If you can survive after facing nearby monsters for 2 minutes, I'll be able to think differently from now on.
Next time, be careful when using public utilities. {nl} Well that's that and you have some great power.
Oh.. It's absurdity gets me at loss for words every time I look at it. {nl} Was it really this fragile..
This isn't good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.
{memo X}
I will pray for that monsterl.{nl}If there are spirits who would listen to my prayer..
Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl} He also probably won't know my whereabouts too.
I can't leave here unless I complete the mission..
He is so stupid. {nl} He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than getting on each other's nerves. {nl} Hmm. Maybe I belittled myself too much.
Don't you act like you know me anymore! {nl} It not my fault. That's the one who's bad!
Is it ready yet? {nl} I could eat anything to recover right now..
$Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.
Cyrenia Odell
Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?
$Oh? The woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release her as promised. Do try to keep her alive.
Sincerity is our strength. {nl} There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the goddess.
$My throat hurts.. I think being confined in there damaged my throat. {nl} I wonder about the girl who was with us? Where did she go?
Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl} We were more than glad to see you back then.
The goddess must have sent you.{nl}If that's not it.. we already.. It's too scary to think about it.
It was horrible in captivity. {nl} The Vubbes would come and smelled us.. {nl} and make us dig here and there using pickaxes..
Rexipher... Was he really a demon?
$You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl} But I have a question for you.
$Healing magic. {nl} Can normal people easily do it?
$Okay but listen to my story a little. {nl} When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}
$But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl} Even the wound disappeared. {nl}
$Strange huh? I made her a flower ring to give to her. {nl} But I don't know where she's went to.
{memo X}Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
Strange Sack
Found a letter in the sack
The letter in the sack
Receiver: Drasius{nl}Address: Virdului Mountain Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the Long-Branched Tree that you ordered.
$400 years would have passed by the time this revelation reaches you. {nl} Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding this revelation. {nl}

$As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of Rimgaudas, the first Paladin. {nl} If you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}
{memo X}The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
$There are two Demon Kings and one Demon Queen with many Demon Lords to serve them.{nl}Giltine is the one that rules over them all.{nl}
All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl} The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of the human race. {nl}
I am a very fatal existence for them as I can see all of this. {nl}That's why Giltine will try to revert me to the world's waters. {nl}
Also, they will extend their evil powers to the goddesses who go against their will. {nl}
But, disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}And it means that the hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}
Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl} Find her at the back of the light from the colorful valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.

{memo X}$The simplest forms are the strongest ways. {nl}If you want to study the roots of everything, take the path of Elementalist.
$Go straight down from Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.{nl}Go further right from Srautas Gorge and you'll be able to get to Gele Plateau.
$The Paladin Master is at Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get there by riding the cable car.
$This is one of the devices the first Paladin set in preparation for the invasion of the demons. {nl}Many like it are placed to cover the whole of Nefritas Cliff. {nl}
{memo X}$You must find Goddess Saule...{nl}The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation may refer to the upper region of Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.
$This is the holy weapon used to fight against Gesti in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}It has been handed down since the times of the first Paladin.
{memo X}$Go. the Tenet Church is located in Tenet Garden.{nl}You must prevent the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
$Find Gesti. {nl}the Tenet Church is located in Tenet Garden.
{memo X}There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.

You need to use the cable car to go from Srautas Gorge to Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard people used to hang baskets on ropes in the past, and use those to traverse the gorge. {nl}Well the cable car is scary enough for me.
$I came to protect this divine land from the demons. {nl}I heard that the Paladin Master is also in Gele Plateau. It must surely be a big problem. {nl}
$I'm worried for my brother at Nefritas Cliff. {nl}I hope nothing happens to him.{nl}
$We'll have to manage with the remaining dolls left. {nl}Everyone's lives are at stake at Nefritas Cliff so we can't complain about this, right?
{memo X}$And if you're talking about Rukas Plateau, it's been a while since we pulled out of that place as it wasn't worthy of research anymore.
{memo X}$Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.
$Bring the Seal Release Crystal and find Disciple of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge. {nl}He will teach you about the seal.
$The Netherbovines are becoming violent again? {nl}As long as us Rodeleros are standing ground, no monsters shall pass.{nl}
$I used to live in the woods, but I came out here to do what I can. {nl}I will do anything that can help.
$Physical enhancing magic is a profound and mysterious field. {nl}If you make good use of it, you can easily distinguish friends from foes.
$When a seal is released, you must advance to the next seal in Ramstis Ridge.
{memo X}$Death may be the price that I pay for the sin I committed. {nl}Even if it is the curse of the demons, it is still for a sin I made.
{memo X}$I don't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...
$Wait. Aren't those Succubus Eyes? {nl}Wow. How did you get them... Can I take a look?
$I've heard about those eyes. {nl}The Succubus craved the Great Cathedral's blessing that was hidden in a necklace, so she put it in her eyes. {nl}
$Did you know I used to be an aspiring Alchemist? {nl}I can turn that back into a necklace. {nl}
$Done. {nl}Do you know about the five necklaces of Maven?{nl}
$They were created to remind people of the five sins. {nl}Naktis caused them to look like curses on the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}
{memo X}Looks like the necklace belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, the teachings of Maven would have been left as a curse.
$To be honest, I'd like go to Kvailas Forest rather than staying here. {nl}I want to see the source of evil with my own two eyes.
$Thank you. The tools are sold by the blacksmith in Klaipeda. {nl}But before that, there are stones in Stele Road that are known for their quality. Please retrieve some for me.
$Done. Please place this at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Zachariel Crossroads. {nl}This should bring comfort to their souls.
{memo X}Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
{memo X}Please be careful. {nl}A dark energy similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially the Kvailas Forest.. I have sharp ears for things like this..
$The Necroventer that occupied Kule Peak is gone. {nl}Kule Peak should become peaceful again.
$This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries. {nl}So please handle it with care.
$This is it. {nl}Bring the Seal Release Crystal to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will welcome you there.
$The day of discovering the true owner of the Great King's inheritance has finally come. {nl}Hurry, meet the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.
$My teacher is poisoned and cannot breathe. {nl}Hurry and borrow an antidote from the others in Akmens Ridge.
$I had no idea it came from Rukas Plateau. {nl}What is he trying to do by releasing the seal? {nl}
$Follow the road on the right to go to Cobalt Forest. {nl}Our village priest there is waiting for you.
$When you have all materials ready, combine them at the Ershike Altar.
{memo X}The evil energy was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.
{memo X}The evil energy of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I hope you can help us. {nl}
$Perhaps the source of evil in Kvailas Forest has become the forest itself? {nl}I only hope this is just an ill-founded worry.
$Everything will be resolved when the evil energy deep inside Kvailas Forest is dealt with. {nl}It's a pity that everyone is only after what's right in front of them.
$Kvailas Forest is the worst. {nl}The evil energy is unquestionably concentrated and even your lives are at stake.
$I miss my family in Cobalt Forest. {nl}And... I want to apologize to my brother for the fight we had.
$I remember singing and soaking my feet in the stream waters with my older brother in Cobalt Forest.
$Can you inform the elderly in Vieta Gorge about this for me? {nl}If you veer left and move up from here, you'll quickly arrive there.
$The most important root must be somewhere in Kvailas Forest. {nl}Cutting off the head root will reduce the evil energy in this forest.
$I knew it was Evoniphon's poison. {nl}No one else would use a poison this strong.
{memo X}Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe. {nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.
$Is the antidote ready yet? {nl}The situation's grave. He is gradually getting worse.
$Evoniphon sure employed a vicious poison. {nl}We need to hunt him down before he causes more damage...
$Oh, is this the antidote? {nl}Thank you very much. I will let them take it right away. {nl}
$If it wasn't for you, many workers would have lost their lives for nothing. {nl}I will report about this to Sir Uska. {nl}Truly... You were sent by the goddess!{nl}
$The monsters in the Owl Burial Ground should be a fair bet for you. {nl}Right?
{memo X}The Chaparition in Escanciu Village took a lot of lives. {nl}Please defeat that monster in the name of the Goddess.

{memo X}I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
$Try and perform a killing spree of the monsters in the Owl Burial Ground. {nl}Around 40 of them? I bet you can't do it.
$I'll go to Ramstis Ridge and release the seals
$Let's go help Grita at Fedimian Suburbs

They are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger for Gaigalas.
This cable car does work. {nl}But the monsters around make it such a hassle to maintain it.
Can you take care of it?
$It's better to use the cable car rather than fighting your way past the monsters.
$I think there are monsters crawling out of the mysterious barrier at Nuotori Cliff.{nl}Is it possible for you to get rid of that barrier?
$With that barrier gone, maintenance will be a lot easier now.
Go down from the middle of Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge. {nl}Go further right from there and you'll get to Gele Plateau.
First, defeat the Hanamings around here. {nl}And gather Hanaming Petals while you're at it.
$Miners' Village is a problem but we also haven't gotten any rest from this endless skirmish. {nl}Defeating those Chupacabras would make it a lot better.
$Defeat the Vubbe Fighter. {nl}Search Scouts are on stand by in Nudegi Felled Area.
You need to cross Srautas Gorge to get to Gele Plateau. {nl}Go down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.
$You've came all the way here, for a mere meddlesome woman? {nl}Do you really want to save this woman that much?
We're looking for a stone with strange engraving like this. {nl}When you see a stone like this, please don't touch it and just let us know.
The Magic Suppressor of the Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed with the power of activation stones. {nl}Details can be found in the Magic Suppressor Manual.
We can't make it to Fedimian with the Cockatrices around the corner. {nl}Can you teach them a lesson on how scary humans are?
$Denoptic is trying to control the corrupted Guardians. {nl}Annihilate it so that the Guardians will not fall into its hands.
{memo X}Thank you in the name of the Goddes! {nl}Please defeat the filthy Cockatrice first that are spreading diseases.
Fight with the demons a bit then use the power of the barrier to extract their souls. {nl}Once severed, you can defeat their souls. Do you want to give it a try?
Our squad was given the order to hunt down the Unicorn. {nl}The details should be in the operation order...
My plan is to let you disguise as a demon. {nl} Please collect Pawndel and Pawnd's clothing first.
{memo X}Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}You must defeat those demons.
$I'm exhausted and want to rest. {nl}I just need a little time, do you mind taking care of the demons around here?
Defeat whatever demons you see.{nl}Only then can our brothers can feel safe to protect the church.
{memo X}I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.
{memo X}My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
{memo X}I am here and all over the world. {nl}I am collecting fragments of my soul which was torn into pieces long ago.
{memo X}Where are my other pieces..
I am Demon Lord Hauberk. {nl}Helgasercle tore up my soul. A part of me is in the barrier of this tower, {nl}and the rest was spread into the world.
$You still have business here?
$The altars here are defensive devices against intruders in the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}They should've been reactivated, but since they were built such a long time ago no one knew how.
$However, the seal at Rukas Plateau is the answer.{nl}The altar won't function if it is destroyed, but if we get to activate it before that...
$I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do, but it sure can prevent him from doing it.
{memo X}It's either Rexipher destroying the seal, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
{memo X}Aren't you hurt? {nl}Oh, that is the seconds hint of the King.
$The next epitaph is at the left side of Dykyne Fork. {nl}It'll be the third epitaph, right? I am looking forward to it.
{memo X}Finally, we've gathered all clues. {nl}Now we must interpret it.
{memo X}Then destroy the Royal Mausoleum Guarding device of Sesija Parvise.
Now, I need you to get Coliflower Sap from Coliflowers at Rustybe Dead Tree Area. {nl}The sap burns well.
Now, I will focus on finding Clymen. {nl} Please remove the nearby demons and suppress their evil power.
{memo X}I can feel Clymen in Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Hurry and defeat it.
$Please read the epitaph.

Allow me to introduce. This friend here is Wreath.{nl}Do you like birds? If not, you can never become a Falconer.
