I heard the sound of fighting so I cam here in a hurry..Have you defeated it?{nl}I only spotted Siaulambs.{nl}Well done. You have performanced a meritorious deed.
I feel stuffy.
If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble. {nl}If you don't want to, you may just go ahead to Klaipeda.
$Thank you so much for your support.{nl}Turn left at the crossroads ahead and follow the road. {-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
{memo X}Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
$For the next one, we will need to apply Hallowventer Charcoal in order to read it.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negyvas Field.
$We can suppress the evil forces if the magic of the Royal Mausoleum is released.{nl}This requires a number of activating stones located inside active Guardians.
{memo X}It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my consciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?
It may be better for Gabija to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a place where we can ignite a signal light. Let's go.
Good. Since she knows that we came, she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabija.{nl}
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting it on fire.{nl}Please defeat Mallardus, and collect their fat.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will, I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
{memo X}Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
If you are a true Revelator, you can find the divine secret at the end of this revelation.
$The Transport Magic Circle will take you to a floor of your choosing in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the magic circle anymore. Let's go and find out.
$Darn.{nl}They broke it. It is beyond repair.
$When you activate the Tower's Barrier Device, monsters won't be able to enter anymore.{nl}The magic power supply is currently broken, but we can input power to it through other means.
We have to be careful here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But, his ideology was too dangerous.

$The reason why he was imprisoned was because he was obsessed with using the concentrated magic power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower if hundreds of years of concentrated power exploded all at once?
$Goddess Gabija is important, but the tower is in more trouble now.{nl}Antares may already be up to something.
$There are two valves here that control the Magic Power Device.{nl}The first valve is at the Laboratory, so let's go and destroy it now.
{memo X}Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
$Antares researched the flow of magic power for a long time.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere.
$This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
$Please set this gem and defeat the monsters around it.{nl}We can collect their energy to use it to recharge the Barrier Device.
{memo X}A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
$Ah, that's right. Let's also prepare some defensive magic in case something happens.{nl}There was a spell written on Antare's materials that we can use to protect ourselves against explosions.
{memo X}I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.
$Good. We can use the magic once without problems.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve in the Central Control Room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
$The Jewel of Prominence is acting somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong during the explosion that killed Antares.
{memo X}Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
$What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very unstable.
{memo X}Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
{memo X}And me.. I feel dizzy..
$If it stays like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
{memo X}Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
$The Jewel of Prominence has stopped behaving erratically.{nl}But, in order to fully stabilize it, we need the Flame Crystals from the tower's Center Large Brazier.
{memo X}You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to Laboratory.
$Good! Now we can activate the device.
{memo X}You..are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
{memo X}Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.
$Only you can stop all that from happening. {nl}Please, come to the Karsta Hall Site at the Fedimian Suburbs.
{memo X}This is then entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all the power somehow.{nl}
{memo X}I will take care of you and take you to Gabija.{nl}Are you ready?
$All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are our last hope. Let's go.
{memo X}Gabija had not disappeared herself.{nl}To protect the tower from demons, she just could not appear.{nl}
{memo X}Agailla Flurry's is not found is successor, I heard and was borne away instead. To refer it's in order to ensure that a {nl} something important .. I don't know exactly.
$I was sealed when my spirit was ripped away by a high class demon.{nl}Please defeat Red Infrorocktor for me. I promise you that I will not be a burden to you.
$The Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Red Infrorocktor.
{memo X}Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.
Let's meet at the 1st Machinery Room. {nl}Ah, it would be better if you could get the Hardened Black Crystal from monsters.
{memo X}We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
Please go to the Sviesa Altar. I will follow you.
It's either Rexipher destroying the altar, or us activating the altar. {nl}Hurry to the Sviesa Altar and don't look back!
Looks like the necklace and collection belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, the teachings of Maven would have been left as a curse.
$Let's give up on this and go to the Large Transport Magic Circle at the center of this floor instead.
$It's not the first time the demons have attacked the tower, but the attacks never lasted this long. Because of this, they say that Gabija has disappeared.
$That was a trap.{nl}It seems they read our every move.{nl}
{memo X}There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it would be little late, let's give up on the magic field and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.
$The Defensive Barrier Device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs as soon as we activate the device.
$The Defensive Barrier Device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It still seems okay.
$Good!{nl}There won't be any more monsters now.{nl}
$Let's go to the next floor as soon as we can.{nl}Goddess Gabija is awaiting us.{nl}
The acid will be completed once I have some Poisonous Mushrooms from Truffles, which can be found at Isdidu Fork.{nl}I am counting on you.
We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
$We have no choice. We need to get more charcoal.{nl}Those Long-Branched Trees at Kriakul Brook will do the trick.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
$Didn't I tell you back at Fedimian that there's a way to defeat the demons?{nl}We can complete the Jewel of Prominence here to help Goddess Gabija.{nl}
{memo X}Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
$For now, let's fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor which possesses magic in it at the reading room.
{memo X}You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.
$This will be enough. Well done.
$Now we have to fill the Jewel with the Essence of Fire, it'll be a little complicated.{nl}

$Start by unleashing the Flame Vapor from the Jewel of Prominence.{nl}The Flame Vapor will collect the Essences of Fire that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill the Jewel with it. Got it?
$Don't worry. It won't hurt you or explode.
$Phew.. {nl}We've almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!
{memo X}I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
$Gabija will recover her energy if we can complete the Jewel of Prominence.
$Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the Flame Sources into the Jewel.
$Let's go to the Fusion Machine.{nl}We just have to put all the materials in it and the Jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
$So this is the Jewel of Prominence. I can feel its great energy.{nl}Let's hurry and give this to Gabija. There's a stairway up on the right side.
$To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the Jewel's location, the Jewel will appear.
{memo X}The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord, Bramble.
{memo X}I am Saule, the Goddess of the sun.{nl}Everything is just like how Lamia has forseen.
{memo X}It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.
$Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.

{memo X}I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
This place is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
We came here from the Vubbes' attack.{nl}But, this place seems to be not safe.
The demons had been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl} Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
Alright, I will tell the troops to assemble
{memo X}Notice/!/Jonna Jolem appeared with the treasure box from the marked place.{nl}Defeat Jonna Jolem and find a clue to open the box!#7
{memo X}Notice/!Unknocker suddenly appeared!{nl}Unknocker might have the research data! Defeat Unknocker!#7
Gorath's Concern (3)
{memo X}Deliver the activated stone/MAKING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
{memo X}Check Monument/READ/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
{memo X}Notice/!/Grita is looking at the magical circle.{nl}Defeat the monster that were interfering.!#5
{memo X}Notice/!/This device is suppressing the spell of the tower.{nl}Better destroy it quickly.#5
{memo X}Working on the copy/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_lineup001/1/MID
{memo X}Checking/MAKING/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_lineup001/1/MID
To Starving Demon's Way
{memo X}To Pioneering area of Gytise
Talk to Knight Titas again
You dreamed about the goddess telling you to go to Klaipeda, but Knight Titas is asking you whether you could tell the order of gathering to them. Talk to Sir Titas again.
Extinguished the research diary on the fire place
You burned all diaries to calm his soul. Talk to the spirit of the adventurer, Varkis.
Meet the Blacksmith of Klaipeda
Meet the Blacksmith of Klaipeda as Pipoti has told you.
Before you release the important seal at Ramstis Ridge, you should first talk to the Disciple of Gustas.
As the goddess told you in the dream of the bishop, you should first go to Crystal Mine, but you can't just see and ignore the villagers who are evacuating. Let's help the angry hunter.
Talk to Vaidotas in Crystal Mine 1F

{memo X}Grita said in order to activate the Tower's Barrier Device again, it would need a great amount of energy. Set the gem Grita gave you on the ground and recharge the gem with the monsters' life force.
You recharged the gem with the monsters' life force.  Talk to Grita about how to activate the Barrier Device
Activate the Barrier Device
The Barrier Device is located at the end of this left hallway.  Activate the Barrier Device.
You successfully activated the Barrier Device. Talk to Grita again.

Follower Donatas told you to gain some confidence by defeating Pawndel and Pawnd, so that you can transform into a demon using the demon transform scroll.  After transforming yourself into a demon, talk to Pawndel and Pawnd, lure them to Apsauga Altar and defeat them.
$Ask Historian Cyrenia Odell about Rexipher's whereabouts
Activate the Sviesa Altar before Rexipher does
Go to the Sviesa Altar to activate it, preventing Rexipher's plan before he does it.
Fortunately, it seems that you protected the altar. Return to Cyrenia Odell.
The Tzedej Altar has been destroyed, but you successfully activated the Sviesa Altar. Talk to Historian Cyrenia Odell.
Obtain Mallardu Fat
Rexipher kidnapped the historian, Cyrenia Odell. Go follow Rexipher to the Zachariel Crossroads.

$After you defeated the guardian of the Royal Mausoleum at Sesija Entrance as Rexipher ordered, Rexipher disappeared through the parvise. To find Cyrenia Odell, you should go through the parvise after Rexipher. He must be not far away.
Restore the monument of Ruklys

The Highlander Master is telling you that since you broke the practice wooden seal, you should pay for it by repairing it. First, obtain the woods from Firents at Nefritas Cliff, the rope from the Panto Archers that are the materials for the repair.
Obtain %s from Panto Archer
$Defeat Red Infrorocktors
$The Sealed Stone told you to defeat the monitors for it and that it won't bother you afterwards. Defeat Red Infrorocktors for the Sealed Stone.
$You defeated the Red Infrorocktors as the Stone wanted. Return to the Stone and talk to it.
$Obtained the Sealed Stone's Voices by defeating Armas
$The Sealed Stone told you that its other spirit lost its voice and wants you to retrieve the voice. Collect the Sealed Stone's Voices from Armas.
Defeat Gray Golem
As a suspicious desk has told you, the Gray Golem is chasing after you. It will be better to defeat the Gray Golem first.
$Furry Odd told you to meet at the 1st Machinery Room and asked you to bring Hardened Black Crystals. Obtain the Hardened Black Crystals from the monsters nearby.
$Meet Furry Odd in front of the 1st Machinery Room.
$You have obtained the Black Crystals. Meet Furry Odd at the 1st Machinery Room.
The Stone Whale that was protecting Hauberk woke up. Defeat the Stone Whale that is holding the soul.
Watcher Basil told you that the Panto Wizards at Valio Mountain Cabin Hill are looking for the rope that is needed to restore the shaman doll. He told you that if words are not enough, use force.
Obtain %s by defeating Panto Wizards
Talk to Goddess Saule
It was Goddess Saule who was restrained by the demons. Talk to Goddess Saule.
As written on the revelation, go through Naslaite Cliff Path and arrive at Veja Ravine.
Reduce the monster's HP below 50% and lure it near the Tree Root Crystal, so that it will start to react.
{memo X}The assistant commander Volda asked you to defeat the dumble ball which Siaulambs consume. Find the dumble ball at the old wooden box in the 4th supplies' warehouse.
Find the person who knows about the epitaph of Agailla Flurry and listen to his request.
You found the Villager's Bag. Return the Villager's Bag and ask him about the contents in the epitaph.
Defeat the Blue Woodspirit that appeared near the Obelisk
$Goddess Saule lost the revelation from Bramble at the Thorn Forest within Kvailas Forest. Help the believers at Gate Route and Sirdgela Forest and look for the revelation at Kvailas Forest.
Go down from Twin Bridge at Miners' Village to get to Srautas Gorge, and then take the cable car from Srautas Gorge and go up a bit to get to Gele Plateau.
Move to Starving Demon's Way
Move to Starving Demon's Way
Move to Starving Demon's Way
You should go past Starving Demon's Way in order to get to the Great Cathedral by following the revelation. Help the people having troubles at Starving Demon's Way after going past Fedimian.
After going past Fedimian, in order to go to the Great Cathedral, you need to past Starving Demon's Way. Help the people having troubles at Starving Demon's Way.
To Demon Prison District 1
Move to Demon Prison District 1
Move to Demon Prison District 1
In order to enter Demon Prison, you should go past Gytis Settlement Area. Help the ones that are in trouble to go to Gytis Settlement Area past Klaipeda.

$Anyway, my guess is that the demon is re-awakening and is controlling the Vubbes.{nl}The bishop's dream and the legend of Cunningham... I feel they may be a sign that something huge is about to happen.{nl}
$Finding the cause of the monsters is important,{nl}but I'm more worried about supplies not making it to the Miners' Village.
$The Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
$If you ever face us as enemies, you should be careful not to lose your legs.{nl}Swords are still able to lash out from under our shields.{nl}
{memo X}I heard the monsters are moving in herds outside Klaipeda.{nl}Instead of defeating them all at once, it will be better to learn my skills.
I think, these words are indicating a very dangerous monster.{nl}Don't you think we should eliminate it?
Ah, if you don't have confidence, the possibility of getting caught is high.{nl}Before you use this scroll, it is important to gain some confidence by fighting against the demons.
I feel happy to see them being defeated.{nl}But, I think I need to research this more.
You should get ready before you take the Light Crystal to the entrance.{nl}It could attract a powerful monster.
I feel relieved to have you here.{nl}I feel that the fact that Laima has chosen you is very fortunate.
$That explosion was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy these valves.
There are many things we need to concentrate on protecting, {nl}so we should defeat the demons quietly without causing alarm.{nl}I feel so relieved to have you here, Revelator.
{memo X}There are rumors about Golems appearing so don't go far too deep. {nl} It will be safer to take the bigger roads where there are less monsters or just head straight to Klaipeda.
$You are easily exposed to enemies' attacks when using a bow.{nl}Our strategy is to use anything be it a shield or stones to protect ourselves.
I have already memorized most of them, but the ones left are really important.{nl}They contain information on how to enter the Royal Mausoleum and such.
This map marks all the locations of the sealed devices at Tiltas Valley.{nl}When you release all those seals with the Great King's key, you will know what to do next.
$The artifacts Raymond is looking for are not there, so I don't understand why he keeps trying.{nl}I personally think the Tama swallowed them. {nl}What do you think?
$Can't you see what they're worth? I mean the sap, from those Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about it, why don't you try getting some?
Well done. When you wear this armor, it will be very useful at the crystal mine.
Varkis' Spirit
{memo X}That is my adventure journal.. lots of my diaries are hidden at Rukas Plateau besides that..{nl}I want you to retrieve those..
{memo X}That object is not useful to me anymore now..{nl}If you could find those diaries, I will make you the completed version.
{memo X}Here it is..{nl}The completed version.. I will leave now..

The one who fell while researching..{nl}Gone back to the goddess by becoming a part of the canyon.{nl}Saddened mind would penetrate the gold stones, the liquor that is poured would permeate onto the ground for tears..{nl}
{memo X}Notice/Unfortunately, Varkis passed away. {nl}But, if you go to Varkis' camp, you will meet his spirit#5
$The Eternal Adventure (1)
{memo X}Notice/It is written that the next material is hidden on the way to the neck of the snake cliff!#5
$The Eternal Adventure (2)
$The Eternal Adventure (3)
{memo X}Notice/The spirit of Varkis has disappeared after leaving the completed research material!#5
$The Eternal Adventure (4) - Deleted
Tell her that it would be better to take some rest here
$It would be better to stop the attacks destroying the Royal Mausoleum.
{memo X}Notice/The portal has opened after activating the device!{nl}Check the location of the portal from the map!#7

The search team told you that Vubbe Warriors are at the felled area, but it would be better to wait for the reinforcement. But, since you should go to the Crystal Mine as quickly as possible, let's first defeat those Vubbe Warriors.
Retrieve the Research Materials from Varkis' lost bag
The adventurer Varkis told you that monsters stole the bag and ran away. Retrieve his diary by finding the bag at way below the Shirnas Highland.
{memo X}Go to the camp of adventurer, Varkis
{memo X}The gigantic monster was defeated, but Varkis passed away. Returnto his camp with the diary.
Go to Camp of Varkis
Varkis passed away. Return to the camp where Varkis used to reside and meet his spirit.
Collect Varkis' Research Materials at Dykyne Fork
It seems that Varkis still has some regrets concerning the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at Dykyne Fork.
Collect Varkis' Research Materials at Neck Cliff of Snake
It seems that Varkis still has some regrets concerning the research that he used to do when he was alive. Collect his materials at Neck Cliff of Snake.
Look for Varkis' Research Materials near Apati Cliff
Monsters are attacking. You better defeat them quickly.
It seems that Varkis doesn't have regrets concerning his research anymore. Talk to him again.
It seems that the newcomer seems to be in a trouble. You better help him out.
{memo X}The unstable owl told you that it would be better to face Sequoia with divine power. Let's collect the wooden pieces with the divine power of the broken owl sculpture in them.
At the end of Stone Pillar Hill, the portal that leads to the secret location of the Royal Mausoleum was opened after releasing all the seals! Use the portal to go to the secret place.
Treasure Hunter Eden is saying confidently that he is sure that the Tama swallowed all the artifacts. Defeat Tamas and look for the artifacts.
I am sure you are competent enough.{nl}Everything was guided by the goddesses.
$The gold that the monsters in this area have will be enough.{nl}Bring it to the herb merchant at Kapas Highway.
I feel dizzy.{nl}What am I doing here?
I wish the goddesses were here.{nl}I don't want to see anything sad anymore.
{memo X}Is this slate the evidence of salvation?{nl}It just looks like an old slate to me.
Don't waste any time.
Of course, you should first show your skills.{nl}Defeat Desert Chupabras and Zinutes.
If you are going to help me, please also take care of the Large Gray Chupacabras.{nl}They often steal the supplies.
$When you defeat Chupacabras, a Large Gray Chupacabra will appear.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.
$I can charge more to get everything else back in order, but that toolbox... {nl}That Moa took the heart and soul of a stonemason...
$I thank you in the name of the goddess!{nl}We should first eliminate the filthy Cockatrices that are spreading the disease.
You better eliminate the severed souls as quickly as possible.{nl}Wouldn't it be scary if they resurrected again?
The attacks from the demons are quite aggressive.{nl}I think they would be discouraged if we could somehow defeat the Glizardons...
I would like to ask you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they are quite a nuisance.
Activate the Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}When you defeat those demons, the altar should absorb their power.
Let's keep an eye on the Jewel of Prominence while we defeat monsters.
I can't tell my name. {nl}Please defeat the observers and unleash the seal on me.{nl}
{memo X}My soul is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
The Holy Ark that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Ark.
We Watchers love to fight.{nl}The Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the demons are waiting to march in.
If possible, I want you to defeat the Wild Carnivore as well.{nl}It is corrupted with the demonic energy and I can't stand it anymore.
Tools for stonemasons? {nl}10,000 silver will do.{nl}{nl}
Welcome.
It was made long ago, but they will break any stone.
$You'll need to find the keys capable of releasing the last seal.{nl}This scroll will open up spatial chasms. Be careful because it's unpredictable what can come out of the chasms.
Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
We will be ready when we rub the monster poison on the Spiritual Stones.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait at Alkune Stairway.
Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monsters at Odega Uphill.{nl}They disturb my research.
$A monster in disguise as a Goddess Statue. I pity the souls who were deceived. {nl}Now those souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.
$We didn't just stay put when we were held down by the monsters. {nl}We sent out Scouts to look for ways out of here but no one came back. {nl}
$If you are okay with it, I want you to search for them.{nl}
$It's going to be hard.{nl}The Thorn Forest keeps growing.
$A dark energy similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially Kvailas Forest.. Please be careful.
Good. {nl}First, defeat the Big Blue Griba up in the hills.
$When you throw this bomb at the Long-Branched Trees, they will light up.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy them to get charcoals.{nl}
$Be careful. This place is full of evil energy from Bramble.{nl}You better go back to be safe.
$Ah, it's you, Revelator! Could you help me?{nl}I am trying to burn down the thorny vines that are full of evil energy.
$There is a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}This monster is called Rikaus and it's at Thorny Pillar Garden. It has been spreading an evil energy.
$I heard a very ominous voice. It was a voice searching for you.{nl}Please be careful...

$I never thought I would meet someone other than a Believer in this place full of thorny vines and monsters.{nl}It's difficult without the protection of the goddess. Don't you think so, Revelator?{nl}
$Just as I thought. We the Believers are also having a hard time due to the thorny vines.{nl}Can you help us, please?
$The evil energy was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.
$The evil energy of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our Believers are becoming weak. {nl}I am worried that we may lose to the forces of evil. If only the Revelator was with us...
$Really?{nl}I will let the other Believers know that you are helping them.
$Help me, please. Infro Holders are chasing after me.{nl}I don't stand a chance the way they're ganging up on me.
$Put the Matsum's Flower Stamens in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand Bramble's evil energy.
This place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.
Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Please defeat it.
$Bramble..{nl}It is a pity that it went against its own fate.{nl}
When I regained consciousness, a few hundred years had passed.
Jane's Spirit
I saved nothing.{nl}Master, Mage Tower, and my peace??nl}
You have no reason to help me, but it's been such a long time that I saw a man alive.{nl}Can you listen to my story if you are okay?
Thanks. It's going to be a long story.
It's too selfish to seek salvation now.{nl}Exhausted. It may be better to eliminate Archon with me.
Salvation.. Would I be able to have hope?{nl}Then, I will count on you.{nl}

You gotta find a way to block the magical power that will be injected with the magical stone of the interaction.{nl}If we could find the documents that Valius left at Beiniki Prayer's Room, it may not be a meaningless dream...
Salvation. That's the word that I forgot for a long time. I thought hope was extravagant.{nl}All I could do was just depress for a long time.
Okay. Was the document present?
Magic generating stones.{nl}They are at the room of senses and the room of rituals.{nl}
I know the basic composition. I've researched it when I was alive.{nl}But, it won't react if it's not Valius magical power.
You can find the artifacts of Valius from Vebaiki Burial Chamber.{nl}The magical power would still be there since Valius was a great wizard.
I am sure the magical power still remains.{nl}There's no other way so I hope it still exists.
It's fortunate that the magical power still remains.{nl}First, let's stop the magic generating stone near the room of senses.
I hid the magic generating stones among the fakes in the room of senses.{nl}But, with the brooch you found, you will be able to distinguish the real ones from the fakes.
Keep this in mind. Pick out the real magic generating stones and stop the magical power.{nl}If you touch on the fakes, all magic generating stones will be activated again.
I felt earnestness for the first time in hundreds of years.{nl}To prevent it from ending meaninglessly, I will pray to the goddesses.
The magical power that came from the room of senses has completely disappeared.{nl}Now, we just have to block the room of rituals.
The room of rituals is slightly different from the room of senses.{nl}Although, they are the same that you have to shut down the magical power of all magic generating stones.{nl}
You will know how to handle it when you control it yourself.{nl}But, if you feel something went wrong, use the magical power of Valius.
With the warp magic circle under me, you could quickly go to the room of rituals.{nl}I hope you are successful...
The magic generating stones in the room of rituals affect the other magic generating stones nearby.{nl}We could start over with Valius' magic.
The magical power that was supplied to the magical stone of the interaction has been completely shut off... {nl}Do you think we can really wish for the salvation.
We are all ready. But, that Archon is different from the Archon from your era. {nl}It may be better to leave it like that.
We have an other way. The sealed artifact among Valius artifacts...{nl}I heard there are some of them in Uzdaromo stone chamber that were created to suppress the demons.
I already gave up the hope that I would be free a few hundreds years ago.{nl}In fact, I still can't believe it.
The seal that is suppressing the demonic energy... that's it.{nl}Now everything is ready.
Now, when the magical stone of the interaction stops, I will be free with Archon.{nl}
I will tell you one more time. You should not think of Archon that was present in your era.{nl}It will be hard without using the seal.
In fact, I am okay even if I disappear like this.{nl}It's so thankful that you care for me, but I don't want you to get hurt.
We are almost at the moment of being released from the restraint that was on us for hundreds of years.{nl}
I can be saved. I... finally...{nl}I can't thank you enough.{nl}
I will now leave to the goddesses.{nl}Thank you. Thank you so much...
How's going?{nl}We can alleviate the strange energy in this region when we enhance the magic circle.
{memo X}If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
{memo X}The objects are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Fork...
I don't have regrets anymore... but, be careful about that man.
$Let's see, while I am cleaning this...{nl}Sorry, but can you take care of the tablet at Gruitis Hall with the brush and rubbing tools I brought?
Will be wandering when the string of the destiny disconnects...{nl}It must mean Goddess Laima... But there's a rumor that she appeared... It's complicated.
$When someone is born with a silver spoon in his mouth, life will be good for him.
{nl}What, what the hell...
$It's too soon to give up now.{nl}When I went to Vseio Cliffs, I saw one more tablet.{nl}
$However, it seems that normal ink won't catch well on it due to the mosses.{nl}Craute Grass juice should solve that problem. But I forgot to bring some as I came back.
$Don't assume all forecasts by oracles are predictions of the future.{nl}Sometimes, they could help us determine what's right and wrong in our lives.{nl}
$Is it complex? Yes, but you will soon know.{nl}You will soon find clues about the very fabric that weaves together this interwined world.
$When you get enough Craute Grass Juice, use it to rub off the mosses on the tablet at Vseio Cliffs.{nl}It is famous for having a smell that lures monsters...but my assistant here is strong, right?.
$When you rub the grass juice on it, you should see the effects right away,{nl}but you should still let it sit for a while. The mosses will go away eventually.
$It wasn't effective? I guess the moss isn't normal moss.{nl}Hmm. Then I guess I should go ask Vaidotas. There must be some way.
$Alright then I'll be going now. {nl}Oh, can I ask you to get bone powder from the monsters here?{nl}I need something that helps ink adhere well.
$Fortunately, Vaidotas gave me something nice.{nl}He said to use this special ink with the bone-powder adhesive.
$Okay. I want you to get the last rubbing with this.{nl}My legs ache since I traveled so far...
$I have a good feeling about this one.{nl}Do you think we may be able to find a decent forecast this time?
$The world for the dead of the dead should also exist
{nl}Dead of the dead? This... This may be just the forecast I was looking for.{nl}
$I should do more research on this forecast. {nl}Thank you so much!

While I am interpreting this, I will give you the rope with a magnet so please go to the well with that.{nl}I saw a Metal Plate on the floor. If that's the plate, it will come up after being attached.
There's no strange reason.{nl}The people used to live here even before the empire was built here.{nl}
A small village becomes a big village and then a city...{nl}And then it will be forgotten.
I told you a while ago, but if possible, I would have pulled it out.{nl}Please beware of the surroundings near you.
Difficult, difficult...{nl}The words are hard to understand.
I guess it was the Metal Plate.{nl}It was lucky that the well was dried... If not, it could have been horrible.{nl}
I will organize them and show you later.{nl}You are the Revelator. They will help your journey to find the goddesses.
It seems that the Metal Plates that you've brought can't be worked due to the rusts.{nl}Why did they record on the Metal Plate...
In fact, I didn't know what this Metal Plate was.{nl}Since this place is the hometown of Demetrius, I came here expecting something may be present.{nl}
Nothing was engraved on it, rather it was full of rusts.
At then, my eyes were ignited with flame.{nl}Demetrius has something to tell you.
Yes. Now is not the time to just complain. First, I should make the rust remover.{nl}I want you to obtain the inner core of Hallowventor Magician.
Defeat the rusts with the rust remover and maintain it with the anticorrosive agent. {nl}If it weren't you, I wouldn't have done it.
Fast indeed.{nl}Okay. I will make the acidic solution with this. It will become the basis of the rust remover.
Secondly, when we sprinkle the rust powders, some monsters react.{nl}Collect some boiling liquid from that monster. A lot of it.
Ah. If you sprinkle it too much, it may endure all the monsters nearby.{nl}
I went to meet Alchemist in Mine Village because of Rust Remover and Acidic Solution.{nl}He was being so arrogant...
Well done. {nl}This place is almost completed so go help Alruida near Apsuba Hall.
Ah, I forgot to tell you. {nl}He is my ally. He is probably looking for the Metal Plate at the great hall.
Alruida
You came here since Justas told you to help?{nl}I was tired as hell so I really welcome you.{nl}
First, we should look for the Metal Plate at the great hall.{nl}Shall we start?
Someone should research at the camp and the other person should look for the Metal Plate.{nl}That's why I am here. I am not a coward like Justas.{nl}
Now, I know all the locations of the Metal Plates, but I can't do anything about the monsters.{nl}It is so fortunate that you would help me. really.
This reaction reagent only reacts to the Metal Plates from the specific era.{nl}The Metal Plate that shows boiling response is the one that we are looking for. You understand right?
We gotta distinguish the real ones by finding out when the Metal Plate was created.{nl}We should look for the Metal Plate that was built before the establishment of the kingdom.
The next one is at Apsuba Hall.{nl}The Metal Plate is under the bushes in the corner, but I can't do anything about it myself.
Originally, it was forgotten and was deep in the ground.{nl}But, Medzio Diena was in fact beneficial.{nl}
As the land caved over, they were carried away to the various places in Istora Ruins...{nl}That's our prediction.
Be careful all the time. The monsters here rush in scarelessly.
It is a disaster to someone and it is a blessing for the other.{nl}I can remember the words from the old literature.
Oh! That's it. Give it to me. Let's see... I should first make it corrode.
The Metal Plate that you found for me a while ago... I think the next part is remaining.{nl}The Metal Plate that I know is that one so I don't know what to do from now.{nl}
Ah, there is one place that I haven't searched yet. Polsas Highway.{nl}Could you go there for me?
Bring this detector.{nl}From the place where you can feel the reaction, the Metal Plate must be there.
That's it! Now we found all the records.{nl}You've done it well. Now, I should sprinkle this rust remover so give it to me.
As I expected, this Metal Plate was the last one.{nl}Now we've collected all Metal Plates... I think I know what's written on them.{nl}
Can you give this to Justas?
So Alruida did it and the Metal Plate that we didn't know...{nl}Okay. We solved all the puzzles. Please wait a bit.
Justas must be waiting.{nl}Please give it to him.
I never thought that the Metal Plate would explode. I am sorry.{nl}I will gather the contents all at once later and show you.
These are the contents that I never thought about.{nl}The goddesses and the humans once used to live together. And the demons?{nl}
If Demetrius is sane, this record... okay.{nl}I promised you that I will show you the record so read the copy yourself.{nl}Well done indeed!
They were gentle monsters but suddenly became vicious. {nl}Have you also heard anything like this?
Revelator, we are in trouble. Please help us!{nl}As you can see, the workers are dying due to the monsters' poison.{nl}
It's so fortunate that you are here.{nl}I wonder why we haven't heard anything from the soldiers who went to go defeat the Gorgon.
{memo X}Mirtis is dead, but the Vubbes are still following its order.{nl}And there's also a rumor that stronger Vubbes were spotted at the 2nd lot.{nl}
The village will be in mess if those Vubbes come out from the mine.{nl}Could you check the 2nd lot in Crystal Mine if you are okay?
You can go down to 2nd lot from the isolated district in the 3rd floor in Crystal Mine.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.
They are more dangerous Vubbes.{nl}We can't guarantee the safety of Klaipeda.
The Vubbes climbed up to the 1st lot? {nl}It's worse than I expected.
This is the scent I mixed exclusively for Vubbes. {nl}This will cause lethargy and fear.{nl}
It is a problem that it is still in the test stage, but you can't do anything about it at the moment.{nl}I will put it into the incense burner so please place it at 2nd lot in Crystal Mine.
I am researching with respect to various aspects so that it would never occur again.{nl}I can't think of a better way besides the scent at the moment.
Well done indeed.{nl}This is for testing so I don't know how long it would last, but I guess it would be safe for a while.
I am dizzy since the Pantos are keep trying to get out from Gele Plateau.{nl}If they go into the region where people live, that will be a big problem.{nl}
So I am thinking about sprinkling the scent of Moas onto the way to Gele Plateau.{nl}Moas are the biggest enemies of Pantos. I will think about a way to prevent it from going out somehow.
Are you going to help me? Then It will be grateful.{nl}Moas are spotted near Piene Fields. I want you to get their lumps.
Just get the lumps of Moas.{nl}I will do the rest.
Well done.{nl}I will do the rest. Thank you.
I am blocking Pantos from getting out of Gele Plateau with Watcher Erra.{nl}I will put something on the way which Pantos will be scared.{nl}
They are the things that can't be done by me...
Really? First, I need Fishermen's eyes and the essences of Ellums. {nl}I heard they live at the entrance of Kateen Forest.
I never went up to the entrance of Kateen Forest so I am scared.{nl}I heard that is the road where spirits lost their ways.
Damn. Disgusting.{nl}I will make the strings which Pantos will be scared.
Okay. I made the strings.{nl}Now, could you put them on the Srautas Gorge and Nefritas Cliff?
To tell you exactly.{nl}Hm... I will just mark it on the map.
Thanks for helping me.{nl}This must be effective so you can feel you did something worthwhile.
Do you know about Tilenis Prince who went missing while he was fleeing to Klaipeda?{nl}The mayor went out to welcome him, but they all went missing.{nl}
But recently, the brooch of the mayor was discovered.{nl}But, we can't investigate it publicly... Can you investigate for us?
$The place where the brooch was discovered is called Sidabras Rest Place in Veja Ravine.{nl}And please accept this.{nl}
$These are the eyes of the spirits that were created by the Bokor Master at my request.{nl}They make things that cannot be seen visible. This will be of use for you.
$Klaipeda Mayor's Spirit
I am... Okay.{nl}He was fighting again. Prince...
{memo X}Most of them died while returning with the colleagues of the prince.{nl}But, they weren't guided even after their deaths. {nl}
When they realized that, they continuously fought with them.{nl}The people who are serving the tree... they kidnapped the prince.
I can't stop this fight.{nl}Please save the prince...
The mayor... he already passed away.{nl}But, the prince may be still alive.{nl}
The people who are serving the trees. I guess I should investigate little more.{nl}Thanks for helping me.
I am okay even if I don't get guided.{nl}Please guide the prince...
The villagers of Andale Village who were slaughtered by the demons...{nl}I am sure they were scared. They must have had regrets.{nl}
{memo X}We want to mourn for the ones who died.{nl}Don't you want to be with me.

The resentment of the villagers in Andale Village is floating around as a negative energy.{nl}Fill the beads I will give to you with the essences of Tini, absorb their resentment and bring them to me.
They had so much pains and felt unfair.{nl}This should never occur again.
With your help, the fight with Bramble has ended.{nl}But, his thorny vines are spreading with vicious energy.{nl}
If we leave it like that, the whole forest will be covered with thorny vines.{nl}But, since my power is not complete yet... I want to ask help from you.
You should eliminate the thorny vines that are on the way to Gate Route.{nl}If we don't block here, Siaulai Forest will also be covered with the thorny vines.
The vicious energy that spurts out from the thorny vines is very bad for humans.{nl}I hope you will be okay.
This is just only the slightest part.{nl}If we don't defeat the thorn Forest completely, the thorny vines will keep spreading.
$The source of all thorny vines is Bramble... and Sirdgela Forest where he used to stay.{nl}To purify the forest, please locate my crystal that has my power in it.
I am sorry that I put heavy burden on your shoulders. {nl}But, you will be able to do it.
Thanks for your efforts.{nl}I will be keep staying here until Thorn Forest recovers it's original status.
Invisible substance... I mean spirits.{nl}I am researching about the relationship between the spirits and the magical power.
I just don't have time to get the essences that are needed for the experiment. {nl}I think you will be able to help me.
Bring this essence of chill.{nl}When you use this to the monsters in Poslinkis Forest, the spirits will be frozen.{nl}

When you defeat that monster, you will be able to obtain frozen spirit fragments.{nl}Put that into the magical power condenser. I've used them long time ago, but some of them should be still remaining.
I've used it long time ago so it may show some strange results.{nl}That's why I needed your help.
This innocent essence of chill... It is as I thought.{nl}Ah, you were almost on the blink of the death. That's why I called you.
As I was tiding up the objects of my older brother, strange beads came out.{nl}It was written on the memo that the beads are there to find the hidden objects of him easily.{nl}
But the manual... It will be hard for me.{nl}So how about you have it?
I mean. They told me to defeat the monsters near this bead.{nl}Then the monsters' magical power will recharge the bead. It's too hard for me.
I know it's sad, but we should live on. {nl}I can't just stay sad when I think about my brother.
Is recharging enough?{nl}I feel sad again as I look at that bead again.
The bead will tell us where the hidden objects of my brother are located.{nl}I don't know what's gonna come out, but please use them well.
If I can't have it, I hope it gets used for a better objective.{nl}I am sure my brother also thinks like that.
My disciple created the magic summon field, but something is wrong.{nl}Maybe... it is connected to the different world. {nl}
If it goes wrong, the demons would come out to this world.{nl}Please. I will stop the summon ritual here so please break the magic circle at Aqueduct region.
We can't do anything if the portal completely opens.{nl}What the hell is happening at Aqueduct region?
Succeeded?{nl}I think there's something that connects to the other world at Aqueduct region.{nl}What the hell is that...
Priest Ramelie
The sealed tower that was protected by the Revelator is being attacked again.{nl}But, it can't be protected by us and the villagers.
The first seal of the sealed tower is already destroyed by the attacks from the demons.{nl}The second seal still remains, but I don't know how long we can hold up.
The goddess asked us to protect the seal. {nl}Now, only one we can trust is you, the Revelator.
Is the seal okay?{nl}I don't know how many times I've prayed to wish that you are okay.
Now is the time to restore the first seal.{nl}I know it's going to be hard, but I can't seek help for this.
Are you really going to help? How grateful...{nl}First fill the crest of Goddess Austeja with the sacred energy near the altar.{nl}
When you dedicate the completed crest of the goddess to the sealed tower, the seal will be filled again.{nl}
Even if you've done the dedication, you can't seal the vicious energy completely. {nl}This attack will not be the last. I hope the goddess return fast.
We can't just rely everything on the goddess.{nl}But, I don't know if we could hold up anymore.
I am so grateful since you are helping us with the restoration of the seal.{nl}But, I don't know how long this seal would hold up... I hope Austeja comes back soon.
I will comfort this.{nl}
Their pain, resentment, wrath and sadness...{nl}I hope they all forget in the arms of the goddess.
The Chapparition in Escanciu Village took away many lives.{nl}Defeat it in the name of the goddess.

I'm sorry...but,{nl}Can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph at Nepatogu Field in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.

Defeat the Infro Holders that rushed in.
Get Matsum's Flower Stamen to create a Thorn Flower Stimulant.

Collect all of Matsum's Flower Stamen. Return to Believer Jurga.
Defeat Matsums
Talk to the spirit of Jane
Jane's spirit is not leaving from dangerous Achorn. Ask her why.
Listen from Jane's spirit
It seems that something complicated is going on with Jane. Listen from Jane's spirit what's the matter.
There is always a way
It seems that Jane's spirit is trying to take some extreme measures. Talk to her slowly to help her.
Look for the records of Valius at Beikini praying room

Jane's spirit told you that if you look at the records which Valius left, you may obtain more information about the magical stone of the interaction. Read the records which Valius left at Beikini pray room.
You've found a way to block the magical energy of the magical stone of the interaction from the records of Valius. Return to Jane's spirit and let her know.
According to the information on the magical stone of the interactionn which Valius left, there's a way to save Jane. Talk to Jane about it.
Search the keepsakes which possess the magical power of Valius

Jane's spirit told you that in order to stop magic generating stones that is supplying the magical power to the magical stone of the interaction, Valius' magical power is needed. Look for the objects that are likely to possess Valius magical power at Vebaiki Burial Chamber.
You found the brooch that you could feel the great magical power. Return to Jane's spirit to determine whether it is real.
You've found the brooch that possesses Valius' magical power. Use this to talk with Jane's spirit how to stop the magic generating stones.
Stop the magic generating stones in the room of senses

Use the brooch with Valius' magical power at the room of senses to find the real magic generating stones and stop them. If you stop fake stones, all magic generating stones will start to generate magical power again.
You've stopped all magic generating stones in the room of senses. Return to Jane's spirit.
You stopped magic generating stones in the room of senses and now is the time to stop the stones in the room of rituals. Listen to Jane's spirit.
Stop the magic generating stones in the room of rituals

The magic generating stones in the room of senses influence the other magic generating stones nearby. If you accidently touch on them, you could reset them using the brooch with Valius' magical power.
You've stopped all magic generating stones in the room of senses. Return to Jane's spirit.
What's bad about being careful
You've blocked the magical power that is going into the magical stones of interaction by stopping all magic generating stones. Talk to Jane's spirit again.
Search for the keepsakes of sealed Valius in Uzdaromo stone chamber

Jane told you that when the magical stones of the interaction completely stop, Archon will be released with you. To defeat the released Archon easily, look for usable objects that Valius created when he was alive.
You've unleashed the seal and obtained the stamp that suppresses the demonic energy. Return to Jane's spirit with this.
You are ready to fight against Archon. Talk to Jane's spirit if this will be enough.
Stop the magical stones of the interaction
{memo X}When you stop the magical stone of the interaction, Archon will be released along with Jane's spirit. Stop the magical stone of the interaction and defeat Archon.
You've defeated Archon. Talk to Jane what's she going to do next.

{memo X}$Looks like things just got more difficult.{nl}Who knew Kepas could grow so big...
$We have to stay strong.{nl}Even Aras is holding on.
$Go back. {nl}You don't have what it takes.
$Be careful next time.
$You must find the hidden sanctum before the demons do.{nl}But you should be careful. The enemy we face can only be defeated with the Divine Sphere.
$Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.
$Look at this busted cable car.{nl}It's still working, but the damage is pretty serious.{nl}
$Capria was the first to change after the incident four years ago. {nl} And then the Pantos.. now only the baby monsters are left.
$We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}I will protect the Divine Sphere so go to the basement to lift the barrier.
$A fair battle face-to-face is better than hiding.{nl}And it's much better if our opponents are the demons.
$So humans can also defeat the demon king.{nl}I can't believe it.
$Please save me!{nl}I don't know how to get out from the barrier!
$Hurry and run away!{nl}Monsters may be closing in!

{memo X}As I look around, I can see the sacred object of Zemyna Goddess. I am gonna go there to examine it.{nl}Since it belongs to Zemyna, she will give me some answer!{nl}

{memo X}I am worried that the corpses may wake up again and interrupt the ritual.{nl}When you go to the burial chamber over there, you will see coffins where the corpses are in.{nl}Please destroy those coffins before the corpses wake up.

{memo X}I can see the sacred object with the shape of a tree over there.{nl]I think that is the sacred object which the Tree Sect of the Truth received from Zemyna Goddess.{nl}Trees symbolize Zemyna Goddess so I am sure the Goddess gave them the sacred object!

{memo X}While you are destroying the coffins, be careful that the lids of the coffins do not open.{nl}I destroyed a few coffins myself, and I found out that the corpses out from the coffins and attack when the lids are open.

{memo X}The corpses didn't attack since you've destroyed the coffins.{nl}But, I couldn't check the sacred object. I could not get near to the sacred object.{nl}It was like as if something was pushing me.

{memo X}The grave guard who manages here, Catacomb may know a little about that sacred object and the barrier.{nl}But, I can't talk to the grave guard.{nl}The grave guard shouted at me while I was preparting for the ritual after entering here.{nl}Could you find out about the sacred object of the Goddess from the grave guard on behalf of me?

{memo X}When I entered Catacomb to look for the traces of the Goddess, what I encountered were the corpses that were interrupting the ritual.{nl}After seeing teh corpses walk out from the coffins, I destroyed the coffins before they wake up.{nl}The grave guard who saw that shouted at me madly because I didn't show respect to the dead ones.{nl}I did that because I thought that was better than seeing the corpses wake up again...

{memo X}The sacred object of the Goddess? What the hell. Are you on the same side with that rude Bokor?{nl}If that's so, get our from this place. I get mad whenever I think about that Bokor.{nl}He destroyed all the coffins where the corpses were in.{nl}I can't understand how he could do such thing!

{memo X}Please tell well to the grave guard. I have to find Zemyna Goddess.{nl}The underground is also the territory of Zemyna Goddess so the reason why the corpses here are resurrecting is because the Goddess is not here.

{memo X}This is absurd. The dead ones are waking up again...{nl}If someone did this purposely, nothing will be more insulting than this!{nl}Who would you suspect the most when the corpses are waking up from the grave?

{memo X}If this was really done by Bokor, then I should help the corpses to rest again.{nl}They may resurrect again if I bury them under the ground so please purify their bodies with your respect using this torch.
{memo X}Why are you hesitating! Move fast! I can't see it anymore...
{memo X}Thank you for helping their rest on behalf of me...{nl}It was hard for me as a grave guard to point the sword at those people who I should take care for.

{memo X}I saw the sacred object of the Goddess which Bokor said before. That's the sacred object created by the guys in the Tree Sect of the Truth.{nl}They said they are the official disciples of Zemyna Goddess and since this grave belongs to the Goddess, they will ask the Goddess to bless the plce.{nl}I think the corpses started to wake up after the guys set the sacred object here.{nl}But, I can't get near to that sacred object.{nl}

{memo X}...Ah! That's right!{nl}When you go deep inside, you will see the box that contains the objects which my father used to use.{nl}Please pull out the spell doll from there. I should go, but I am scared to walk through the corpses...

{memo X}From long time ago, the lunatic Bokor or Necromancer used to come to Catacomb secretly sometimes.{nl}The did some insane experiments on the corpses here.{nl}My father created the spell doll to protect Catacomb from the ones who try to mess up this sacred grave.{nl}When you put magical power into the spell doll, it will find the energy that is messing up the grave and destroy that energy.

{memo X}Our family is guarding the grave for generations. On Medzio Diena, my father got into the incident and passed away so I am guarding the grave after that. I didn't learn anything from him, but now I am the guardian here...
{memo X}Yes! This spell doll is it! I haven't used it for a long time, so I gotta check whether it's working properly.

{memo X}Now bring this doll to the place where the sacred object is.{nl}If the cause of the awakening of the corpses here is that sacred object, the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the sacred object.
{memo X}This is the spell doll that my father used to use. We won't have any problem if we just follows how my father used to do... Just like how my father used to do...

{memo X}What...? What did you just say?{nl}The spell doll broke the barrier and attacked the sacred object, but the doll was destroyed instead?{nl}That's impossible... Maybe it was really the sacred object of the Goddess so that's why the doll was destroyed...{nl}But the fact that the doll broke the barrier means its power is the vicious energy...{nl}
{memo X}If this is related to the Goddess, I can't handle it myself.{nl}Since the barrier was destroyed, ask Bokor to check the sacred object as well.
{memo X}Wow... You broke the barrier. That's splendid.{nl}Hmm... About the doll... Maybe the doll was impaired. It is the sacred object of Zemyna Goddess, but what do you mean by vicious energy.{nl}
{memo X}Anyways, since the barrier was destroyed, let's go with me. I will check it myself.{nl}Can you go there first? I will go right away when I am done preparing for the ritual.
{memo X}The spell doll... Vicious energy... Ahhaha... The grave guard is so funny...
{memo X}I saw it... That monster... It was the grave guard... The sacred object a while ago is not Zemyna's! I am sorry for being selfish...

{memo X}Due to my wrong faith, I didn't suspect the vicious sacred object and broke the coffins... I am disappointed myself...{nl}Now, since the vicious sacred object is gone, my abilities would help calm down the mess.{nl}
{memo X}To express my apology, I want to help the grave guard.{nl}Can you pass my apology to him?
{memo X}Those gentiles! They used the name of the Goddess and did this...{nl}They should not insult the dead ones like this. I want chase them right away and make them pay for it...{nl}

{memo X}But, as a grave guard, I think we should first stabilize Catacomb.{nl}Thanks. I realized that I also have to take care for the resurrected ones' rest as a grave guard.{nl}Since Bokor said he would help me, I will protect the ones that have remained.{nl}
{memo X}The Tree Sect of the Truth crossed here

{memo X}You are not here... Where have you disappeared to... Zemyna Goddess...

$Shoot. I think the monsters are rushing back here.{nl}They probably found out that I have been freed.
Where is the master. I am so scared because I am worried.

$This place has become dangerous ever since Medzio Diena, when the monsters emerged.{nl}Go back quickly while you still can, Kepas will overrun this position soon.
$Ah, you said you came to tell me about the order to assemble, right?{nl}If you help me find my belongings, I will be able to do so more quickly.
$Have you ever tried offering worship to a Goddess Statue?{nl}The Goddesses might have vanished, but I believe they are still out there somewhere.
$I was worried that the monsters would cause harm to the Goddess Statue.{nl}As much as the world is messed up.. That would be terrible.
$This has really gotten out of hand.{nl}Who knew that Kepas could grow so big...{nl}I wonder if it's because of Medzio Diena?
Don't forget to worship a Goddess Statue when you see one.{nl}I'm sure doing so will bestow a blessing upon you.{nl}I firmly believe that the goddesses have not forsaken us.
$This is not the type of monster that can be encountered here so it is rather strange.{nl}This world is such a mess now.
$We need to assemble already?{nl}The world may be on the brink of destruction, but I can't accept this kind of insane order. {nl}I have enough missions on my hands as it is.
$Alright. This should be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that instantly restores your stamina...{nl}I'll give you one as a gift since I have plenty.{nl}

You can recover stamina through Tree Root Crystals or by taking a rest.{nl}But, you won't have time for that when you are being chased by monsters. {nl}This potion will come in handy in situations like that.
$I heard the news from my men and I was starting to become worried.{nl}With how messed up the world is, if that ended well, all is well.{nl}
$It's not like there weren't any monsters at all four years ago, but they weren't so ferocious. {nl}Plant-type monsters seem to have been affected the most, as they weren't like this before.

That's it, that's how you do it. Easy, right?{nl}There is no way to tell what is going to become of this world now that the goddesses have left,{nl}so we have to steadily put effort into things ourselves.
A shield that is advanced to level 4 will be enough.{nl}The determination should be checked.
You are so determined unlike other guys nowadays.{nl}You can come to learn from me anytime you want.
$During your travels you might discover Goddess Statues scattered all over the kingdom.{nl}Worship these statues and you will certainly receive their blessings.
Press {img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.
The Writings on the Wall
Which factors are decisive for determining the outcome of battle?{nl}If you just continue to attack thoughtlessly, then you may get attacked instead.
Golems in this situation...{nl}You remember what I taught you right?
$You are doing great.{nl}As a Paladin Master, I must pay respect to your achievements.
Thank you for completing Laimonas' favor.{nl}You may enter Klaipeda.{memo Uska is a knight, keep the Sir} Sir Uska is waiting for the Revelators.
$There might be more of these Large Kepas roaming in the area nearby.{nl}Could you take a look for me, please?{nl}
$It was just as I thought, right? It was this instinct that kept me alive during Medzio Diena.
$It's been too long, my men should've come back, but I haven't heard anything from them yet.{nl}I know it's been four years since Medzio Diena, but my men have been getting too relaxed recently.
With the goddesses disappearing, and monsters like the Golem appearing... {nl}Is there really any hope?
How was it? Were there many skills that seemed useful?{nl}If you use skills effectively, they will be very useful in combat.{nl}
If that's the case, become my bait and take care of the Royal Mausoleum defense device at Sesija Entrance.{nl}I will only say this once, so you better heed carefully.
No one can disturb the eternal sleep of the great king.
$Persuade the spirit that is heading towards Amolallul Hill{nl}and guide it to the Sad Owl Sculpture!
You've defeated Grey Golem!
You've obtained 1 Status Point from the artifacts of Ruklys!
You came back with the Hogma Teeth, but Rexipher is not around!
You checked the fourth tombstone of Lydia Schaffen{nl}Check what is written on the last tombstone
Gaigalas interrupted you as you touched the root
Molich interrupted you as you touched the root
{memo X}The story about Ruklys is written on it
Defeat the interfering Hogmas
$Search for a clue of the disappearances from Sauga's bags
$Soldier Glen is concerned over the recent disappearances. Please look for clues to the whereabouts of the disappeared by defeating Sauga and searching them.
$Rescue the restrained souls
$The restrained spirit is not the only one that is wandering. Listen for more details from the Sad Owl Sculpture.

$The Sad Owl Sculpture told you that something is wrong since the souls that went to see a Goddess Statue are suffering. Persuade the souls that are trying to go that Goddess Statue and take them to the Owl Sculpture.
$It seems that the Sad Owl Sculpture heard about what is happening to the souls. Return to the Sad Owl Sculpture and ask what happened.
Use the condensed magic source on sleeping Guardians
Place the Soul Pot
$Stonemason Canolyn can't complete his trip to Fedimian due to the Cockatrices around. Defeat the Cockatrices along the road to Fedimian.
$Stonemason Canolyn told you that a monster called Moa stole his toolbox. Defeat the Moa that fled to the Leipsna Chapel Site and look for the toolbox for him.
$Find Historian Rexipher
$Collect Hogma Teeth
Pursue Rexipher at the Royal Mausoleum Entrance
Do you know the legend of Cunningham? {nl}It's a legend about how a great demon was trapped in the Crystal Mine in the past. {nl}

I assume that the trapped demon has finally woken up to control the Vubbes. {nl}The dream of the bishop and the legend of Cunningham... {nl}I wonder if it is a forewarning of a great event that's about to happen.{nl}
Only the goddess knows if it will be hope or despair. {nl}You can read the details about it in a book found at Mine Worker's Resting Place on 2F.
Anyway, it seems like the Vubbes surely destroyed the purifiers. {nl}We have to fix it first before the hostages run out of air.
I will protect this village for my dead comrades.
If the Bokor Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}
You're saying something that's really hard to believe. {nl}You mean this revelation is Goddess Laima's and we have to collect all these for the goddesses to return?{nl}
$Goddess Laima is often called the recording goddess. {nl}When the Great King Zachariel formed this kingdom, the only record of it was bestowed by Goddess Laima.  {nl}
I'd like to ask you a favor. {nl}I have sinned because I was not able to fulfill my duties of guarding the kingdom on Medzio Diena. {nl}
But I am not a Revelator. {nl}Even if I want to make up for my sins, my duty at the moment is to protect the many citizens of Klaipeda. {nl}
So please find all the revelations. {nl}I will put my position as the Knight Commander of Klaipeda on the line and help you deal with it.
If you're on your way to Klaipeda, let me ask you a favor. {nl}It's not easy to go to Klaipeda because of the Infrorocktors.
$I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than to be stationed at.
$Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poata but what were you thinking?
$You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mines to find the evidence of Salvation? {nl}
$But that's tough at the moment. {nl}There is a torrent of Vubbes rushing out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}
$And there's an increase of the monsters here in the Eastern Woods that are now even threatening Klaipeda. {nl}The middle of Miners' Village has turned into a battlefield. {nl}
$We have divided the platoon into two. {nl}Half of the platoon is guarding Miners' Village {nl}and the other half is investigating why the number of monsters have increased here in the Eastern Woods.

$So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they check the evidence of salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and Knight Commander either. {nl}
$Hmm, how about this? {nl}
$To test whether you can safely reach Miners' Village even without the aid of guards... {nl}Why don't you help us in our investigation?
Good job. {nl}Now, let's get to the main task.
{memo X}Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.
$It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from magic I know of. It was very warm.{nl}
$The Miners' Village is under siege and is dangerous.{nl}Please wait in Klaipeda until the siege is over.

I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me, {nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at Crystal Mine 1F.
$Have you met Jonas at the Gateway of the Great King? {nl}He definitely wasn't sick. {nl}But he also wasn't affected by present-day magic.
If this note is true, we might die any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?
Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, it's strange. It seems that it never happened.
Well done.{nl}Now, is this going to be the last lesson...
Bring me hard shell of Varvs and rigid horns of Zinutekas from the Royal Mausoleum 1F.{nl}It shouldn't be hard since you are my disciple.
It's time for you to enhance the qualities of Manas that you possess as a Linker.{nl}Any magic is okay. I will test you by dueling.
It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than look back.
I'm sure my brother stood firm and accepted his final moments. {nl}However, I still think he could've lived more meaningfully {nl}if he had just turned away from his ambition...
I'm thinking of converting the demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Honestly, I did not believe it when my friend, the Paladin Master, said a Savior would come. {nl}
That's how bad the situation was. {nl}My family and friends all went to the goddess... {nl}It seemed like there was no hope anymore in this world. {nl}
Here, use the Seal of Space on the pillar beside me and go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared only for the Revelator.
I was there when the Divine Tree was destroying the capital. {nl}But I was not able to stop it. I was not able to save everyone.{nl}This will remain in my heart like a needle and it hurts me forever.
$But you were different. You have the power to save everyone. {nl}All the followers, the Watchers, even the wishes that me and the first Paladin longed for... {nl}
Right. {nl}Did you mention that you need to find Goddess Saule? {nl}
The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of goddess be with you.
When you find the revelation, tell the Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}He must be the one most anxious about it. {nl}
I will gather all the prayers for my family and friends and offer it to you. {nl}May the blessings of goddess be with you...
But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
Go. The Tenet Church is in Tenet Garden.{nl}My lifelong wish.. Be sure to stop the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
$Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure Highway. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the shaman doll. {nl} {nl}
$Won't you help me purify Labure Highway? {nl} The shaman doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
$I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}A doll for spells. Doesn't that sound exciting?
I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil energy. {nl} I'm going to break it through the shaman doll. Want to give it a try?
I heard the first Paladin promised three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
Our Shaman dolls are different from Bokor's Shaman dolls. {nl}
You can summon the shaman doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
$The power of an Elementalist comes from understanding the root of everything. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest entities.
$This forest is also growing dark. {nl}Many people should realize that Medzio Diena was only the start of the disaster. {nl}
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.
$It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what can I do alone...
$Prayers and ceremonies are not the only ways of serving the goddess. {nl}Serving the world through physical training is also an important mission of the cleric.
$There are two ways to connect with the goddess. {nl}An ardent belief for her, and the sound of silver dropping into her offering box. Just those two.
$The magic to control time is the essence of all magics.{nl}These are Agailla Flurry's words.
I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord ransacking the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I couldn't go out and fight.
The bishop is praying in closure. {nl}When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.
I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give so please help us find the goddesses. {nl}
Klaipeda is full of hope and expectations for the Revelators who dreamed of the goddess. {nl}I am also one of them. {nl}
I'll give you more than what the knight asked me to give. {nl}Since we have many Revelators, things will get better, right?
$You mean you actually drove away the Demon Lord from the Crystal Mine... {nl}Thank you for restoring in me something that I had lost for a while. Hope.
The first Paladin and the Tenet Church fulfilled their duties. {nl}Right.. The time has finally come. Together with the Revelator.
$I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like for nourishment...
$Did you know? A Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in the Crystal Mine. {nl}Do you think that with disaster also comes hope?
$When I first saw the Revelators, I wondered if they were worthy of that name. {nl}But they saved the Crystal Mine and the Tenet Church. {nl}There is definitely a Savior whom the goddess sent.
I heard some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in Crystal Mine. {nl}That's incredible. Aren't Demon Lords the greatest among the demons?

Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at the Tenet Church? {nl}It would have been better if she was killed for good, {nl}but she is the Demon Queen after all, someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.
$As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest are showing unusual movement. {nl}As if they are controlled by something.
I feel ashamed that I wasn't able to join the squad in the Tenet Church. {nl}But isn't it amazing? the Tenet Church was saved from that Demon Lord.
$Just as I thought. The monsters in this forest were chased in by the Vubbes. {nl}And the Revelator actually defeated the Demon Lord that planned all this.{nl}I really wonder who it was.

If it was my hometown, if a demon occupied the Mines, everyone would have attacked it and celebrated. {nl}Anyway, I don't know who that Revelator is but this weak kingdom finally found someone useful.

A sacred church had to go through such bad things. The clerics of this kingdom are planning something unusual.{nl}But it's a good thing to have protected the Tenet Church. It means they have the guts, don't you think? {nl}{nl}
The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?
We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the goddess. It could even be a trick of the demons. {nl}But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Church. {nl}From the Demon Lord even.

It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. I was scared another Medzio Diena would happen. {nl}But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.

$It's such good news that a Revelator helped drive away the Demon Lord of the Crystal Mine.{nl}But I felt a strange and sacred energy... Could it have been just a delusion? {nl}It is hard to describe it.

$Do you think Medzio Diena and the demons are related? {nl}I mean look at the Tenet Church. It was as if the demons were waiting for that moment...{nl}Come to think of it, the Revelators could have been ones who set the stage.
$I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the goddess... So what's the matter?

$I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to stop it.

$In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but..{nl}You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?

$There is still so much left undiscovered about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons live longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. We might even have had another Medzio Diena.
$I heard the source of the evil energy deep in the Thorn Forest recently disappeared. {nl}But we will need a long time for the forest to return to its previous state...

$Did you hear that a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord's plan in the Royal Mausoleum? {nl}I heard that a Demon Lord was going around destroying the ruins in King's Plateau.{nl}I'm glad it got its punishment.
How did you come here? Did you make it through the Thorn Forest? {nl}Hmm. Are you saying you can't tell me about it.

$The Demon Lord that was messing with King's Plateau seems to have been the reason behind all the cases of missing people. {nl}It serves him right that a Revelator stopped all his plans from succeeding.
$Since Goddess Saule disappeared, the area around Kvailas Forest was filled with evil energy and thorns. {nl}But you made it through the Thorn Forest? Can we say that's a good sign? {nl}
$A Revelator saved the Royal Mausoleum of King Zachariel. {nl}But why would the demons go after ruins that's over a thousand years old? {nl}There is so much that we don't know about. {nl}
$I heard the monsters keep attacking the ruins and the historians keep disappearing. {nl}Yet, nobody remembers anything after the fact. How funny.
