$I heard a Revelator drove out the Demon Lord that was trying to take over the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That's funny. Doesn't that mean that everything was foreseen a thousand years ago?

If the Demon Lord invaded the Royal Mausoleum, then the symptoms of Jonas in Gate Route also becomes clear. {nl}If King Zachariel erased the memory of the workers in the Mausoleum, then it must be a side effect of the old magic. {nl}What do you think he was planning to do?
$Now the demons even bear the face of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl} but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.
This place holds records of the hidden side of history. {nl}Time is an absolute thing. It just depends on how you look at it.

I heard a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord that was eyeing the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}It may be a bit overboard to make a connection between Medzio Diena and a king from a thousand years ago... {nl}But I'm sure there is something that we are all forgot.
The demons have been continuously attacking the Mage Tower even before Medzio Diena.{nl}Thanks to the goddess sending us the Revelator, we finally make an end to the long battle.
$The weight of history feels astoundingly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medzio Diena here.

$I keep thinking that Medzio Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}It's a good thing some Revelator stopped it.
$Everyone knew that Helgasercle showed an obsession towards the Mage Tower since centuries ago. {nl}Whatever is in that tower, we can finally see the end of it. {nl}That's a great thing.

$First the Tenet Church and now the Great Cathedral...{nl}But they say it was all resolved by the Revelator, so I am hopeful that things will get better.{nl}Not minding the gossip of the world and doing what you must is what's good for the goddess and the kingdom.

$The rumor that a Revelator saved the Mage Tower is something that even someone like me, {nl}who is not interested in the gossips of the world, will take in. {nl}I'm surprised that there was a even one person who was good enough from anybody there.
Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator but its souls is not something that can be saved.

$I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord who sullied the wise teachings of Maven. {nl}Now it is time for us priests to come forward. {nl}We should put away our regrets about failing to protect the Great Cathedral and atone for our sins.
My colleague is dead?{nl}That can't be. Only if I had not tempted him...{nl}
This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the goddess safely.
$I can't leave everything behind...
What do we do? {nl}The Vubbes rushed in and kidnapped the villagers!
You are the Revelator, right? {nl}The goddess must have helped. {nl}
{memo X}This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What is he talking about evidence of salvation in the Crystal Mine. I have never seen such thing. {nl}
I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they see into the mines. {nl}
Please... Save the villagers. {nl}I beg of you!
Let's go to the Crystal Mine. {nl}I will tell you the rest of the story at the Crystal Mine entrance.

Hold on! There is something you should know. {nl}We went into the mines to save the kidnapped villagers too.{nl}But the purifiers were broken and the mine was filled with toxic fumes, so we failed every time. {nl}
Ye..Yes..{nl}Find a young man named Vaidotas!{nl}
That fellow knows well about the purifiers in the Crystal Mine. {nl}It hasn't been long since he was taken away by the Vubbes so he must be in the Vubbe Outpost.
{memo X}You want to learn my skills?{nl}It's not hard for me to teach you, but would you be able to handle it?
The goddess always told us to help those around us.{nl}By helping others near you, you will help your spirit as well.
Great King Zachariel's ordeal is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have acknowledged you.
$The kingdom has lost all hope. {nl}It does not have any will to stand firm anymore and is just crying out for the goddesses.{nl}
$In recent times however, people have come forward saying they dreamed of the goddess. {nl}You are one such person, Revelator. {nl}
{memo X}Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}
$Knight Aras at the Eastern Woods is in charge of that so go and meet him.
$Four years has passed since that incident, why is the goddess sending us Revelators now... {nl}I guess someone like me may not be able to understand the deeper meaning of the goddess' will.
But, at least I know that the Revelators are our only hope.{nl}
Well then, go on to the Eastern Woods. {nl}Don't forget to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the central plaza before you leave. {nl}
Also, be sure to drop by the Item Merchant.{nl}I have left some warp scrolls for Revelators like you.
I can feel Bramble suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
I am not afraid of dying.{nl}Goddess Saule will guide me well.
The portal that you tried to open was a false gateway.{nl}That portal leads to where all of the world's knowledge is.
I have been fighting the Demon Lord Bramble, who tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it night and day to be able to hand the revelation to you. {nl}
But, Medzio Diena broke the balance of strength. {nl}The goddesses lost most of their strength since that day. {nl}
Bramble took that chance to steal the revelation and seal me in this place. {nl}Because only I know how to interpret the revelation.{nl}
But I did not give into Bramble's order to interpret the revelation.{nl}That is why he made a plot to open a portal to where all the knowledge of the world is. {nl}
The residents of this area are victims of the plot to open that portal. {nl}To find a way to get the revelation using your power as the savior... Something brutal was done. {nl}
I lost most of my strength and couldn't stop that horror from happening. {nl}All I could do was... to despair. {nl}
But the revelation led you to me. {nl}I am certain that you are the ray of light who will save all of this world. {nl}
Savior. {nl}Please destroy the magic that is trapping me. {nl}In order to deliver and follow the revelation, I must first be freed.
The magic circle of confinement is located in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry before I lose consciousness.
{memo X}Thank you for saving me. {nl}You are... The only true savior who will save this world. {nl}The one who Goddess Laima talked about.
{memo X}I am Saule, the Goddess of the Sun.{nl}I was the guardian of the revelation.
This cage is still confining me. {nl} We've got to find Clymen who has the key and is hiding in between the dimensional crack.
Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Altar Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwells in the tool.
I am finally free. {nl}I will prepare to interpret the revelation from this point on. {nl}
As I have told you before, the revelation is in the hands of the Demon Lord Bramble. {nl}I feel sorry that I have to burden you, but your strength is the only thing I can rely on.{nl}
But Bramble is also not in its usual condition due to the previous battle. {nl}It is recovering by turning the forest into a thorn forest and extracting nourishment.
My Believers are waiting for you in Gate Route. {nl}Please take back the revelation from Bramble.
I have carved many owls for a long time to help Goddess Ausrine.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
Medzio Diena was just the beginning. {nl}A forest far away from the capital such as this one is also starting to soak its way into the evil energy. {nl}
I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.

But please don't reveal my existence for now. {nl}It is the nature of humans to want to depend on something. {nl}If they find out about the helplessness of the goddesses, this world will be full of chaos and sighs.
That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.

If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope this will be useful for you.{nl}Nice to meet you!{nl}Are you the Revelator who dreamed of the goddess? {nl}
Everyone in Klaipeda is talking about it. {nl}I wonder if the Revelators really saw the missing goddesses in their dreams... and where is that dream... {nl}
I am curious to know more about the dream but I'm sure they can't tell me about it.{nl}But that's fine since I believe that the Revelators are people who will find the goddesses. {nl}
Please take this accessory. {nl}If the armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}
I hope it will be useful for you. {nl}May the blessings of goddess be with you...
The poison of Scorpio, it was somewhat strange.{nl}Well. It already happened so what can I do anyway. I won't mind as long as it doesn't threaten my life.
Oh I'm causing such trouble.. Thank you for helping me. {nl}You just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I give you and burn the voodoo doll on top of it.
The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad energy within the crops will go away like that. {nl}
This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..
Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, never mind. I will report it to the baron myself.
This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle at Darbas Entrance will have a lot of monsters that will interfere. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.
The baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}

If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?
If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
These things are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Fork...
Gerda
{memo X}I am a new member of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am setting up warning and notice Boards related to the Kedorlaomers here and there. {nl}It is very tiring though.

{memo X}{nl}If it is alright with you, can you set up some boards on the lower area over there? {nl}That's where Jurate is trying to excavate Divine objects so we need to put up a warning for pedestrians. {nl}But I need to go somewhere else...
{memo X}Thank you. {nl}That would be good enough.
Serapinas
{memo X}I am Serapinas, one of the new members of the Kedorlaomer Merchants. {nl}I am in charge of promoting the merchants. {nl}If you have time, can you help me in one of my promotion agenda?

{memo X}{nl}It's nothing difficult. You just have to go near Orsha or Klaipeda and help the Revelators who just began their adventures. {nl}I will give you a scroll. If you use it on them, it will help them and promote the merchants as well.
{memo X}You must use it near the fields of Orsha or Klaipeda. {nl}And it must be someone who just began their adventure. {nl}I will not work on people who have seen the promotion material already.
{memo X}Thank you for stepping up to help.
{memo X}Oh, you're back already. {nl}Revelators sure are different.
Jurate
{memo X}I am Jurate, the leader of divine object excavation team. {nl}Are you here to help? {nl}We need some.
{memo X}{nl}Let's take time to talk later but first, please help excavate the area I tell you .
{memo X}It would also be nice to take care of the monsters on your way there too.
{memo X}It won't be that dangerous.
{memo X}Oh, you brought it. {nl}This is a divine object known as the Incense of Goddess.
{memo X}Did I tell you? {nl}Oh, it was a long day... {nl}We faced Medzio Diena right here while we were transporting the divine objects to Orsha.

{memo X}{nl}The wagon flipped and the divine objects scattered around. {nl}That's why we are going through this excavation to find it. {nl}But people are hesitating to excavate that area because of the monsters... Please help us.
I wonder if it was eaten by the monster...
{memo X}Looks like the monsters ripped it to shreds but here. {nl}Let me try to have it back.
{memo X}{nl}Since it is the record of the merchants, only if I could stick it back together...
{memo X}This record is about the materials of the arrow that the merchants supplied to Lydia Schaffen and her arrow maker, the first Fletcher MAster.
{memo X}I think there should be some divine objects up here too though. {nl}I can't tell where exactly. {nl}Can you look for it? I'll give you a detector.
{memo X}Locate the area and then carefully dig that area. {nl}You will probably find the divine object.
{memo X}Carefully use the detector as you go north.
{memo X}Oh, you found it.
{memo X}{nl}Let's see...
{memo X}{nl}This divine object is an ink bottle. {nl}It contains the secret ink that was used for important records and documents. {nl}I assume this ink was used when they needed to hide the record.
{memo X}{nl}Ah, I think that's about all the work we need to do for the day. {nl}Thank you for your help.
Marzelius
{memo X}Hello. {nl}I am the Record leader Marzelius.
{memo X}{nl}If you want to help me... {nl}Please find the records of the merchant that the monsters stole from us.
{memo X}As Leopoldas says, we, the merchants, have been doing a lot of things. {nl}The records hold the history of our works.
{memo X}If we get back the records that the monsters stole from us, then we must rewrite them again so that it will stand the times.
{memo X}Thank you for coming forward to help us. {nl}We are in really tight hands.
{memo X}Now we have to rewrite the damaged records... {nl}The ink made from monster fluids are good and lasts long. {nl}I will give you a trap to use so please get me the monster fluid.
{memo X}If you place the trap near the monster, the monster will be lured to it and faint. {nl}You need to extract its fluid while it is still alive.
{memo X}You can get it from all the monsters around the area.
{memo X}This is good enough! {nl}Thank you very much!
{memo X}Now it's time to make the sanctuary. {nl}Try to make it here. {nl}I will give you the materials and tools you need.
{memo X}You can make it here.
{memo X}Good work. {nl}I have a feeling that Gierda, in the northern area, also needs your help.
Gierda
{memo X}You're the Revelator. {nl}I am Giedra of Rud order. {nl}If you're here to meet Antanas, I'm sure you've already heard about our order so I won't talk so much about it.

{memo X}{nl}I am collecting the materials needed to make the Scriptures of Goddess. {nl}Normal paper turns yellow and decays quickly... So I'm looking for materials that won't get wet nor be discolored easily. {nl}The transparent shell of the monsters are great for it. If you polish it well before writing on it, it will last a long time. {nl}Can you get me those? {nl}
{memo X}It's a pretty common material so it will be easily to collect.
{memo X}Bring it to me when you collect them all.
{memo X}You brought them earlier than I expected. {nl}These shells will now be polished and used as pages of the scripture. {nl}Thank you.

{memo X}We also need to do some bookbinding. {nl}Making sure the book does not break lose is the most important thing. {nl}The leather string made from monster leather is the best but the problem is that it is too short. {nl}I will give you an anvil. Can you make me some bookbinding strings using the leather strings?

{memo X}Listen carefully. First, get leather string from the monsters, then use this anvil to turn the leather strings into a strings for bookbinding. {nl}You need to connect the short strings and make it into a single string. {nl}It also becomes more durable this way.
{memo X}Return to me when you are done making the string.
{memo X}Awesome! {nl}You can say that you made a book yourself.
{memo X}{nl}Kestas over there also needs your help. Try talking to him.
Kestas
{memo X}I had the records of my seniors...{nl}But it was all stolen... {nl}I'm done...
{memo X}Oh oh oh!{nl}Please help me!{nl}My seniors' records are all gone!
{memo X}{nl}That's my job but it's all gone! All of it! {nl}Please find it! {nl}I'm sure the monsters took it!
{memo X}What to do... What do I do... {nl}I'm done... All the hardworks put in to make those records...
{memo X}{nl}That's it! Wow, you got them all! {nl}Thank you!{nl}How can I thank you enough...
{memo X}Aah it's all good now! Now go back to Orsha and complete the records!{nl}Hahaha!
{memo X}Ah really... {nl}Actually, these records are made out of the polished shells of the monsters. {nl}You need to write it there to make it last long.

{memo X}{nl}Yes, yes, right. That is also why Gierda is trying to make the scripture using the monster shells. {nl}That's why we are always attacked like this. {nl}Because they can smell their fellows...
{memo X}{nl}Anyway, now I'll really go to Orsha now. {nl}Thank you very much!
{memo X}Chisel?{nl}The tools merchant should have it. {nl}Go on over there.
{memo X}It's a long way back with the tool... {nl}Be careful.
{memo X}A Chisel? {nl}You will use it to repair the sanctuary?
{memo X}{nl}Well, I just bought some old chisels from other Revelators... {nl}If you need, you can take one of it.
{memo X}Did you get the chisel?
{memo X}Oh, you got them all.
{memo X}It's a long way to Gernas Plains... {nl}Go on.
Albinas
{memo X}Thank you for what just happened. {nl}Ah, this sanctuary...

{memo X}{nl}I expected it to be polluted but.. I mean who would have thought it would be this bad? {nl}Making a sanctuary like this here is bad enough but those Nestos. {nl}What are they thinking leaving it corrupted like this.
{memo X}{nl}Can you help me out for a while?
{memo X}I belong to the Anastos. {nl}The Nestos still pursue unconditional belief even at this point when the Goddesses are all gone. {nl}That's why they are building sanctuaries here and there.

{nl}What's the use of sanctuaries when the goddesses are all gone? {nl}When you know it will just be corrupted like this even if you build it. {nl}On the other hand, the Anastospa pursue practicality.
{memo X}{nl}People come first, mopping up the demons come first, and what's the use of faith when the Goddess themselves abandoned us?
{memo X}There is another sanctuary over there. {nl}I will finish burning this sanctuary so please destroy the one over there. {nl}We need to teach those Nestos as lesson.
{memo X}{nl}I'm sure the sanctuary over there is also fuming red enegy. {nl}A sign of corruption.
Damijonas
{memo X}What the... {nl}Who are you? What are you doing to our sanctuary...
{memo X}This is the sacred sanctuary of the Nestos. Did you do this?
{memo X}I have never heard about someone like that. {nl}I may not know every singe person in Anastopas but I at least know those who set up this camp.
{memo X}I'm at loss for any word.
{memo X}{nl}Albinas? He is one of Anastopas? That can't be. {nl}Bring that person here. I need to check for myself.
{memo X}Are you saying that Albinas guy is missing? {nl}It's getting out of hand. {nl}I'm sure Anastos won't do such a thing.
{memo X}{nl}Anyway, our priority then is to restore this sanctuary. {nl}You did this so you should be responsible for it. {nl}There are rocks over there.

{memo X}{nl}This sanctuary was also made of the rocks here so collect some rocks. {nl}And the Nestos Camp is over there. {nl}You'll find someone named Eduinas . {nl}Ask him to polish the rocks to use as materials for restoring the sanctuary.
{memo X}If he finds out you did this to the sanctuary, he won't polish the rocks easily. {nl}But that's a price you have to pay and you should be responsbile for it.
{memo X}Still not done yet?
Eduinas
{memo X}Who are you..? {nl}And what are these rocks?
{memo X}What? Destoryed the sanctuary? {nl}The sanctuary that was built with everyone's efforts here?

{memo X}I don't need your apologies. {nl}I'll polish the rocks to use as materials since Damijonas said so but don't ever do that again. {nl}And while I polish these, I don't want to see your face so go away and take care of some monsters nearby.
{memo X}You should wait longer.
{memo X}Done. Now, don't ever do that again.
{memo X}You brought it. {nl}Now let's begin the restoration.

{memo X}Done. It's a good thing it wasn't totally destroyed. {nl}I apologize for being angry at you a while ago. Seeing the sanctuary destroyed was upsetting. {nl}But it's not total nonsense. {nl}Anastos and Nestos may be in conflict of interests but we do not invade each other's territory.
{memo X}{nl}But you mentioned someone from Anastos that I don't even know as the reason behind destroying the sanctuary so I couldn't hold my anger. {nl}Anyway, at least you restored it...
{memo X}{nl}But it strange. I have never heard of that name...{nl}Anastos Camp is in the northern side so why don't you go there and ask. {nl}It really is strange.
Gedas
{memo X}Don't bother me if you don't have any business. {nl}Ah... I really need that...
{memo X}{nl}Hey, can you find it for me? {nl}My research materials. {nl}The monsters took them all from me...
{memo X}More than other things, we need to find it first! {nl}My research! My research! {nl}The monsters took it! {nl}Find me that first!
Are you not done yet?
{memo X}Let me see... {nl}Yes, right! You got them all! {nl}Thank you very much!
{memo X}{nl}Oh, did you have something to ask?
{memo X}Albi...nas...?
{memo X}{nl}Uh...
{memo X}{nl}Nope. I can't think of anyone on Anastos with that name. {nl}Moreover, he told you go burn and destroy the Nestos sanctuary? {nl}Oh my god...

{memo X}{nl}Nonsense. We don't do such a thing. {nl}I think we need to investigate on that matter. {nl}We give danger signal fires when we send out people for investigation {nl}and we ran out of it just now. {nl}Can you find some firepowder that are used to make the danger signal fires?
We all serve the goddess. That is why we're on the pilgrimages. {nl}It's just a small difference in how we see the world.
{nl}Nestospa's people say that we should believe in the goddesses unconditionally even if they disappeared, {nl}while we, the Anastospa, pursue something more practical.
{nl}Defeating demons, improving the qualities of human lives... we have to aim for those things.
{memo X}Monsters are all around so it will be difficult to obtain the materials.
{memo X}But, Albinas... We don't feel good about it.
Okay, good. That's enough.{nl}Now, we will make flame bombs. Please wait a bit.
$We've completed the flame bomb... Now I will call my colleague.{nl}He is called Fabijus.
{memo X}Fabijus is a moderatist among Anastos, so he won't have problem even if he meets one of Nestos on his way.
{memo X}Since Fabijus left... we would somehow get some answer.{nl}But, I don't feel good about it. Is there any information...
{memo X}{nl}Ah! Barte over ther must know something.{nl}He arrived here while traveling various locations.{nl}How about we ask about Albinas there?
It's just a different perspective of looking at the world. {nl}The topic they cover the most...

{nl}The disappearances of the goddesses were done spontaneously so are we going to still follow then after they abandoned us...{nl}Another problem is whether we, humans should continue to manage the world where the goddesses have disappeared...
{nl}Are we going to aim for the truth or trust the goddessses and pray... that will be the difference.{nl}But, they are just conflicting each other and they don't deny each others' existences.
{memo X}She is rather progressive.{nl}So since she is not close to me... I want you to go to her.
Barte
{memo X}{nl}Ah, yes. I am called Barte.{nl}I was on a journey until recently. I am thinking about leaving again.

{memo X}Albinas... Is that him?{nl}When we arrived at the camp recently, one man was wearing the same outfit like us so I was going to say hello, but then I felt something was not right so I decided not to.{nl}He was giggling as he was looking at the leathers that were engraved with writings and he ripped off those leathers.

{memo X}{nl}I was scared since that wasn't the power of a human, but he threw all those leathers on the ground and disappeared down there. The monsters thought that was the time and ate all the leathers. Was the smell of blood on those leathers?...
{memo X}{nl}It was scary. {nl}Ah, I think the monsters there could've not digested the leathers as yet... {nl}Can you bring them? I am curious too.

The people who are progressive are a minority among Anastos.{nl}They are asserting to stop conflicting with Nestos, but instead try to change Nestos.{nl}So that Albinas probably told them he is also progressive.
{nl}So he could make you participate into destroying the sanctums of Nestos.
{memo X}I can connect the burnt leathers together.
{memo X}The monsters have those.
{memo X}Let's see...
{memo X}{nl}Uh?
{memo X}{nl}Ah... This doesn't make sense... He...is a subordinate of Vaiga.{nl}Bring a conflict to Nestos and Anastos...{nl}You can use the Revelator...{nl}Vaiga.
{memo X}Please tell this to Gedas!{nl}Oh my god, what is happening to Fabijus?
{memo X}We don't have time. Hurry.
{memo X}What?{nl}Damn it...{nl}The demons came here...
{memo X}Fabijus... what is happening to him?{nl}What should I do...?
{memo X}The flame bomb has exploded!{nl}Please hurry to Fabijus!
{memo X}{nl}And one more thing I should tell you...
{memo X}{nl}To defeat the demons, Nestos may be better, when you stop by their camp and explain about the circumstances, they would tell you how to defeat Albinas.
{memo X}Damn...{nl}That was his plot.{nl}I thought it was suspicious.
{memo X}{nl}Please take this divine object.{nl}You would be able to defeat the demons.
{memo X}You are safe.{nl}I've heard from Fabijus.{nl}Everything was Vaiga's plot...{nl}We should be cautious all the time.{nl}Thank you.
It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the goddesses.
{memo X}Damn. {nl}It's too wide, so let's move separately.{nl}
{memo X}First, you go deep into that place.{nl}Who knows? The demons with the special power may possess something.{nl}
{memo X}I am so mad.{nl}There isn't anything special and the demons didn't have anything.{nl}
Did we search an empty area?
I will search the area up here.{nl}Let's meet later.
How about you?{nl}Have you obtained anything?
{memo X}Wait!{nl}I can sense something big from Monocle.{nl}
{memo X}It looks to be very big. Go there and check yourself.{nl}I will hide here since the battles are not my type.{nl}I don't know what to do if a strong demon comes out.
{memo X}Monocle is looking for the hidden object that is hidden inside the special power. It is a big object.
{memo X}Go there and check.{nl}Like a while ago, the demons may appear and there may be really strong demons there... I will hide myself here.
{memo X}An outsider comes here... Who are you?{nl}How did you come here?
{memo X}It is really big so you will recognize it when you see it.
{memo X}I will introduce myself first.{nl}I am the manager of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Who are you?{nl}
{memo X}Okay. You don't have to explain anymore.{nl}I can feel you are full of sacred power.{nl}
{memo X}I know the special power which Ruklys hid here exists.{nl}If it is your task to find it, then I will help for sure.
You can't say no nor ask for reasons to the kingdom orders.{nl}But as I lived here for my life, I have many things to think.{nl}
The kingdom order told us to ban anyone's entrance here, but I think the goddess made us to meet each other here.{nl}The goddess is not under the kingdom.{nl}
{memo X}If it is about the Goddess, then I will do the guide.{nl}At least, there aren't anything here so let's go to the next area.
{memo X}Ah, I totally forgot.{nl}I've prepared many things to block the intruders, but I totally forgot about them.{nl}
I need a certificate.{nl}It was created to attack the ones who are not permitted ferociously.{nl}
{memo X}To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the lower area so please get me one.
I will help anything that is related to the goddesses.{nl}Finally, an opportunity has come in my boring life.
They are enough to make the certificate.{nl}Please wait a bit.
{memo X}What I can do for you is to put my sign on the certificate.{nl}But, I am too old to use magic.{nl}

{memo X}But, I am sure the energy that is flowing around the Fortress of the Land could substitute my weak power.{nl}Please gather all of those.{nl}The monsters who've lived here for a long time must have the crystal of the great earth.
{memo X}I am not like the old days.{nl}When I made that certificate, I thought I would never make anymore.
{memo X}I never knew that I would be making this again... Please wait.{nl}I will make it quickly.
{memo X}Let's go more deep inside. {nl}I hope you can find the one that you are looking for. {nl}
{memo X}I will go there first so please follow.
Don't come late.
{memo X}Welcome.
{memo X}Please receive it.{nl}My devices won't attack you anymore.
{memo X}I've protected this place for my entire life, but I don't know anything about the revelation which you are looking for.{nl}But, the spirit that lived in the era of Ruklys may know something.
But, those spirits are dangerous.{nl}Since they only have the thoughts of that time. Their hatred towards the kingdom soldiers.
{memo X}The Soul Stones that read the memories of the spirits are beside me.{nl}I've created them. I've tried to read their memories in the past many times.{nl}
But, what we received in return were only hatred.{nl}For them, we are just kingdom soldiers that are trying to occupy the Fortress of the Land.
{memo X}It is unfortunate, but to make them not to go crazy, you would need the token of the restraint.
It is very complex to make the token of the restraint.{nl}We've failed that time, but since we have you this time, it will be much easier this time.{nl}
I will tell you in steps, so please first bring the eggs of Rajatad.
{memo X}The spirits only have the feeling of anger left.{nl}I guess we can't do anything about it.
{memo X}This egg is the power to restrain.{nl}Now, we need something to execute the power.
{memo X}To execute the power, the bones of the demons are the best.{nl}When you get the bones, I will move the power of restraint that is in the eggs to the bones of the demons.
Even I failed to pull out the memories of the spirits.{nl}I feel reliable since you are with me.
{memo X}Well done.{nl}We only have to do the last step in order to complete the token of the restraint.
As I told you before, I've tried to look at the memories of the spirits.{nl}The resistances from the spirits were too aggressive at then, so I failed that time.{nl}
But, now I have you and the token of restraint.{nl}If we could bring the spirits, we may able to read the memories with the soul stones that are beside me.
Please bring the spirits here with the token of the restraint.{nl}I will get prepared.
Please bring the spirits fast.{nl}I am also curious.
{memo X}They are breaking something after receiving an order from Ruklys.{nl}I think that may be related to the revelation of the goddesses.
{memo X}I should find out about the device which Ruklys destroyed.

{memo X}We can look at the detailed memories of the spirits by enhancing the token of the restraint.{nl}Due to enhanced token of the restraint, the spirits would resist. If the spirits resist, suppress them with your power and use the token of the spirit.
I have no choice even if the spirits suffer. {nl}That's the best way I can help you.
Finally found it.{nl}I've been looking for it for 600 years and finally... found the revelation.
{memo X}Please put the vitality of the monsters into this bone.{nl}Then, the power to restrain, the power to release, and the power to execute, all steps will be put into those.{nl}
That's an old method.{nl}If we complete this, you may able to see the memories of the spirits that were with Ruklys.
{memo X}Even we if we know the method, it is useless if we can't execute it.{nl}I wasn't able to obtain the vitalities of the monsters...
Good. {nl}That's the token of the restraint.{nl}
Don't care that much even if we use the demons.{nl}What's important is that we should look for the revelation of the goddess.
Are there spirits that are wandering around the Fortress of the Land without going to the goddesses?{nl}I can't see them suffering anymore.
I can only help you to make the owl sculptures.{nl}Those owls would guide the spirits that lost their ways.
Can you put the owl sculptures at the Fortress of the Land?{nl}If you guide the spirits to the owl sculptures, then you would be able to go beside the goddesses.
I can't quit carving the owl sculptures.{nl}When I stop carving, then that means the peaceful days have come.
Thanks.{nl}The goddesses must have given use long lives to fulfill these.
{memo X}I don't have time to think about those treasures.{nl}I also care for the kingdom. I know that the revelation should not fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}
{memo X}I should meet Eminent around here.{nl}Let's check with Monocle without being noticed by Eminent.
This is as I thought... He is not like the guardian of the revelation.{nl}Otherwise, are the demons the guardians of the revelation?{nl}
They are going after the revelation.{nl}What should we do about it...{nl}
{memo X}That's right!{nl}We have that document.
{memo X}Do you remember?{nl}It's the document that was in the treasure when we went to the hidden place.{nl}

{memo X}The methods of the activation and the repair of the magic circle is written there to face against the demons at the battle field.{nl}If we somehow use them effectively, we may able to block Eminent.{nl}
{memo X}First, you do what Eminent tells you to do.{nl}And let's secretly activate the magic circle with me.
{memo X}Did it go well?{nl}The last thing is near the Ikbeta Platform.{nl}
{memo X}But, the power of the magic circle is getting suppressed due to the flags of the demons.{nl}I've tried to get near it somehow, but I can't due to the demons.
{memo X}Let's pull out the demon flags that are near the magic circle.{nl}
{memo X}Ah, if you go late, Eminent may suspect you.{nl}Go meet Eminent as the magic circle gets activated.
I believe that Ruklys has not colluded with the demons.{nl}If not, what I saw are all lies.
Have you collected all the parts?{nl}Give it to me. I can restore it.
I want you to meet the revelation of the goddess fast.{nl}To fulfill my lifelong wish...
{memo X}I will not hide it anymore.{nl}I am Premier Eminent and I used to serve King Kadumel.{nl}
{memo X}It's up to you to believe, but I want you to give me an opportunity to at least explain this.
I am sure that you know this place is the last battlefield where Ruklys resisted until his death.{nl}And Ruklys was also the guardian of the revelation like his master, Maven.{nl}
But, as the defeat came, he crossed the line which he should not have crossed.{nl}He made an alliance with the demons.{nl}
{memo X}The Fortress of the Land is full of vicious demons and monsters. {nl}That's why I brought my army here.{nl}
{memo X}It was a long battle. But the battle ended with my victory.{nl}And then the voices of the goddess was heard. To protect the revelation.{nl}
But, I don't know how Ruklys hid the revelation.{nl}He is just a half guardian.{nl}
It's up to you to believe this story, but look at me in front of you.{nl}I've been living with the blessing from the goddesses for the last 600 years.{nl}
{memo X}And I've met you at the end.{nl}And you pulled me to the place where the revelation is.{nl}
It is my honor since I can be helpful to you. {nl}I was suffering from the sense of shame since I don't know what the half guardian could do.{nl}
{memo X}Let's finish the explanation here and go look for the revelation of the Goddesses.{nl}I have things to prepare so I will go there first.{nl}
{memo X}Ah, you still haven't left?{nl}
I've thought about it a lot. {nl}I am sure that the person who've been to this deep is just me among the grave thieves!{nl}
We should record this historic moment.{nl}Can you bring some stones where I could record my achievements?
What should I write on the stones? {nl}If you have any thoughts, please let me know.
I know that it is hard to bring something that is that big.{nl}Thank you. I will think what to write on it.
{memo X}Isn't this the diary of Ruklys? {nl}I am sure that more than this. Can you look for more?
{memo X}When you bring this to Wilhelmina Carriot, she will pay you accordingly.
Okay. This is enough.{nl}
The history which we know are all lies. He was killed by the hands of the one he used to love.{nl}Ruklys, he is an unfortunate man.

{memo X}It's good to see that you are still alive.{nl}Do you remember? When I first looked through this Monocle.{nl}I thought the object is hidden by the special force, but when I went there there were only demons there.{nl}

{memo X}And when you entered the habitants' area, you've checked it with Monocle right?{nl}The strong force was detected so I remember that I told you to check.{nl}You told me that there is only an old manager there.{nl}
Since then, I've been keep looking for that force with this monocle... {nl}But, when I went to the places, only demons were there.{nl}
Maybe...{nl}The true nature of the force that can be seen by Monocle is maybe... demons?{nl}
{memo X}That old manager... I have no idea...
{memo X}I hope my assumptions are wrong.
{memo X}The demons did not attack Premier Eminent? {nl}
{memo X}I need to check it. {nl}Let's go together and meet that Eminent guy. {nl}
{memo X}We will know for sure if you check that guy with the Monocle.
Mirtis is gone but the Vubbes are still following Mirtis's commands. {nl}And there is also a rumor that even stronger and more dangerous Vubbes were seen. {nl}
Most of them died while returning with the prince's men.{nl}But they were not guided by the goddess even after their death. {nl}
I want to mourn for those who died unfairly. {nl}Would you like to join me?
Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
What? You're not a reaper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you will be cursed. {nl}
Huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon. {nl}Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
The Legwyn family was a renowned family. {nl}But since Justina's father, Gailius Legwyn disappeared, other members of the family and its deities all fell sick and died. {nl}
The mansion where Justina used to live... is now full of monsters.{nl}
I heard that Erikas who is the friend of Legwyn for a long time has the family treasure of Legwyn family so I barely managed to arrive here...{nl}But, I didn't expect she would behave like this.
So he doesn't even know where the grave of Legwyn family is...{nl}I feel like he is a liar.{nl}
Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the scroll for the dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas would not escape.
So she didn't really tell us the location of Legwyn grave because she doesn't know...?{nl}Didn't she say she would tell you if you give her some money?
The one who woke me up as I was about to go beside the goddesses... {nl}Okay. Do you need anything from me?{nl}
There was a story behind that. But, what Erikas said is right.{nl}I was chasing after the hunter of Kartas with my subordinates.{nl}But, it was too much for us.{nl}
So I've told Erikas who used to live near there to lend us her power to defeat the hunter of Kartas.{nl}Erikas asked for some collateral in return for lending us the blessed crystal.{nl}
He told me that we would be able to defeat the hunter with that crystal.{nl}But, it was difficult for us to just seal that demon.{nl}We substituted our lives for sealing that demon.
The hunter of Kartas is locked inside the seal in front of you.{nl}The power that is restraining the demon is the blessed crystal that was lended by Erikas.{nl}
The hunter of Kartas will not be able to get out from there if we leave him like that.{nl}But, my daughter... We should look for the famly treasure for Justina who is left alone.{nl}
I can unleash the hunter of Kartas from the seal alone, but{nl}In order to maintain the power of the crystal, we would need help from the subordinates.{nl}
But, I don't want to ask for help to Erikas again...{nl}If you could gather the scent of spirits that are growing on Mochia Hills, I would be able to wake up my subordinates.

When we encountered that demon, someone had to keep concentrating on the crystal.{nl}As each person fell down, we had less number of people to focus on the crystal and the circumstances got worsened.{nl}
Eventually, everyone dedicated their lives to seal the hunter of Kartas.{nl}But, since me and my subordinates don't have bodies, we won't get disturbed.{nl}
I can feel some sacred power within you.{nl}If you could eliminate that demon, we will help.{nl}Please complete the task that we couldn't complete...
There was some pitiful girl that I was taking care of.{nl}She didn't have families and she was so quiet.{nl}
As she started to stay in my mansion, the demons started to appear near the mansion...{nl}
And an incident occurred where one of my subordinates was killed by poison. {nl}Of course, everyone suspected that girl.{nl}
Eventually, that girl ran away. {nl}I don't know why, but deep inside my heart, there was some voice echoing to protect her.{nl}
Since we were able to tie up the hunter of Kartas here, she was able to run away safely.{nl}Although, it turned out like this, I don't have any regrets.{nl}
It's not that I did that for good faith.{nl}But, I feel sorry for my family... that they couldn't see Justina.
The scent of the spirits have the power to pull out the memories of the dead.{nl}I will put the power of the scroll of the dead here.{nl}
As you were able to pull me out, you will be able to pull out my subordinates.
My subordinates are sleeping in the pond of Cruva.{nl}I feel sorry that I could not prepare a good spot for their graves.{nl}
You will be able to wake up my subordinates when you rub the scent of spirits onto the stone graves.
I am to blame for it.{nl}They are like family and they are lieing on the ground without avoiding the severe wind...
I am happy to meet my subordinates again because of you,.{nl}Look at their spirits with great determination. They will fulfill our mission even after their deaths.
Let's pull out the hunter of Kartas from now on.{nl}But, the power of the blessed crystal is too strong so there's no way that I could unleash that demon...{nl}
Then, I have no choice, but to use some dirty method.{nl}To weaken the strong sacred power, we need some evil energy.{nl}
Defeat the monsters and bring some Wrongful Teeth.{nl}With that, if we weaken the power of the crystal, that demon would try to come out without knowing that it's a trap.{nl}
And that will be our last chance to eliminate it.
Thanks for helping me this far.{nl}Now, listen to the last wish of the dead...
I can feel some evil energy.{nl}Since I don't want you get dirty, let's finish this quickly.
Place the Wrongful Teeth near the seal. {nl}Then, our last mission will start.
Everything is over...{nl}It is so fortunate that it ended even after our deaths
Thanks. Please pass this crystal to my daughter's friend.{nl}Now, I will return to the goddesses with my subordinates.{nl}
When you meet my daughter, please tell her that I am so sorry.{nl}And that I love her... please don't forget.
Who is that girl who Legwyn tried to protect until his death?{nl}But, I am sure that he will rest in peace. Since his last mission has been fulfilled.{nl}
Now, I will return this to Erikas.{nl}I really appreciate for your help on behalf of my friend, Justina Legwyn.
I can tell this to you freely.{nl}The keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen... I came out from the Astral Tower with my colleagues to protect them.{nl}
The predecessor leader died suspiciously and Ignas became the next leader of the Astral Tower.{nl}And then his tyranny started.{nl}
He told everyone that the old rules of Lydia Schaffen should be abandoned and everything should start again...{nl}He told us to eliminate everything that was related to Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
But, Lydia Schaffen was the everything of the Astral Tower and she was the symbolic figure of all archers.{nl}After we regained consciousness, we ran away with our colleagues and the keepsakes.{nl}
Right now... I can hardly move due to the injury.{nl}But, if I stay like this, the chasers would find out about it.
I think we should move.{nl}Can you lure the chasers so that I could go to Guoda Empty Lot?{nl}
When we fire this disposable signal bomb, they will follow you.{nl}I am counting on you...
As you lure them, I will move secretly.{nl}Let's meet at Guoda Empty Lot.
We were able to move safely due to your help.{nl}You seem like a good person so please receive this.{nl}
This is the book recorded about the Roxona Conflict.{nl}I am not sure whether you are interested, but please receive it as a token of my gratitude.
Ah, I came up with a good idea as the chasers ran towards the signal bomb you fired.{nl}I am going to make a trap by attaching signal bomb onto a bomb.{nl}
Then my colleagues would know that I am here...{nl}Maybe, we could also lure the demons.{nl}
To do so, we need to something to make smoke...{nl}But, I've used everything I've had.{nl}
Good. I saw Red Leaves as I ran away. To Ruda trail. {nl}Can you collect those?
Many people left the Astral Tower as the tyranny of the leader Ignas continued.{nl}I tried my best to endure, but...
I could not endure when he was trying to eliminate the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen.
How come I haven't thought about this. {nl}I should have set the traps already...
Lastly... can you put this trap on Ruda Trail across here?{nl}I will hide here until I get recovered.{nl}
{memo X}My colleagues who were on the same side with me would also be chased by now.{nl}We were to meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come...
How come you have the signal bombs of Irmantas?{nl}You must be either brave or stupid.
{memo X}Our brothers who were on my side are also being chased at the moment.{nl}We were gonna meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come.
So you are the one who helped Irmantas.{nl}Hmm. Are you that hurt?{nl}
I want to get together with Irmantas, but I am not alright.{nl}We may stop ourselves each other.{nl}
I will go to Orsha from here.{nl}I am sorry, but can you hand this over to him?{nl}Just tell him that it is taken from the Astral Tower.
I will leave first.{nl}I've heard that Alina is also wandering around here...{nl}I hope you can find her if possible.
Who are you?{nl}You don't seem to be the chaser of Ignas.{nl}
Ah... You've already met Irmantas and Grazina.{nl}That's good. I have to meet Irmantas right away since I have the words to pass him!
I've seen it for sure.{nl}The demons were among the chasers of Ignas.{nl}They seemed to be close to each other.{nl}
I am sure Ignas has colluded with the demons.{nl}I think eliminating the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen is a part of that collusion.{nl}
But, I was badly hurt as well...{nl}I am not sure if I can meet Irmantas again in my life.{nl}
Can you defeat the monsters around here so I can get to him?{nl}If you reduce the number of monsters, then the possibility of getting detected by monsters will be lowered.
At first, I thought the chasers that were following from the Astral Tower were subordinates of Ignas.{nl}But, they weren't. There's something we don't know yet!
It noisy around here so I guess the chasers are near.{nl}We should move fast.
If we just stay here, then we would get attacked without notifying anything...{nl}
Please take me to Irmantas.{nl}We have to tell the ones who are following the determination of Lydia Schaffen that they are colluded with the demons!
If only I didn't get this injury, they would be easy to defeat...{nl}Where is Irmantas now?
No... I feel like I am going to lose consciousness if I walk little more.{nl}I feel like I am hearing the voice... of the goddess.{nl}
After I ran away from the Astral Tower, I've never seen a person who is so kind and reliable like you.{nl}If something happens to me... {nl}
Please tell Irmantas about the plot of Iganas with this letter.{nl}
Let's go. {nl}I will cheer myself up a bit.{nl}
What happened?{nl}I think I've heard a some noise from down there...{nl}
{memo X}Illina... was attacked?{nl}How can Ignas do something without going crazy!{nl}
{memo X}I will follow the words of Lydia Schaffen on behalf of Illina.{nl}I will arrive at Orsha no matter what takes.{nl}
To you... I want to give you some rewards since you've protected me until the end.{nl}I am sure Illina and Lydia Schaffen also want me to do that.
Please feed that black herb to Agatas.{nl}As it gets detoxified, the weak body of a human will suffer severe pains, but that will be better than dying.{nl}
Go your way after saving the life of Agatas.{nl}In the name of the Demon Lord Hauberk, I will never forget you since you've saved my contractor.
You are the one with a strong spirit.{nl}When they rushed in, I thought my revenge towards Giltine has ended.{nl}
They followed here to obtain the power of my spirit.{nl}You and Agastas will be in danger...
I think Agatas would not gain the consciousness for a while...{nl}For this innocent human and yourself, I want you to do something.{nl}
I have a way to eliminate the head of the demons.{nl}Please take care of the piece of my spirit which Agatas has for a while.{nl}
In order to move my spirit piece, I need the crystal that possesses the demonic energy.{nl}Please get the shadow essence from the demons at Pakavi fields.
With that power, I will be with you.
I can't quit this journey.{nl}Only I can eliminate Giltine and her subordinates from this world.{nl}
As you ripped me off, I will get a revenge on them...
This will be enough.{nl}I promise to you. If you help me, I will fight against the demons for the goddesses and the humans.{nl}
If you hate the demons, then you can trust me.{nl}The ones who've been betrayed will never forget.{nl}
When the spirit was ripped into pieces, I decided myself.{nl}If I would have to look for my spirit for thousands of years, I will never forget them...
The power of the spirit if gradually recovering with the demonic power.{nl}The knowledge I've forgotten is gradually coming back.{nl}
The head of the ones who are chasing me should be looking for me now.{nl}For the start of the new journey, I will make them feel the fear of the ones who are being chased...
Defeat the demons using the power of my soul stone.{nl}If you defeat them, I will use them as the source to call out my subordinates.{nl}
Please find my hidden spirit from the unoccupied grave at Badova Highway.{nl}I couldn't be with Agatas, but it will be possible if I am with you...
To get a revenge on the ones who are chasing me, I have to put him in danger.{nl}He must be hiding somewhere and looking at me.{nl}
Is he still confident?...{nl}Or does he feel fear since I am with a competent individual like you.
This will be enough.{nl}Now is the time to find my ripped spirit again!
Let's go to Salaisvin Wilderness.{nl}If I could only combine the pieces of my spirit, I would be able to put the guy who is chasing me into a danger.
If you are afraid that I would betray you after my spirits are combined again, please receive my soul stone.{nl}If I am about to hurt you, destroy it...{nl}
But, I promise. {nl}That would never happen.
1st Page of the Roxona Conflict

Lydia Schaffen was a master of archery.{nl}She could even hit the feelers of a small insect.{nl}She stood in front of the great knight Ruklys.{nl}She held her breath and slowly drew her bow.{nl}It wasn't that long ago when Lydia Schaffen stood against Ruklys who used to be her lover.{nl}

It was a day in the winter time.{nl}The tyranny of Kadumel King started getting extreme.{nl}Never-ending labor, starving people, corrupted landlords and a violent king...{nl}Ruklys could not stand what he was seeing in the kingdom.{nl}Revolt.{nl}Everyone in Roxona believed that Ruklys will win.{nl}

The spring had come and Ruklys was still in high spirits.{nl}Ruklys obtained the information that there was a village where the thieves who'd collided with the kingdom soldiers were living.{nl}The soldiers were so corrupted...{nl}Ruklys decided to attack the village with his subordinates.{nl}

He was just fighting against the thieves, but some unknown tension made Ruklys to hold his sword more firmly.{nl}A few of his colleagues fell down with the blood bursting out from their chests.{nl}At the same time, Ruklys and his subordinates ran towards the village.{nl}They didn't need to horn the pipe to let everyone know the battle has started.{nl}

They possessed a decent level of archery and martial arts.{nl}The doubts which Ruklys had in his mind also disappeared.{nl}It was certain that they were not normal thieves...{nl}Ruklys held his sword on his other hand.{nl}He noticed something strange as the time passed by, but that was after many people died.{nl}In the darkness, the battle continued.{nl}Ruklys managed to win the battle at the end, but he felt somewhat uncomfortable.{nl}Long after the battle, he found out that the village was the hometown of Lydia Schaffen.
The ones who've been betrayed would never forget about anything.{nl}
Many things which I've forgotten have become mine.{nl}But, don't worry.{nl}You are the companion of my journey.{nl}
Please return my soul stone. {nl}I will get prepared to summon my subordinates.{nl}
Let's defeat the leader with me.{nl}The shadow essences which you've collected told me that he is hidden in Paskavi Fields.{nl}
Pull him out!{nl}I will be with you soon.
If you are afraid, you could give up. I will complete the betrayal alone.{nl}I just hope that my contractor would not be hurt again...
Thanks for fighting with me, companion.{nl}I will be with you when you and your colleagues fall into great pains and danger.
Agatas carried out the contract diligently.{nl}I will leave him and start the journey of the revenge.{nl}
The pieces of me that are spread all over this world...{nl}They will become one spirit with me some day.{nl}
If you meet them on your journey, please help them.{nl}My spirits will rely on you.
This is the reward for the contract I've made with Agatas.{nl}Please put that in his pocket.{nl}
Farewell, companion.{nl}I will never forget you.
I will look for whereabouts of my other spirits here.{nl}Companion, we will meet again.
I've put the spirit separation potion{nl}into my pocket.
{memo X}Oh, you're here. {nl}Let's trace back what was seen in the soul's memory. {nl}If we could revive the Ruklys's device, then it will guide us to the revelation.
{memo X}I know where the device of Ruklys is but we need its parts to fix it. {nl}I will check on the left side so you check on the right.
{memo X}We'll need the parts to repair the device. {nl}Look for it on the right side.
You're here? {nl}What did Eminent say? {nl}
{memo X}Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.
{memo X}I figured the location of the magic circle as written in the document. {nl}
{memo X}First, the magic circle under Slypti Watchtower. {nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working. {nl}
{memo X}It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.
{memo X}Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.
{memo X}I saw the magic circles activate. Are you OK? {nl}What about Eminent? {nl}
You defeated Eminent and obtained the revelation? {nl}Wow, you're way better than I thought... {nl}
Anyway, I also feel like I've helped bring peace to the world and it beats my heart. {nl}But I still have some work to do. You know, right?
I feel lucky to have met you among the many Revelators. {nl}You saved the world, right?
I hope you stay safe, more than anything. {nl}May the goddess bless you!
Uh... Is that an army note? {nl}
Right. Those belong to my colleagues. {nl}I don't know when it would be, but I want to send their keepsakes back to their hometown someday.
Speaking of which, could you give me that army note?
Hopefully, I will be able to return to hometown together with the keepsakes of my colleagues. {nl}And my colleagues would surely want that too.
I will surely bring it back to hometown. {nl}My fellows will want that too.
Come to think of it, there was a goddess's divine object in Sielva Prayer Room. {nl}I think offering a prayer to that divine object will give us some answers. {nl}
The dead ones that wake up again are the problems. {nl}Why don't we purify them and keep them from waking up. {nl}
We break their coffin before they wake up. {nl}Even for the dead ones, it will be better than forcibly waking up. {nl}What do you think? Will you help?
You must be careful not to open the coffin lid when you break the coffin. {nl}When the coffin opens, the dead will jump out and attack.
Good work. {nl}I'm sure they will also thank you for making them rest in peace. {nl}
The problem is that divine object. {nl}I can't approach anywhere near it because of the barrier.
Maybe the gravekeeper would know something about the divine object and the barrier...{nl}But the gravekeeper doesn't like me. We had a thing in the past. {nl}
I met the gravekeeper while working on purifying in the name of the goddess. {nl}I was actually helping the gravekeeper but he was really mad about it. {nl}
The gravekeeper stands at the end of Vevapi Aisle. {nl}Can you ask him about the divine object of the goddess for me?
A divine object of the goddess? {nl}What. Are you in a team with that rude Bokor? {nl}
Get out of this grave site. {nl}Just thinking about that Bokor brings back my anger. {nl}
That Bokor went around breaking the coffins of the dead saying they rise back! {nl}I don't understand how he can do such a thing with a sane mind!
Divine object that you can't even approach... {nl}I understand if they block the monsters or demons from getting close to it but even humans, that I don't understand.
The people from the Tree Order or something were here first before that Bokor Utara guy. {nl}They claimed that they were officially acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna or something? {nl}
They said they'd carry out the will of the Goddess Zemyna since this land was blessed by her. {nl}How could I have stopped that. {nl}
But since their arrival, the dead started to rise again. {nl}If that was on purpose, there couldn't have been an insult worse than that! {nl}
That was giving me a headache already, and then some Bokor comes along breaking the coffins. {nl}Breaking the coffins to purify the dead does not show any respect for the dead!
That is not important. {nl}I want to calm all this fuss as soon as possible. {nl}
If you help me, then I will believe that the Bokor didn't come here with bad intentions. {nl}
Burying it back in the ground is not all. {nl}Pay respect to the dead using this match and cremate their bodies.
What are you waiting for! Move quickly! {nl}I cannot.. handle it anymore.
Sorry for being sharp a while ago. I was a bit sensitive. {nl}Actually, having to point the blades to people whom I should take care of as a gravekeeper is not something I am comfortable with. {nl}
Thank you for giving them peace for me.
Anyway, I know of the divine object of the goddess that the Bokor mentioned.{nl}Those guys from Tree of Truth order made it one day. {nl}
Maybe that is why the dead rose... {nl}I had my suspicions but I couldn't approach it either. {nl}

Ah! That's right. {nl}Since long time ago, some Bokor or Necromancer not in their sane minds used to come here secretly. {nl}They used to do insane experiments on the dead who are rested in here. {nl}

So my father learned how to make shaman dolls from the guards nearby Klaipeda. {nl}He said if you put spells on the shaman dolls, it finds the power that messes with the grave and destroys it or something? {nl}
There is a box in Kansias Stone Chamber with my father's belongings. {nl}There should be a shaman doll in it. {nl}I don't think I can.. make it through the bodies.
Our family has been gravekeepers for generations. {nl}My father passed away during the disaster on Medzio Diena, so I have taken his place since then. {nl}
I only learned over hid shoulders... {nl}But I am the gravekeeper of this place now.
Right! This is it.{nl}It wasn't used for a long time, but it should work well since father made it.
Done. Now go to the divine object. {nl}If that divine object is the reason behind the dead rising here, the shaman doll will break the barrier and destroy the divine object.
It's the shaman doll that father used. {nl}If we do as my father used to do, then nothing will go wrong. Just as my father used to do...
If the shaman doll attacked the divine object, then it means it detected an eveil enery. {nl}But the shaman doll was the one destroyed... {nl}
Anyway, if the barrier broke, then your friend Bokor must be able to identify it. {nl}What about going back to that Bokor and asking him?
Huh? You really broke the barrier? {nl}See, I knew the gravekeeper would help. {nl}
Actually, I was a but suspicious myself. {nl}I felt a bad energy from the barrier considering that it was something that covered the divine object of the goddess.
Anyway, since the barrier is now broken, let's go together. {nl}If it really is a divine object of the goddess, then it will react to the prayer for the goddess. {nl}
Will you go ahead first? {nl}I will follow as soon as I'm ready for the prayer.
A Shaman doll.. Evil energy... It really is suspicious.
Thank you for saving me. I almost went to the goddess. {nl}I guess it is a lie that it was a divine object of the goddess. {nl}
The object of the goddess would not summon such a monster. {nl}I smell something fishy with that Tree of Truth order.

Since the object here was not real, now we must find the trace of Goddess Zemyna from somewhere else. {nl}It's ok. If something like this makes me frustrated, then I would not have kept my journey until here. {nl}
But before I leave, I must help the gravekeeper and keep the fuss down. {nl}Now that the evil object is gone, my abilities will help keep this place calm. {nl}
I want to show my sincerity to the gravekeeper, but, the image of him being angry at me holds me back. {nl}If you're on the way to the gravekeeper, can you send him my sincerity as well?
{memo X}No wonder. That object wasn't that of the Goddess. {nl}Using the name of the Goddess into tricks like this. They have crossed the line. {nl}
I want to go and make them pay for it right away. {nl}However, as a gravekeeper, keeping this place secure comes first. {nl}
Was that Bokor's name Juta? {nl}His ability powers will be of much help. {nl}
The Tree of Truth order went in to the Kalail Mausoluem. {nl}They said they will find something to carry out their order or something...{nl}
If ever you go to Kalail Mausoleum, be careful about them. {nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds. {nl}
If this is not it either, I can't help but be exhausted. {nl}Where do you think Goddess Zemyna has gone?
Oh my god, the Divine Tree! {nl}The Divine Tree answered my prayers and sent someone to save me!{nl}
Thank you. I thought death is the only option for me. {nl}I am Gintas, a follower of the Tree of Truth order. {nl}
We, the Tree of Truth order, believe in the Divine Tree that stands tall in the kingdom. {nl}The Divine Tree is punishing the foolish people whose greed are soaring up high. {nl}
Our order will be the appointed ones of the Divine Tree and guide the world in opening a new age. {nl}Right. Are you interested in joining our order? {nl}
You are really strong, just as someone sent by the Divine Tree should be. {nl}Such strength should be used for something bigger.
I am collecting the spirit of the dead that rose back, as the order told me to. {nl}Margiris can read the memories of the dead when they were alive from the spirit stones.
She finds the sins of the dead from their memories and forgives them to purify the sins in this world. {nl}
I seem to have sprained my ankle while running away from the dead. I can't walk. {nl}Can you help me by any chance?
I'm sure my prayers reached the Divine Tree to send you here. {nl}
Brother. {nl}By this, your sins have become lighter.
There is something you need to help us with. {nl}Think of it as a test and do your best. {nl}
Carrying out sacred missions can get you to some trouble like just a while ago. {nl}You can also lose your life. {nl}
Bodies of followers are brought to Seima Stone Chamber and their sins are purified. {nl}But because of Margiris' sacred abilities, some actually get their life back. {nl}
The followers who rise back can't throw away their regrets in life and keep roaming around this place. {nl}Please use this flint to cremate the regrets and soulless bodies of the dead.
Margiris told us salvation is not something we can get so easily. {nl}
This work purifies the sins of the foolish as well as ours. {nl}Those who die during the process is because their belief is not enough. {nl}
Only those who stand it will earn salvation.
Poor Gintas... {nl}You've dealt with the despair of death alone.
Hey. If you are thinking of joining the order, don't bother. {nl}I, myself, used to be a follower of Margiris. {nl}
I used to focus on purifying the sins of the dead like Gintas. {nl}I thought I would earn salvation. {nl}
But one day, I saw the record books of Margiris. {nl}As far as I knew, those book keep a record of the process of purifying the sins of the dead. {nl}
But it was actually a record of land ownership. {nl}And I also found out that he was looking for the record of the Kalail in here.
When I read until that part of the books, Margiris killed me.
Amazing. Did righteousness bring you here?{nl}Look. Defeating Margiris does not mean anything. {nl}
If Margiris' mission fails, the order will send someone else in here... {nl}And innnocent disciples will turn like this again. {nl}Nothing will change.
If you really want to stop the order, then you need to find out their true objective. {nl}Find the record of Kalail first. {nl}You need to stop the order from getting their hands on Kalail's records.
What? {nl}You met a spirit of follower in there? {nl}
Ah. I think it's the follower that I know of. {nl}It's body with regrets keeping it from leaving and just roams around. {nl}
But don't worry. {nl}The souls that are forgiven will soon be with the Divine Tree. {nl}
Thank you for helping until here. {nl}Here, let me give you a seal of Truth. {nl}
Margiris is along the way to Kalail's grave. {nl}If you bring this to him, he will acknowledge your contributions.
Don't tell Gintas about the story of Kalail. {nl}He won't believe it. {nl}
I want to save you, but I don't know how...
Who are you? {nl}Ah, it's Gintas' Seal of Truth. {nl}
There are too many people who want to join the order for salvation. {nl}Anyway, welcome.
I think my ankle is getting better so a little more rest will do. {nl}Please be careful and may we meet again.
Sorry to ask you when you've just joined the order, but there is something we need you to do. {nl}We are cleansing the sins of those who have died here. {nl}
I woke the spirit of Kalail. {nl}He used to take some land of the Kingdom when he was alive. {nl}
He was not able to let go of that even after this death. {nl}He did a document of sins somewhere in this gravesite. {nl}

To save his spirit, we must find the hidden document and make him let go of the his regrets from the time he was alive. {nl}But there seems to be greed left in him and he won't speak up about the whereabout of the document. {nl}
Can you try to persuade Kalail? {nl}Since he doesn't know your face, try to act as if you're not part of the order. {nl}
If you find out the whereabouts of the documents, I will bless you with the grace of the Divine Tree.
You just won't give up, do you. {nl}I don't know who you are or what you want. {nl}
Why are you pestering me when you won't even tell me what it is for?
I will understand if you play rough with him in case he doesn't listen to you.
What are you? {nl}Why are you disturbing other people's gravesites? {nl}
I have lived my life honestly.{nl}And you think I have hidden some document with the record of my sins?{nl}Stop speaking nonsense and go away!
If you are really on the goddess' side, then you have no reason to stand seeing something that disgraces her name. {nl}What are you waiting for? {nl}
Such awful people. {nl}Setting that up as a sacred object... {nl}
I think that seal has weakened the energy of that thing. {nl}It must have thought that we're on the same side. {nl}
Anyway, since you've taken care of that horrible thing, I will believe what you say.
No wonder it was suspicious. That leader wasn't human! {nl}Right, that thing wasn't human... {nl}
Why are they making such a fuss in this grave. What are they after?
After hearing your story, it seems that they are after the ownership of the villa in Kaliss Province. {nl}There is a copy of the list of villa owners that I used to handle when I was alive. {nl}

They must have wanted to get their hands on that copy and use it to make false testimony claiming that the lands in Kaliss belong to them. {nl}Fortunately, it seems like they were not able to find it. {nl}
I suspected something like this to happen and hid the list in Seima Stone Chamber. {nl}Can you gather the scattered list of villa owners?

The villa ownership is supposed to be managed by the next generation of deputies... {nl}But he was not someone to be trusted so I requested that the manuscript of records be buried with me when I die in my will. {nl}
He may look like a good guy but he even as a public official, he had private meetings with unknown people... {nl}And I caught him forging records at one point.

It bring chills thinking that they could have found the records. {nl}If they are preying on each province records like this, then only Kaliss but the whole kingdom will fall under the hands of the demons soon.
Good thing you're her. {nl}That is the record of land owners in the Kaliss province.

Now, we have to engrave the shaman doll with the energy that messes the grave. {nl}I saw the site where they cremated the dead a while ago and there was a black crystal that I've never seen before. {nl}
I'm sure the black crystals are the traces of evil magic that woke up the dead. {nl}Can you get more of it from the dead that rose?
Ah, I will take care of the fallen dead bodies. {nl}For now there is something more important to do.
Yeah, this will be enough. {nl}I will prepare the shaman doll right away. Hold on.
What? You are not a follower of that order? {nl}Are you telling me to believe you? {nl}
Alright. {nl}Then destroy that divine object that they claim to have received the blessings of the goddess. {nl}
I have never seen a blessed diving object fume evil energy. {nl}I think that object is messing this gravesite.
I brought the Kaliss land owners list to my grave to stop the corruption of the next generation. {nl}But to think of it, this record has now become useless. {nl}
Since they will siege for this document again. {nl}
I will give this record to you. {nl}If you make sure destroy it, I will be able to lay in peace again. {nl}Please.
It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it. {nl}How did they find this place.
Villa ownership is actually a very sensitive matter so the records are not really known to public. {nl}
Only the current deputy knows that I have handled the records. {nl}How did they know about this place...
But it is strange. {nl}To have a barrier blocking people from approaching the divine object.{nl}
Even if it is sacred, if that is how it is, no one can approach it. {nl}I mean, it's as if it doesn't want anybody to come near it.
Place this Soul Stone then defeat the dead nearby.{nl}The souls of the dead will be absorbed into this stone.{nl}
This cleanses the sins of the dead and yours too. {nl}Also, Margiris will be very happy about it. {nl}
Good luck then.
Ashaq Underground Prison

Since the blessed crystal is sealing the hunter of Kartas, Gailus Legwyn told you that you can't find the crystal again unless you defeat that demon. To wake up the subordinates of Legwyn family who would face against the hunter of Kartas, please collect the spirit scent from Mochia fields.

Defeat the dead that have been revived.
Bokor Juta came here to look for Goddess Zemyna, but the place is full of the dead. Defeat the dead who are disturbing the praying of Juta.

It seems that Bokor Yuta has something to say about the divine object of the goddess. Talk to Bokor Yuta again.
Bokor Yuta can't get near the sanctum because of the barrier near there. He asked the grave guard, Sigis, on how to break the barrier.
The grave guard, Sigis doesn't like Bokor Yuta. Talk to Sigis.
Cremate the resurrected dead
Sigis told you that he will believe your words if you can find eternal sleep for the deads. Defeat the deads and cremate them using the matches Sigis gave to you.
You've cremated the resurrected deads. Return to Sigis.

The divine objects which Bokor Yuta is talking about was made by the religious body of the tree of the truth and he suspects that might be the reason why the deads woke up. To check, Sigis asked you to pull out the spell dolls from the box of the grave guard.
Hand over the spell doll of the grave guard to Sigis

One man is running away from the resurrected deads. You better rescue them fast.
The man who you saved from the danger was the member of the religious body. Talk to Gintas.

The Sculpture of Peace
Talk to the Elder's grandchild

$This stone slate is the Light of Salvation?{nl}It looks like just an old slate to me.
$You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mine to find the Light of Salvation? {nl}

$So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they search for the Light of Salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and the Knight Commander either. {nl}
$Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your helping the villagers.{nl}The Light of Salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.
$But some force prevented me from approaching it, as if it was destined for ownership by a certain being.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the Light of Salvation.{nl}
$Perhaps that force I felt was the Light of Salvation...{nl}That's what I think.
$This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What's all this about a 'Light of Salvation' in the Crystal Mine? I have never seen such thing. {nl}
$Thank you for saving me.{nl}You must also be a Revelator who has come in search of the Light of Salvation.{nl}

Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I am Albinas from the Anastospa.{nl}
This is a tombstone erected by the people of Nestospa as an offering to the goddess.{nl}As you can see, it has become so defiled that it is attracting mobs of monsters.{nl}
What could Nestospa possibly be thinking..{nl}What good are sanctums and tombstones when the goddess is missing?{nl}
They can keep making them, but they're all just going to get defiled like this.{nl}

Unlike them, the people of Anastospa have a good grasp of reality.{nl}We know that our priority should be saving the people we can actually see before us and getting rid of the demons, rather than thinking about the goddess who is already gone.
{memo X}
Even though the goddess is gone now, Nestospa continues to pursue its faith blindly.{nl}That is why they keep building these sanctuaries everywhere.
{nl}Human life comes first, and then our next priority is wiping out the demons we can see before us, and beyond that, as long as the goddess has abandoned us, is there even a need for faith anymore?
Thank you so much for agreeing to help me.{nl}We really need to teach Nestospa a lesson.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}
What is this..{nl}
Who're you? {nl}Who do you think you are, touching our tombstone?
This is Nestospa's sacred tombstone.{nl}Are you the one that did this to our tombstone?
I've never seen or heard of anyone like that.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
You'll take responsibility and restore the tombstone?{nl}I really don't like you, but if you're willing to do that, I guess I've got no choice.
I'm only agreeing to this for the goddess's sake.{nl}Luckily there are lots of stones around here.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}
Are you almost done yet? If you're going to take responsibility, you should get hustlin'.{nl}Don't just linger around here wasting time.
Who are you?{nl}And what is this rock you've got here?
What? You destroyed the tombstone?{nl}We worked so hard to erect that tombstone and you destroyed it?
I don't need your apology.{nl}Since Damijonas requested it, I'll start working on this, but please don't ever do that again.{nl}
{memo X}
I need more time.{nl}I can't just magically make a tombstone appear out of thin air, you know.
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
$However, it's very strange.{nl}I have never heard of that name.{nl}
{memo X}
{memo X}
{memo X}
They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}
I'll be able to talk to you once I get those documents back.
They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}
$These are the data with the differences between Anastos and Nestos.{nl}There should be an opportunity to explain after finding the data.
Let's see..{nl} This one's here.. That one's not here.. Now where's that one..
Oh, yes.{nl} You've found them all.
{nl}What was it you wanted to ask me about?
Albinas?{nl} I haven't heard that name before.
And you say he spoke of Anastospa and told you to destroy the tombstone?{nl} No way, we would never do anything like that.{nl}
Both Nestospa and we are people who revere the goddess and are focused in our faith.{nl} Though we are a bit more realistic in our pursuits than the people of Nestos are.

$I am indeed Bartet.{nl}What's the matter?{nl}
{memo X}
She was strange.{nl}Since only the pilgrims visit this place, it was quite a strange sight.{nl}
She was staring absently at something leather-like then suddenly teared it apart.{nl}To do such a feat with bare hands.{nl}
It wasn't the strength of a human. I was trembling.{nl}She disappeared down there soon after throwing away the shredded leather.{nl}
There might still be a bit of leather left if you head down there. I.. I'm too afraid to go even if it was an order from a goddess.
{memo X}
I have no idea what's hidden in the leather.{nl}I hope there's a bit of leather left.
What if the monsters have eaten it?
Let me take a look.{nl}Hm..{nl}
I have seen this crest before..{nl}Ah.. Ah!{nl}
I remembered. I saw it from a book.{nl}It's the crest of the Lunatic Demon King, Vaiga!{nl}

There's no time.{nl}Hurry!

$If you're worried for your safety, I will also give you this Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.
Welcome! {nl} Oh, so you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you. {nl}
I heard you successfully removed the seal at Pasaga Cliff.{nl}Now go get the next step from my brothers at the Pillars of the Courtyard.
$There's a piece below Seklus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.

$There is an unstable magic circle on the way to Ramus Crossroads. {nl}They say to not go near it because a strange aura flows out from it. But it really doesn't seem so. {nl}
